review_text: I liked it, a lot, it was like taking a trip back in time to my childhood when I was with my parents, walking down the ground floor towards the back, passing through a somewhat murky and mysterious hallway and suddenly a typical mouth balcony with T-shirts. Guerrin hanging and reaching the bottom where I find a beautiful still life full of paintings and an incredible pizza oven next to the sound of a bell announcing some birthday in the place, the place completely full of people, but super organized and its staff well predisposed hope everything goes well, then I went to the upper floor in a more traditional pizzeria atmosphere but preserving its magic and it was there where we had a delicious Guerrin pizza for dinner and then an incredible dessert!!!! I loved!!!!
review_translated_text: Me gusto, mucho, fue como hacer un viaje en el tiempo a mi ninez cuando iba con mis padres, recorrer la planta baja hacia el fondo, pasando por un pasillo algo turbio y misterioso y de repente un tipico balcon de la boca con remeras de Guerrin colgadas y llegar al fondo donde me encuentro con un hermoso bodegon llego de cuadros y un horno en pizzero increible junto al sonido de una campana anunciando algun cumpleanos en el lugar, el lugar totalmente repleto de personas, pero super organizado y su personal bien predispuesto a que todo salga bien, luego fui a la planta alta en un ambiente mas de pizzeria tradicional pero conservando su magia y fue alli donde cenamos un riquisima pizza Guerrin y luego en un increible postre!!!! Me encanto!!!!

review_text: Delicious pizza without a doubt, the service is rather bad
review_translated_text: Deliciosa pizza sin duda, el servicio es mas bien malito

review_text: I didnt like the very white pizza with no floor and little face.
review_translated_text: No me gusto la pizza muyy blanca sin piso y carito

review_text: Everything is tremendous. The young man Beto is a genius, one of the best young men in my life. Very attentive, kind, and above all, a good person. We will return only and only if the
review_translated_text: Tremendo todo. El mozo Beto un genio, de los mejores mozos de mi vida. Muy atento, amable , y por sobre todas las cosas , buena persona. Volveremos solamente y unicamente si nos atiende el

review_text: After 20 minutes of waiting at the table, the drink was heated and we had to wait another 15 minutes after complaining to the manager. The piece is very delicious and very expensive, a pot and a beer $22,800
review_translated_text: Despues de 20minutos de espera en la mesa se calento la bebida y tuvimos que esperar otros 15 minutos mas luego de la queja con el encargado. La pieza es muy rica y muy cara, un poza y una cerveza $ 22.800

review_text: Excellent attention!!! BETO attended to us! A 10 EVERYTHING, SUPER EDUCATED AND ATTENTIVE!
Beto attended to us, I would take him to my house, very friendly and very attentive. I strain an olive but nothing happens.
review_translated_text: Nos atendio Beto, me lo llevaria a mi casa, muy amable y muy atento. Me afano una aceituna pero no pasa nada.

review_text: Name: Beto
review_translated_text: Nombre : Beto

review_text: Beto, number 1, a boss
review_translated_text: Beto, el numero 1, un capo

review_text: Without a doubt, the best pizza in Argentina. Beto, the best guy Kid-friendliness: Yeah
review_translated_text: Sin dudas, la mejor pizza de Argentina. Beto, el mejor mozo Kid-friendliness: Si

review_text: Very delicious pizza, Beto the waiter served us very well, a genius...
review_translated_text: Muy rica pizza, Beto el mozo nos atendio muy bien, un genio...

review_text: Beto the best guy
review_translated_text: Beto el mejor mozo

review_text: Beto the best waiter Parking: Okay
The friendliness of the waiters is something that deserves a separate mention. We ate the famous Neapolitan Milanese, very delicious and huge! It is to share in a group
review_translated_text: La amabilidad de los mozos es algo que merece una mencion aparte. Comimos la famosa milanesa a la napolitana, muy rica y es enorme! Es para compartir en grupo

review_text: Spectacular restaurant. Its so cheap and the food is so good that you have to go half an hour before it opens because otherwise youll be waiting an hour. There is an impressive queue outside. If you dont want to wait, you buy the same food at their rotisserie next door and dont wait for anything.
review_translated_text: Espectacular restaurante. Es tan barato y se come tan bien que hay que ir media hora antes de que abra porque sino estas una hora esperando. Se hace una cola impresionantes afuera. Si no queres esperar compras la misma comida en su rotiseria que esta al lado y no esperas nada.

review_text: The Neapolitan Milanese is very delicious, very filling and delicious, the place is pleasant, good service, the bad thing is the too much wait in the place, but it is worth the time to eat...!!
review_translated_text: Muy rico la milanesa napolitana , muy contundente y rico, agradable el lugar , buena atencion, lo malo es la demasiada espera en el lugar, pero vale la pena el tiempo para comer...!!

review_text: I looked at many recommendations for this place that was the best Milanese in the world and that the food was super good. The truth is that it was too overrated, nothing to do with what we expected, the Milanese was good, crispy, rich, but to be the best in the world falls short. Furthermore, the worst thing was that we found terrible hair inside the Milanese, so much so that it made me sick to continue eating it. The service was quite good, we had a nice waiter, but from what I saw and read, there arent many like that. The atmosphere is quite simple, the truth is that you have to queue for 1 hour and a half to be eating in what seems like the eatery on the corner of my house... Lazy. I recommend you make a meat schnitzel at home because you dont have to wait in line for 1 hour and a half and thats it. Oh and the wifi didnt work, totally overrated.
review_translated_text: Mire muchisimas recomendaciones de este lugar que era la mejor milanesa del mundo y que se comia super bien.. La verdad demasiado sobrevalorada nada que ver con lo que nos esperabamos, la milanesa estaba buena, crocante, rica, pero para ser la mejor del mundo se queda corta. Ademas lo peor fue que encontramos terrible pelo adentro de la milanesa, que hasta que me dio asco seguir comiendola. El servicio dentro de todo bastante bien nos toco un mozo copado pero por lo que estuve viendo y leyendo no hay muchos asi El ambiente bastante simple, la verdad hacer 1 hora y media de cola para estar comiendo en lo que pareciera el bodegon de la esquina de mi casa... Flojo. Te recomiendo hacerte una milanesa de carne en casa que no tenes que hacer 1 hora y media de cola y listo. Ah y no andaba el wifi, totalmente sobrevalorado.

review_text: We ordered the classic Milanese to share with two sides and it was delicious. Good quality price ratio. The only thing we went at 9:00 p.m. and went in for dinner at 11:20 p.m. Waiting kills you! I wouldnt go back because of the waiting time.
Excellent meal. Reasonable prices. Generous portions to share
review_translated_text: Excelente comida. Precios razonables. Porciones abundantes para compartir

review_text: The best of Bariloche, the supreme Neapolitan c fries, it was worth the wait, the best!!
review_translated_text: Lo mejor de Bariloche,la  suprema a la napolitana c fritas,valio la pena la espera,lo mejor!!

review_text: Perfect
review_translated_text: Perfecto

review_text: There is never room and their rotisserie does not have all the restaurants dishes although they have good service on WhatsApp.
review_translated_text: Nunca hay lugar y su rotiseria no tiene todos los platos del restaurante aunque tiene buena atencion por whatsapp.

review_text: The food is good but its not worth the wait for the tremendous line outside as everyone says. The atmosphere is that of a typical restaurant with the kitchen visible. When we entered, they told us a little aggressively that they are in charge of locating people. In our case we didnt wait, we arrived at 8 and entered the opening along with the entire line (it was luck, otherwise we were going to leave). We ordered a Neapolitan Milanese that has a very good sauce and also the mozzarella that makes it very delicious. To begin with, the matambre and the tongue were nothing out of this world, we also ordered trout as the sauce was good. They put a panera and they dont charge for cover but it doesnt come with any sauce or butter, something that used to be a classic in Argentina but seems to be getting lost. The waiter did not treat us well, we asked him for suggestions but he did not help much, always bad vibes, I understand that he may be tired from his job but the place had just opened. The service is what I under my stars since it is not just the food that one looks for when going out to a place.
review_translated_text: La comida es buena pero no vale la espera de la tremenda cola que se hace afuera como dicen todos. El ambiente es de un tipico bodegon con la cocina a la vista, al entrar de forma un poco agresiva nos dijeron que ellos se encargan de ubicar a la gente. En nuestro caso no esperamos, llegamos a las 8 y entramos en la apertura junto con toda la fila (fue suerte, sino nos ibamos a ir). Pedimos una milanesa napolitana que tiene una salsa muy buena y tambien la muzzarella que la hace ser muy rica. De entrada el matambre y la lengua no fue nada de otro mundo, ademas pedimos trucha que la salsa estaba buena. Ponen panera y no cobran cubierto pero no viene con ninguna salsa ni con manteca, algo que solia ser un clasico en argentina pero parece que se esta perdiendo. El mozo no nos atendio bien, le preguntamos sugerencia pero no ayudo mucho, siempre mala onda, yo entiendo que puede estar cansado de su trabajo pero el local acababa de abrir. El servicio es lo que bajo mis estrellas ya que no es solo la comida lo que uno busca cuando sale a un lugar.

review_text: Excellent service and food! A Bariloche classic
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion y comida! Un clasico de Bariloche

review_text: One understands all the recognitions that this place received because it is honestly one of excellence. The dishes are abundant enough to share, the service is very fast and the waiters stand out for their warmth. The price-quality ratio is unbeatable. The negative aspects are the wait to enter (approximately 2 hours) and that they do not accept credit cards. I would return every time I return to Bariloche.
review_translated_text: Uno entiende todos los reconocimientos que recibio este lugar porque sinceramente es de excelencia. Los platos son abudantes como para compartir, el servicio es rapidisimo y los mozos se destacan por su calidez. La relacion precio-calidad es imbatible. Los aspectos negativos son la espera para ingresar (aproximadamente 2 horas) y que no aceptan tarjeta de credito. Volveria cada vez que regrese a Bariloche.

review_text: Very delicious food. Very good attention. Esteban stands out for that.
review_translated_text: Muy rica comida. La atencion muy buena. Esteban se destaca por aquello.

review_text: Its worth the wait, the dishes are super abundant and very delicious, very homemade. The attention of the waiters is very good, and in a place where the waiters are in aprons, the food and attention cannot be bad. Good old school.
review_translated_text: Vale la espera, los platos son super abundantes y muy ricos, bien caseros. La atencion de los mozos es muy buena, ya un lugar donde los meseros estan de delantal no puede ser mala la comida ni atencion. Bien de la vieja escuela.

review_text: Excellent place to eat and very good value for money Quality. Very generous portions and very delicious dishes! Milanese are the specialty of the house!
Impeccable, totally recommended! Especially the Neapolitan mila and the eggplants!! Of the mila, 2 eat very abundantly, but 3 calmly.
review_translated_text: Impecable, totalmente recomendable! Sobre todo la mila napolitana y las berenjenas!!. De la mila comen 2 bien abundante ,sino 3 tranqui.

review_text: Fantastic, wonderful, good price, all very delicious.
review_translated_text: Fantastico, maravilloso, buen precio, todo muy delicioso.

review_text: Good service, impeccable meats, its a shame that it is aimed at tourists due to the excessive price
review_translated_text: Buena atencion, las carnes impecables, lastima que sea orientado a turistas por el precio excesivo

review_text: I sent a pre-reservation request a month ago. They ignored it.

Do not go. Trap!! Even with a reservation, the wait is monstrous. It makes no sense to spend expensive hours on an international trip to be at the mercy of customer service. Rationally, I dont recommend it.
review_translated_text: Nao va.  Cilada!! Mesmo  com reserva a espera e  monstruosa. Nao tem sentido gastar horas caras de uma viagem internacional para ficar a merce de um atendimento. De forma racional nao recomendo.

review_text: Impeccable service, they bring the food fast, they ask you every time, but when it comes to entering it is a little annoying. The food, the meats are quite tough but very juicy, the desserts and salads were incredibly good. The worst of all is the heat, there is no air conditioning and it is very hot. In my opinion this place is overrated because there are many more places with more delicious and much cheaper food.
review_translated_text: Servicio impecable traen la comida rapida  te preguntan a cada rato pero a la hora de entrar es Poco pesado. La comida las carnes estan bastante duras pero muy jugosas ,  los postres y ensaladas si estaban increiblemente buena  . Lo peor de todo es el calor no hay aire acondicionado y hay mucho calor . En mi opinion este sitio esta sobre valorado porque hay muchos mas sitios con mas comida mas rica y mucho mas barata.

review_text: A gastronomic experience to remember for a lifetime, it is very honorable to know that you sat in the same place as Messi to taste the best Parilla in the country. Incredible atmosphere, good cuts, good wines, friendly internal service and free Chandon while you wait. Im a gastrologist and this was very important for my cultural background. Unique experience.
review_translated_text: Uma experiencia gastronomica para levar pra vida inteira, e muito honroso saber que voce sentou no mesmo lugar que o Messi para degustar a melhor Parilla do pais. Ambiente incrivel, bons cortes, bons vinhos cordialidade no atendimento interno e Chandon de graca enquanto voce espera. Sou gastrologo e isso foi muito importante para a minha bagagem cultural. Experiencia impar.

review_text: A ton of people told me to go to Don Julio - as its supposed to be a staple of Buenos Aires; however, its a tourist trap. Its ridiculously overpriced, and every other parilla offers similar steaks at a fraction of the cost. For example: Ojo de Bife or Ribeye was $62,900 Pesos or $57 USD at DJ, but at Fervor, another high-end place, the same cut was $28,800 or $26 USD) I wanted to like this experience so badly, but could not find much  other than the free sparkling wine & empanadas (while you wait for over an hour past your reservation time). FOOD: We started with the provaleta topped with tomato - which was great contrast in cheese and tomatoes. The Ojo De Bife was quality meat and was cooked to medium-rare as asked - couldnt tell the difference between any other steak in the city. SERVICE: The host staff spoke great english, but none of the waiters spoke even a tiny bit of English - which was surprising considering all of the clientele were foreigners. It took an hour past our reservation time to get seated - with having to ask the host a few times to update us (with wildly different answers each time). Service was reasonably quick, but we had to flag them down a few times. Overall, Don Julio is a HARD pass. Influencers need to stop recommending this place when theres so many better parillas to choose from in that area (Minga Parilla, La Carnicera, Fervor, etc).

Very expensive. The restaurant has increased its price too much and the quality of the food does not justify the price. Look at the photo on the bill: 900 gr mariposa steak costs 280 reais and has no garnish. A steak de lomo (our filet mignon) costs 371.00 reais. Total bill 840.00 reais  not very much. Unjustifiable because there are restaurants here that are as good or even better than this one and they dont explore the value as much.
review_translated_text: Muito caro. O restaurante aumentou demais o seu preco e a qualidade da comida nao justifica o valor. Olhem a foto da conta:  bife mariposa de 900 gr custa 280 reais e nao tem guarnicao. Um bife de lomo ( nosso file mignon) custa 371,00 reais. Total da conta 840,00 reais  por pouca coisa. Injustificavel pq aqui tem restaurantes tao bons ou ate mais que esse e nao exploram tanto no valor.

review_text: You want to know what Argentinian meat is: its here! There is no better place in Buenos Aires than in Argentina. Traditional and warm setting. Impeccable service. Endless wine list. Bread worthy of one of the best French bakeries. To book in advance, of course. But you can also queue to register on the reserve list for the same day
review_translated_text: Vous voulez savoir ce quest la viande argentine : cest ici ! Il ny a pas mieux a Buenos Aires comme en Argentine. Cadre traditionnel et chaleureux. Service impecable. Carte de vins sans fin. Pain digne dune des meilleures Boulangeries Francaises. A reserver avec anticipation, bien sur . Mais vous pouvez aussi faire la queue pour vous inscrire sur la liste de reserve pour le jour meme

review_text: I feel obliged to mention my experience, because with the great fame it has, I expected much more. I dont think its at the level of a Michelin star (comparing to the ones I see in ESP). Upon arrival, they welcomed us with a couple of glasses of cava to liven up the wait (a good touch, but neither of us who were there liked alcohol and no alternatives were asked or offered). The food is very simple, 10k ARS for a solid disc of provoleta is not my idea of a good presentation, for me it would have to be creamy or liquid, and be able to take advantage of that bread that they give you at the beginning of the dinner, to be able to spread it. Another detail, at the beginning of the meal as a free appetizer they gave us some empanadas that were good, some sauces and an olive oil to spread, but like in the rest of BA it is an oil without flavor, without strength, which you spread with the bread and its still like eating bread alone. I suppose this would be fixed if more acidic or flavored oil was used. An entrecote of 900g - 70k ARS seems outrageous to me to not have any distinctive. The quality was normal, and being with the fans the meat went cold very quickly. A quick idea without being a chef, removing the meat on a hot stone, which keeps it warm, makes it recognizable, and the diner can do it a little more if he wants. Or some sauce/spices that highlights the flavor. I ordered a side of fries (I think it was another 10k), and I wouldnt order them again, they did seem to have been cooked twice, but although they were crispy on the outside, they were almost completely empty inside. Also, I suppose that due to the variety or the cold, after a few minutes they had become very plastic and when biting into them they did not break so easily, and I no longer wanted to eat them. Another detail that I didnt like about them is that they had gone overboard with the salt, and had used fine salt, which I dont think are details of such a renowned restaurant. The truth is that I cant talk too much about dessert because we were already full, and we only ordered a yellow plum ice cream that was delicious. The attention of the waiters was very good, so much so that at some point they made me uncomfortable, because I had not finished my glass of water and they were already coming to replenish it, while I thought, well, I also know how to serve myself. So they have high restaurant details with details that do not favor it in the slightest. I think 2 of us paid 110k ARS, without wine and with a single dish that we shared because they are large portions (at least for the 2 of us who dont eat a lot), which made it impossible for us to try several dishes. It seems too expensive for the quality of the food.
review_translated_text: Me veo en la obligacion de mencionar mi vivencia, porque con la gran fama que tiene esperaba mucho mas. No creo que este al nivel de un estrella michelin (comparando con los que veo en ESP). Al llegar nos recibieron con un par de vasos de cava para amenizar la espera (buen detalle, pero a ninguno de los 2 que ibamos nos gustaba el alcohol y no se pregunta ni se ofrecio alternativas). La comida es muy simple, 10k ARS por un disco solido de provoleta no es mi idea de buena presentacion, para mi tendria que ser cremosa o liquida, y poder aprovechar ese pan que te dan al inicio de la cena, poder untarlo. Otro detalle, al inicio de la comida como aperitivo gratis nos dieron unas empadanas que estaban bien, una salsas y un aceite de oliva para untar, pero como en el resto de BA es un aceite sin sabor, sin fuerza, que lo untas con el pan y sigue siendo como comer pan solo. Supongo que esto se arreglaria si se usa aceite mas acido o con mas sabor. Un entrecot de 900g - 70k ARS, me parece una barbaridad para no tener ningun distintivo. La calidad era normal, y al estar con los ventiladores la carne se quedo fria muy rapida. Una idea rapida sin ser chef, sacar la carne en una piedra caliente, lo que hace que mantenga el calor, lo hace reconocible, y el comensal puede hacerlo un poco mas si quiere. O alguna salsa/especias que resalte el sabor. Pedi acompanamiento de papas fritas (creo que fueron otros 10k), y no las volveria a pedir, si que parecian haber sido hechas en 2 cocciones, pero aunque por fuera estaban crujientes, dentro estaban vacias casi completamente. Ademas supongo que por la variedad o el frio al de unos minutos ya habian quedado muy plasticosas y al morderlas no se rompian tan facil, y ya no apetecia comerlas. Otro detalle que no me gusto de ellas es que se habian pasado con la sal, y habian usado sal fina, lo cual no me parecen detalles de un restaurante tan reconocido. El postre la verdad que no puedo hablar demasiado porque ya estabamos llenos, y solo pedimos un helado de ciruela amarilla que estaba rico. La atencion de los camareros fue muy buena, tanto que en algun momento me incomodaban, porque no me habia terminado el vaso de agua y ya estaban viniendo a reponerla, mientras yo pensaba joe que yo tambien se servirme. Asi que tienen detalles de alto restaurante con detalles que no le favorecen lo mas minimo. 2 personas creo que pagamos 110k ARS, sin vino y con un unico plato que compartimos porque son porciones grandes (al menos para nosotros 2 que no somos de comer mucho), lo cual nos imposibilito probar varios platos. Me parece demasiado caro para la calidad de la comida.

review_text: If you dont have reservation, wait in line, while waiting youll get a glass of Proseco, some empanadas, just to ease your waiting time. Food is excellent, we tried all steaks on menu, theyre all delicioso, t-bone is melting, make sure to try wine from Argentina, Malbec. Have grilled cheese and tomato before you attack the meats

If I could give Don Julio more stars I would.  This is simply, one of the best dining experiences you will find anywhere in the world.  Everything was perfect.  If youre in Buenos Aires, do not miss this classic

We didnt have a reservation so we arrived at the restaurant and asked if they would serve us. One of the ladies that was at the door told us to queue as we will be seated in about 10 minutes. We waited patiently for about 20 minutes, watching the big pieces of steak being cooked on the grill and customers with bookings served with bubbles at the door, when the lady approached us saying that they are fully booked and they will have a table in 2 hours. I dont know why she made us wait for about 30 minutes when they knew they were fully booked.
Excellent Argentine grill. I dont know if its the best but it was definitely a great experience.
review_translated_text: Excelente parrilla argentina. No se si la mejor pero sin dudad una gran experiencia

review_text: Excellent, good weather
review_translated_text: Excelente,buen clima

review_text: Lousy. My girlfriend ordered pasta with seafood and they were in bad condition, it went bad right away, I only tried one portion and I didnt like it. The Milanese that they brought me was super basic and they charged me $11,000 (January 2024), in my town I buy 2 kg of pulp for that price. The can of beer $4200, crazy. Good attention.
review_translated_text: Malisimo. Mi novia pidio pastas con mariscos y estaban en mal estado, se descompuso enseguida, yo que solo probe una porcion ya me cayo mal. La milanesa que me trajeron era super basica y me cobraron $11.000 (enero 2024), en mi pueblo compro 2 kg de pulpa por ese precio. La lata de cerveza $4200, una locura. La atencion bien.

review_text: We ate a bite of pasta. Everything is excellent, highly recommended
review_translated_text: Comimos una picada de pastas. Excelente todo, muy muy recomendable

review_text: Excellent pasta!
review_translated_text: Excelentes las pastas!

review_text: Even though the place was very full, the service was good, they served in the time they told us it would take (25-30 minutes), the food was very abundant and tasty although my dads plate felt that it was missing a bit. A little bit of salt, still very delicious. The bread and the sauce at the beginning are also very delicious. The only regular thing is that it was a little hot inside, and today was not a particularly hot day, they could also improve the hygiene of the bathrooms a little. Finally, I recommend il piato de lla familia, impeccable for two people and it is 5 pastas with 5 predetermined sauces, soooo delicious! Honorable mention to Dario, the gentleman who sings, very appropriate and pleasant music!
review_translated_text: A pesar que el local estaba muy lleno, la atencion fue buena, atendieron en el tiempo que nos dijeron que se iban a demorar(25-30 minutos), la comida muy abundante y sabrosa aunque el plato de mi papa considero  que le faltaba un poquitito de sal, aun asi muy rico. El pan y la salsa del comienzo igual muy rica. Lo unico regular es que adentro hacia un poco de calor, y hoy no era un dia particularmente caluroso, tambien podrian mejorar un poquito la higiene de los banos. Por ultimo, les recomiendo il piato de lla familia, impecable para dos personas y son 5 pastas con 5 salsas predeterminadas, muuuuy delicioso! Mencion honrosa a Dario, el caballero que canta, musica muy acorde y agradable!

review_text: Excellent service in everything and a pleasure from those in charge for their cordial and respectful treatment of employees. Highly recommended!!
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion en todo y un placer sus encargados el trato cordial y respetuoso con los empleados. Muy recomendable!!

review_text: The wea is more expensive
review_translated_text: Esta mas cara la wea

review_text: The truth is very nice place. I ordered from the tourist menu. Baked chicken with salad and my girlfriend ordered chicken ravioli with sauce. Good. My chicken is soooo dry as if it had been in the heat for hours or had been cooked yesterday. My girlfriends ravioli were sooo over boiled to the point that it was bland and tasteless. You should put more desire into the food because although it is economical it does not mean that it has to be bad. Thank you. For my part, I do not recommend it.
review_translated_text: La verdad muy lindo lugar.  Yo pedi del menu turista. Pollo al horno con ensalada y mi novia pidio ravioles de pollo con salsa. Bien. Mi pollo esta muuuuu seco como si hubiese estado horas al calor o lo hubiesen cocinado ayer. Los ravioles de mi novia estaban muuuy pasados de hervir a tal punto que quedo insulso y sin sabor. Deberia ponerle mas ganas a la comida porque si bien es economica no quiere decir que tenga que ser mala. Gracias. De mi parte no la recomiendo.

review_text: The food is delicious and the attention is 10.. recommended place to go and eat some delicious pasta.. They served us very quickly and the food arrived normally (fast), the place being very full..

Everything was excellent... on a rainy day it was delicious to share some delicious pasta with the family. Very friendly and cordial service. The prices are acceptable and remain economical for Chileans!
review_translated_text: Excelente todo... en dia de lluvia fue delicioso compartir en familia unas ricas pastas. El servicio muy amable y cordial. Los precios aceptables y siguen siendo economicos para los chilenos!

review_text: Nice Food
review_translated_text: Rica  comida

review_text: They have gluten-free options on the menu, including pastas. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Dietary restrictions: Food without TACC
review_translated_text: Poseen opciones sin gluten en el menu, incluidas las pastas. El personal es muy servicial y amable. Dietary restrictions: Comida sin TACC

review_text: We waited almost two hours to eat, it was eternal. And when they brought it, the tasting was a mixture of pasta. They could put a little sign or something to more or less know what we are eating and what sauces they are. All very little. Its not worth the wait or the food. Three waters, the tasting for two and an ice cream of two tastes 56 thousand Argentines. Cloth napkins are not the truth no matter how fi fi they are
review_translated_text: Esperamos casi dos horas para comer fue eterno. Y cuando trajeron era un rejunte de pastas la degustacion. Podrian ponerle un cartelito o algo para mas o menos saber que estamos comiendo y que salsas son. Todo muy poquito. No lo vale ni la espera ni la comida. Tres aguas, la degustacion para dos y un helado de dos gustos 56mil argentinos. Servilletas de tela no da la verdad por mas fi fi que sea

review_text: Appalling! I reserved a table for my 60th birthday and since we entered they rushed us to order/eat, we asked them to change the table since they gave us a table next to the bathroom (I made the reservation a month in advance) and they reluctantly let us They said they were insistent! I asked for a baby chair and they never brought it to me. The arrogant waiter, treating customers poorly in addition to being a very noisy place, far from what it seems. A shame, it looked like it would be a nice experience.
review_translated_text: Pesimo! Reserve una mesa por cumpleanos Ndeg60 y desde que entramos nos apuraban para pedir/comer, les pedimos el cambio de mesa ya que nos dieron una mesa al lado del bano (hice la reserva con un mes de anticipacion) y de mala gana nos dijeron que insistentes! Pedi una silla para bebes y nunca me la trajeron. El mozo prepotente, tratando mal a los clientes ademas de ser un lugar muy bullicioso, lejos muy lejos de ser lo que parece. Una lastima, pintaba ser una linda experiencia.

review_text: The pastas are delicious and abundant, the caipi are very good and the bread is divine! The attention was very good except for the one who greets you at the entrance, beyond him, the waiter was super friendly in everything.
review_translated_text: Las pastas son riquisimas y abundantes, las caipi son muy buenas y el pancito divino! La atencion fue muy buena a excepcion del que te recibe en la entrada, pasando de el, el mozo fue super amable en todo.

review_text: Beautiful place and delicious dishes.
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar y platos riquisimos.

review_text: Very nice atmosphere, good and abundant food, excellent service and good price-quality ratio!
review_translated_text: Ambientacion muy linda, buena y abundante comida, excelente atencion y buena relacion precio-calidad!

review_text: I loved the atmosphere and the food is wonderful! I totally recommend going! The only observation I have is that the bathroom could be cleaner.
review_translated_text: Me encanto el ambiente y la comida es una cosa maravillosa! Recomiendo ir completamente! La unica observacion que tengo es que el bano podria estar mas limpio.

review_text: The food is AMAZING. I tried the pumpkin malfatti with four cheese sauce and its a one-way trip. The only thing that didnt really suit me was the gin - like all the drinks they come in a glass thats a bit small for my taste and the flavor is not a 10. Likewise, its obviously a pasta place and its Good to accompany it with wine or something else. Vegetarian options: Several options.
review_translated_text: La comida es INCREIBLE. Probe los malfatti de calabaza con salsa cuatro quesos y es un camino de ida. Lo unico que no me termino de cerrar fue el gin - al igual que todos los  tragos  vienen en una copa un poco chica para mi gusto y el sabor no es un 10. De igual manera, obviamente es un lugar de pastas y esta bueno acompanarlo con vino o con otra cosa. Vegetarian options: Varias opciones.

review_text: Very hot, the air does not work and the food arrived lukewarm.
review_translated_text: Mucho calor no funcionan los aires y la comida llego tibia

review_text: The service was very attentive and pleasant and the room is very well decorated. However, the pasta is not very good: overcooked and the sauces have an artificial flavor. Maybe other dishes are better.
review_translated_text: El servicio fue muy atento y agradable y el salon esta muy bien ambientado. Sin embargo la pasta no es muy buena: muy cocinada y las salsas con un sabor artificial. Quizas otros platos estan mejor.

review_text: The Italian dishes are delicious, the service is excellent and the setting is really very creative. Tremendous experience; If you have the chance, dont miss out.
review_translated_text: Los platos italianos son riquisimos, la atencion excelente y la ambientacion realmente muy creativa. Tremenda experiencia; si tienen la posibilidad, no dejen de ir.

review_text: The food is good, the portions are good and everything is delicious, but the man who greets you with a Managers sign when you arrive is unpresentable, they cannot put a person who you have to wait for him to finish talking on his cell phone and then with bad manners he tells you where the table is and to make matters worse when we ask about the unbearable heat that was inside the restaurant, he tells us just like that, it doesnt work. We ended up having dinner on the sidewalk. That arrogant person scares people away. A shame.
review_translated_text: La comida es buena, las porciones estan bien y todo rico, pero el senor que te recibe con cartel de Gerente al llegar, impresentable, no pueden poner a una persona que tenes que esperar a que el termine de hablar por su celular para luego con malos modos te dice donde esta la mesa y para colmo al consultar por el calor insoportable que hacia dentro del restaurant , nos dice asi sueltito, no funciona. Terminamos cenando en la vereda. Esa persona soberbia espanta a la gente. Una lastima.

review_text: To begin with, we went early without a reservation and they gave us a whole explanation of why we had to reserve but then they gave us a table. It was Sunday at eight at night and there was no one in the place. Taking that out, the waiters attention was very attentive. The MEDIOCRE AND OVERRATED food, nothing out of this world. We ordered ham and cheese sorrentinos; others with chicken, spinach and parmesan; others of salmon and some Ferro rifles, everything went well. The only thing that was good was the Burrata. The place didnt seem very clean, the glasses they gave you to drink were unpresentable, a shame really. To make matters worse, when we asked to take away what was left on the plates, they divided it into tiny trays. The prices are not worth it at all with the flavor, everything is average
review_translated_text: Para empezar, fuimos temprano sin reserva y nos dieron toda una explicacion de porque teniamos que reservar pero despues nos dieron una mesa. Era domingo a las ocho de la noche y no habia nadie en el lugar. Sacando eso, la atencion del mozo fue muy atenta. La comida MEDIOCRE Y SOBREVALORADA, nada de otro mundo. Pedimos sorrentinos de jamon y queso; otros de pollo, espinaca y parmesano; otros de salmon y unos fusiles al Ferro, todo zafaba. Lo unico que estaba bueno era la Burrata. El lugar no parecia muy limpio, los vasos que te daban para tomar eran impresentables, una verguenza la verdad. Para colmo, cuando pedimos para llevar lo que habia sobrado de los platos, nos lo dividieron en bandejas diminutas. No lo vale para nada los precios con el sabor, todo medio pelo

review_text: Normally, the pastas are abundant but for an Italian restaurant it still lacks a lot. The atmosphere is nice
review_translated_text: Normal, las pastas son abundantes pero para ser un restaurante italiano todavia le falta mucho. El ambiente es agradable

review_text: Nothing out of this world, a lot of heat inside, three-star service
review_translated_text: Nada de otro mundo , mucho calor adentro , el servicio tres estrellas

review_text: Excellent attention. Good food. Bathrooms a little dirty
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion. Buena comida. Banos un poco sucios

review_text: Very good! Great value for money! We received a basket of warm bread. Very attentive waiters. Two dishes, 2 soft drinks, 1 water and 1 glass of wine R$170 with tip
review_translated_text: Muito bom! Otimo custo beneficio ! Recebemos uma cesta de paes quentinhos. Garcons muito atenciosos. Dois pratos , 2 refri , 1 agua e 1 taca de vinho R$170 com a gorjeta

review_text: Buenos Aires classic in Microcentro. Good and fast service.
review_translated_text: Clasico de buenos aires en Microcentro. Buen servicio y rapido.

review_text: Very nice place, excellent service. The place is not very nice, very old, to go to the bathroom you have to go down stairs that look like something out of a horror movie.
review_translated_text: Muy lindo lugar, excelente atencion. No es muy lindo el lugar, muy viejo, para ir al bano hay que bajar por unas escaleras que parecen de pelicula de terror.

review_text: As always excellent service
review_translated_text: Como siempre excelente atencion

review_text: Expensive....nothing special
review_translated_text: Caro....nada especial

review_text: High price, normal portions and the taste is nothing out of this world, I would not return
review_translated_text: Precio alto, porciones normales y el sabor no es nada del otro mundo, no volveria

review_text: I loved the place, beautiful atmosphere, very attentive and the phenomenal pasta, you will not regret coming... A must in Buenos Aires
review_translated_text: Me encanto el lugar, hermoso ambiente, muy atentos y las pastas fenomenales, no se arrepentiran de venir... Un imperdible en Buenos Aires

review_text: Really delicious food, exquisite flavors, very rich mix of flavors and smells that immerse you in the richest of Argentine culture and its mix.
review_translated_text: Comida realmente rica, sabores exquisitos muy rica la mezcla de sabores olores que te sumergen en lo mas  rico de la cultura argentina y su mezcla.

review_text: Ten points the best is the ravioli!
review_translated_text: Diez puntos lo mejor son los ravioles!

review_text: On the fifth day of the trip, I confess that I was already stuffed with meat and sweets... and going to Brococolino was a great choice... Lots of options, well served portion and price is not too high.. We went without reservation...it was worth it... Hug.
review_translated_text: No quinto dia de viagem confesso que ja estava empanturrado de carne e doce...e ir no Brococolino foi uma otima escolha.. Muitas opcoes, porcao bem servida e preco nao e muito alto.. Fomos sem reserva..valeu a pena... Abraco.

review_text: Went to this restaurant recommended by a friend. The food is reasonable, but I found it expensive as the portion size barely serves 1 person. We ordered spaghetti bolognese and tagliatelle in pesto sauce with mushrooms. The house wine is good. The food came within 1 minute and we didnt have time to eat the starters. I dont like this type of service.
review_translated_text: Foi a este restaurante recomendado por uma amiga. A comida e razoavel, porem achei caro pois o tamanho da porcao serve mal 1 pessoa. Pedimos um espaguete a bolonhesa e um talharim ao molho pesto com cogumelos. O vinho da casa e bom. A comida veio em 1 minuto e nao tivemos tempo de comer as entradas. Este tipo de atendimento nao me agrada.

review_text: Excellent place, to eat exquisite pasta, with a very good atmosphere
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, para comer unas exquisitas pastas, con muy buen ambiente

review_text: To begin, we were served by the young, gray-haired waiter (I describe him because I did not ask his name), who gave us a great introduction and made great recommendations. I begin to highlight the attention, since it was excellent, as well as the kitchen times, they were expeditious, everything arrived hot and quickly (we ate at 3:00 p.m.). On the other hand, he highlighted the quality of the products, I started with something as simple as the panera, which in many places it is customary to carry old things (like pizzas or foccaccias) and they are harder than reality, in this case, it was incredible, All the breads in the bread basket were warm, tender and delicious. Now lets get to the menu, we ordered an appetizer, an eggplant parmesan, and it was, as Messi says, spectacular, with its sauce, the gratin parmesan cheese, a tremendous desire to clean the plate (which I did). Well, now lets get to the main course, some black ribbons with cream and seafood (of which they were full, without skimping), amazing, with nothing more to add. All of this was ordered individually, both the starter and the main course, and both were to share (recommendation of the waiter). To accompany, a Ferrer cabernet wine. And to close with a flourish, a tiramisu and a chocolate volcano with ice cream. They gave us a shot of lemonchelo. Geniuses. Well, we spent $65,000.
review_translated_text: Para comenzar, nos atendio el mozo joven y canoso (lo describo porque no le pregunte el nombre), el cual nos realizo una gran introduccion y nos realizo grandes recomendaciones. Empiezo a destacar la atencion, ya que fue excelente, como asi tambien los tiempos de la cocina, fueron expeditos, todo llego caliente y en forma rapida (comimos a las 15hs). Por otro lado destaco las calidad de los productos, arranco con algo tan simple como la panera, la cual en muchos lugares se estila llevar cosas viejas (como pizzas o foccaccias) y son mas duras que la realidad, en este caso, fue increible, todos los panificados de la panera estaban calentitos, tiernos y riquisimosssss. Ahora vamos con la carta, pedimos una entrada, una berenjena a la parmesana, y era, como dice Messi, espectacula, con su salsa, el queso parmesano gratinado, tremendas ganas de limpiar el plato (lo cual hice). Bueno, ahora vamos con el plato principal, unas cintas negras con crema y frutos de mar (de los cuales estaban repletos, sin escatimar), alucinantes, sin mas que agregar. Todo esto, se pidio por unidad, tanto la entrada y el plato principal, y ambos fueron para compartir (recomendacion del mozo). Para acompanar, un vino Ferrer cabernet. Y para cerrar con broche de oro, un tiramisu y un volcan de chocolate con helado. Nos regalaron un shot de lemonchelo. Genios. Bueno, gastamos $65.000.

review_text: It says it is open on Sunday, we went at 6:00 p.m. and it is closed
review_translated_text: Dice que esta abierto el domingo, fuimos a las 18:00 y se encuentra cerrado

review_text: Excellent service. Kindness in attention. We arrived a little late for lunch and they did their best, the waiter assigned to our table was very kind even down to the details. Reasonable prices. Ideal to go to business meetings or as a family with kids like we did. Highly recommended. Kid-friendliness: They adapt the menu to what was requested for children, the boys were not used to certain details of the menu. Very friendly. Recommendable.
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio. Amabilidad en la atencion. Llegamos un poco tarde para almorzar y se esmeraron, el mozo asignado a nuestra mesa fue muy gentil hasta en los detalles. Precios razonables. Ideal para ir en reuniones de negocios o en familia con chicos como lo hicimos nosotros. Muy recomendable. Kid-friendliness: Adaptan el menu a lo solicitado para ninos, los chicos no estaban acostumbrados a ciertos detalles del menu. Muy amables. Recomendable.

review_text: Very good food. I recommend pacu disheveled grilled
review_translated_text: Muy buena comida Recomiendo pacu despeinado grillado

review_text: Excellent service and quality-price ratio. All the plans we tried were very good.

The place is nice, the waiter is correct, I paid 14 thousand for the rib, half a galeto 6700 thousand, 2 chorizo 3200, lamb empanada 900, the Russian salad poorly seasoned, fried cassava from the house tasteless without flavour, the orange juice was not 100 % was mixed with water it came out to me 5400, the cash payment told you 10% discount, but it didnt give me a discount because the waiter told me, that they make some customers, he asked me without the receipt I wanted to consume final, there I noticed that Something strange was happening, I didnt complain because I didnt want the waiter to lose his job, since they earn little so they are on the lookout for any strange move.
review_translated_text: El lugar es lindo , el mozo correcto  la costilla pague 14 mil , medio galeto 6700 mil , 2 chorizo 3200 , empanada de cordero 900 , la ensalada rusa mal condimentada , mandioca frita de la casa desabrida sin sabor, el jugo de naranja no era 100 % estaba mezclado con agua me salio 5400 , el pago al contado te decia 10 % de descuento, pero a mi no me hizo porque el mozo me dijo, que ellos hacen algunos clientes, me pregunto sin la boleta queria consumir final, hay note que pasaba algo extrano, no me queje porque no queria que mozo pierda su trabajo, de por si ganan poco por eso estan al acecho de cualquier movida rara .

review_text: Excellent restaurant
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante

review_text: Excellent food, wonderful meat! The environment isnt even mentioned.
review_translated_text: Excelente comida, carne, maravilhosa! O ambiente, nem se fala.

review_text: Great. Dont miss out.
review_translated_text: Excelente. Nao deixe de conhecer.

review_text: Good service, excellent portions of the dishes. They allowed us to be with our pet, they brought him water
review_translated_text: Buen servicio, excelente las porciones de los platos. Nos permitieron estar con nuestra mascota, le trajeron agua

review_text: Small place. No parking. By reservation only. The attention, deplorable. Small portions at very high values. I will not come back

The two pasta dishes we tried were incredible. We went on a Friday night without a reservation but we got a place at the bar as soon as we arrived. Very good service, very fast and the place is very nice. recommendable
review_translated_text: Increibles los dos platos de pasta que probamos. Fuimos un Viernes a la noche sin reserva pero conseguimos lugar en la barra apenas llegamos. Muy buena atencion, muy rapido y el lugar es muy lindo. Recomendable

review_text: The amenities are rich For a pasta place and they charge you for bread, I think the service is bad.
Such a nice restaurant
Very good experience!
review_translated_text: Muy buena experiencia!

review_text: The Michelin guide did not lie when it recommended them for their price/quality ratio. Excellent pasta and great attention.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the support and for the TREMENDOUS PHOTOS!
review_translated_text: La guia Michelin no mintio cuando los recomendo por su relacion precio/calidad. Excelentes pastas y la atencion un mil.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias x el apoyo y por TREMENDAS FOTOS!

review_text: We ordered pesto with pistachio that was delicious, and a carbonara that came with a cream with egg and not the classic carbonara as I had thought. The attention of the girls was good, the starter with fig and the bread are delicious. The tables seemed very close to me due to the small atmosphere, which is uncomfortable to chat at times.
review_translated_text: Nos pedirmos pesto con pistacho que estaba rico, y un a la carbonara que vino una crema con huevo y no carbonara clasico como habia pensado. La atencion de las mozas fue buena, la entrada con higo y el pan son deliciosas. Las mesas me parecieron muy pegadas por el almbiente ser chico, lo que es incomodo para charlar en algunos momentos.

review_text: Excellent pasta. Good prices. The Michelin Bib Gourmand is very well placed. There is variety and quality. I smelled the scent of sage while I ate some exquisite pasta. Well combined. I will be back.
Best lasagna I ve ever had

Top quality pasta! We ate some taglionlini with pesto and some cavatelli with the norm that broke it. Although the place is a bit tight inside, we had excellent attention from the waiter Santi and we felt at home. We would return 10 times more
review_translated_text: Pastas de primera calidad! Comimos unos taglionlini al pesto y unos cavatelli a la norma que la rompieron. Si bien adentro el lugar es un poco apretado tuvimos una atencion excelente del mozo Santi y nos sentimos como en casa.  Volveriamos 10 veces mas

review_text: You eat a delicious lasagna there. We leave satisfied
review_translated_text: Se come una rica lasagna alli.  Salimos satisfechos

response_from_owner_text: Dear Emilio Erro, We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at our restaurant. At Sagardi Argentina, we strive to provide unforgettable moments, and your positive review helps us continue like this. Thank you for choosing us. Kind regards, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimado Emilio Erro, Agradecemos sinceramente por tomarte el tiempo de compartir tu experiencia en nuestro restaurante. En Sagardi Argentina, nos esforzamos por brindar momentos inolvidable, y tu resena positiva nos ayuda a continuar asi. Gracias por elegirnos. Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

response_from_owner_text: Hello, Ambrossina Ok, Thank you for rating your experience at Sagardi Argentina. This helps us continue working with passion and dedication. We hope to see you soon in our restaurant. Greetings, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, Ambrossina Ok, Gracias por puntuar tu experiencia en Sagardi Argentina. Esto nos ayuda a continuar trabajando con pasion y dedicacion. !Esperamos verte pronto en nuestro resturante. Saludos, Grupo Sagardi

response_from_owner_text: Hello, Claudia Barreto, Thank you for rating your experience at Sagardi Argentina. This helps us continue working with passion and dedication. We hope to see you soon in our restaurant. Greetings, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, claudia barreto, Gracias por puntuar tu experiencia en Sagardi Argentina. Esto nos ayuda a continuar trabajando con pasion y dedicacion. !Esperamos verte pronto en nuestro resturante. Saludos, Grupo Sagardi
