review_text: I loved. I enjoyed the tapas with a group of friends, everything was delicious and very varied. Correct price quality. I come back.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Marisa Panetta, Thank you for your wonderful comments! We love to know that you enjoyed your experience at Sagardi Argentina. We look forward to welcoming you again and continuing to share extraordinary moments with you. Sincerely, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Me encanto. Disfrute de las tapas con un grupo de amigas, todo riquisimo y muy variado. Calidad precio correcta. Vuelvo.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Querido Marisa Panetta, !Gracias por tus maravillosos comentarios! Nos encanta saber que disfrutaste de tu experiencia en Sagardi Argentina. Deseamos recibirte nuevamente y seguir compartiendo momentos extraordinarios contigo. Atentamente, Grupo Sagardi

response_from_owner_text: Hello Gustavo Dagno! Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Sagardi Argentina. At Grupo Sagardi, we are dedicated to providing experiences that meet and exceed our customers expectations, and your review encourages us to continue doing so with passion. Thank you for choosing us and until next time! Kind regards, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: !Hola Gustavo Dagno! Gracias por compartir tu experiencia positiva en Sagardi Argentina. En Grupo Sagardi, nos dedicamos a proporcionar experiencias que cumplan y superen las expectativas de nuestros clientes, y tu resena nos impulsa a seguir haciendolo con pasion. !Gracias por elegirnos y hasta la proxima! Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Excellent attention and service in a warm and relaxed atmosphere!!!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Analia Perez, Thank you very much for your warm words. We are excited to know that we have lived up to your expectations. On behalf of the entire Sagardi Argentina team, we appreciate the time you have dedicated to evaluating us positively. All the best, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion y servicio en un ambiente calido y distendido!!!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, Analia Perez, Muchisimas gracias por tus calidas palabras. Nos entusiasma saber que hemos estado a la altura de tus espectativas. De parte de todo el equipo de Sagardi Argentina agradecemos el tiempo que has dedicado en valorarnos positivamente. Un saludo, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Very bad experience with bigbox, at first the service was very good, but then it deteriorated noticeably, waiters were overwhelmed, the wine list in QR did not work, they never offered alternatives and the waiter did not appear at the table for around 1 hour. very little food for two people, two small pinchos, two tiny txistorras, 1 starter and 1 single plate to share between two people.... it included 1 glass of wine per person, but they didnt have rose... and it didnt include water. In short, a taste of little for what the sagardi brand represents...
review_translated_text: Muy mala experiencia con bigbox, al principio la atencion fue muy buena, pero luego fue desmejorando llamativamente, mozos sobrepasados, la carta de vino en QR no funcionaba, nunca ofrecieron alternativas y el mozo no aparecio por la mesa por alrededor de 1 hora. muy poca comida para dos personas, dos pinchos chicos, dos txistorras minusculas, 1 entrada y 1 solo plato para compartir entre dos personas.... incluia 1 copa de vino por persona, pero rosado no tenian... y no incluia agua.. en fin, sabor a poco por lo que representa la marca sagardi...

review_text: Delicious tapas and cocktails with welcoming and  attentive staff. Definitely worth it.
response_from_owner_text: Hello David Lih, We are happy to know that your experience with us was positive and that you enjoyed our service and cuisine. At Sagardi Argentina, we continually strive to offer exceptional experiences to our customers, and your positive review motivates us to continue working with dedication and passion. We appreciate your support and hope to see you again soon at our location. Thank you again and see you next time! Sincerely, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola David Lih, Nos alegra saber que tu experiencia con nosotros fue positiva y que disfrutaste de nuestro servicio y gastronomia. En Sagardi Argentina, nos esforzamos continuamente por ofrecer experiencias excepcionales a nuestros clientes, y tu resena positiva nos motiva a seguir trabajando con dedicacion y pasion. Agradecemos tu apoyo y esperamos volver a verte pronto en nuestro local. !Gracias de nuevo y hasta la proxima! Atentamente, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Everything is very good!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Juan Alfaro! Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Sagardi Argentina. At Grupo Sagardi, we are dedicated to providing experiences that meet and exceed our customers expectations, and your review encourages us to continue doing so with passion. Thank you for choosing us and until next time! Kind regards, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Muy bueno todo!
response_from_owner_translated_text: !Hola Juan Alfaro! Gracias por compartir tu experiencia positiva en Sagardi Argentina. En Grupo Sagardi, nos dedicamos a proporcionar experiencias que cumplan y superen las expectativas de nuestros clientes, y tu resena nos impulsa a seguir haciendolo con pasion. !Gracias por elegirnos y hasta la proxima! Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: It is a gem, a spectacular place, worth visiting. In my case I already went twice, The first time in the lounge atmosphere to order a la carte, I ordered the cheeks, such good meat! , And this time we went to the tapas bar type atmosphere... Excellent! Tapas of all types, hot and cold, all very delicious, I recommend the smoked salmon ones. Tips for the tapas bar, go slowly, try a lot and enjoy calmly, accompany it with a good conversation and a glass of wine, everything is very delicious and eating quickly it is easy to go on a budget hehe
response_from_owner_text: Dear Ricardo Escobar, Thank you for your wonderful comments! We love to know that you enjoyed your experience at Sagardi Argentina. We look forward to welcoming you again and continuing to share extraordinary moments with you. Sincerely, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Es una joya un lugar espectacular, digno de visitar. En mi caso ya fui dos veces, la primera al ambiente de salon para pedir a la carta pedi las carrilleras que carne tan buena! , Y esta vez fuimos al ambiente tipo bar de tapas... Excelente! Tapas de todo tipos frias y calient s todas muy ricas, recomiendo las de salmon ahumado. Consejos para el bar de tapas, ir de apoco probar mucho y disfrutar con tranquilidad, acompanar con una buena conversacion y una copa de vino, es muy rico todo y comiendo rapido es facil irte de presupuesto jeje
response_from_owner_translated_text: Querido Ricardo Escobar, !Gracias por tus maravillosos comentarios! Nos encanta saber que disfrutaste de tu experiencia en Sagardi Argentina. Deseamos recibirte nuevamente y seguir compartiendo momentos extraordinarios contigo. Atentamente, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Food
response_from_owner_text: Hello Laura Perino, Thank you very much for your warm words. We are excited to know that we have lived up to your expectations. On behalf of the entire Sagardi Argentina team, we appreciate the time you have dedicated to evaluating us positively. All the best, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, Laura Perino, Muchisimas gracias por tus calidas palabras. Nos entusiasma saber que hemos estado a la altura de tus espectativas. De parte de todo el equipo de Sagardi Argentina agradecemos el tiempo que has dedicado en valorarnos positivamente. Un saludo, Grupo Sagardi

response_from_owner_text: Dear Jose Chazo, We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience at our restaurant. At Sagardi Argentina, we strive to provide unforgettable moments, and your positive review helps us continue like this. Thank you for choosing us. Kind regards, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimado Jose Chazo, Agradecemos sinceramente por tomarte el tiempo de compartir tu experiencia en nuestro restaurante. En Sagardi Argentina, nos esforzamos por brindar momentos inolvidable, y tu resena positiva nos ayuda a continuar asi. Gracias por elegirnos. Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: I will not return, very disappointing.

An ideal place to eat very good Basque food. The specialty is old cow txuleton and pinchos, which have an immeasurable variety. Especially notable are those with raw ham, although they are all truly recommended, original and tasty. The txuleton deserves a separate chapter, a large piece of bone-in meat served cooked point bleu. An exquisiteness. You can go to tapas, in the front, or to dinner, in the back room, which would deserve an adjustment in the setting.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Rod Quevedo! Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Sagardi Argentina. At Grupo Sagardi, we are dedicated to providing experiences that meet and exceed our customers expectations, and your review encourages us to continue doing so with passion. Thank you for choosing us and until next time! Kind regards, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Un lugar ideal para comer muy buena comida vasca. La especialidad es el txuleton de vaca vieja y los pinchos, que tienen una variedad inconmensurable. Especialmente destacables aquellos con jamon crudo, aunque son todos verdaderamente recomendables, originales y sabrosos. Capitulo aparte merece el txuleton, una gran pieza de carne con hueso servida al punto bleu. Una exquisitez. Se puede ir a tapear, en la parte delantera, o a cenar, en el salon de atras, que mereceria un ajuste en la ambientacion.
response_from_owner_translated_text: !Hola Rod Quevedo! Gracias por compartir tu experiencia positiva en Sagardi Argentina. En Grupo Sagardi, nos dedicamos a proporcionar experiencias que cumplan y superen las expectativas de nuestros clientes, y tu resena nos impulsa a seguir haciendolo con pasion. !Gracias por elegirnos y hasta la proxima! Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Very good skewers!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Armando Carradore! Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Sagardi Argentina. At Grupo Sagardi, we are dedicated to providing experiences that meet and exceed our customers expectations, and your review encourages us to continue doing so with passion. Thank you for choosing us and until next time! Kind regards, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Pinchos muy buenos!
response_from_owner_translated_text: !Hola Armando Carradore! Gracias por compartir tu experiencia positiva en Sagardi Argentina. En Grupo Sagardi, nos dedicamos a proporcionar experiencias que cumplan y superen las expectativas de nuestros clientes, y tu resena nos impulsa a seguir haciendolo con pasion. !Gracias por elegirnos y hasta la proxima! Saludos cordiales, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Excellent skewers and the unmissable steak! The House wines are very good!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Javier Santos, We are happy to know that your experience with us was positive and that you enjoyed our service and cuisine. At Sagardi Argentina, we continually strive to offer exceptional experiences to our customers, and your positive review motivates us to continue working with dedication and passion. We appreciate your support and hope to see you again soon at our location. Thank you again and see you next time! Sincerely, Sagardi Group
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola Javier Santos, Nos alegra saber que tu experiencia con nosotros fue positiva y que disfrutaste de nuestro servicio y gastronomia. En Sagardi Argentina, nos esforzamos continuamente por ofrecer experiencias excepcionales a nuestros clientes, y tu resena positiva nos motiva a seguir trabajando con dedicacion y pasion. Agradecemos tu apoyo y esperamos volver a verte pronto en nuestro local. !Gracias de nuevo y hasta la proxima! Atentamente, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Its a cool place. Good quality and excellent service
response_from_owner_text: Hello, Diego G. Comercio, Thank you very much for your warm words. We are excited to know that we have lived up to your expectations. On behalf of the entire Sagardi Argentina team, we appreciate the time you have dedicated to evaluating us positively. All the best, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Es un lugar con onda. De buena calidad y con excelente atencion
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, Diego G. Comercio, Muchisimas gracias por tus calidas palabras. Nos entusiasma saber que hemos estado a la altura de tus espectativas. De parte de todo el equipo de Sagardi Argentina agradecemos el tiempo que has dedicado en valorarnos positivamente. Un saludo, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: Very good place, excellent cheek and tortilla. The nougat mousse is a bomb. Excellent service (Sergio was the waiters name, out of 10)
response_from_owner_text: Hello, Eduardo Schenone, Thank you very much for your warm words. We are excited to know that we have lived up to your expectations. On behalf of the entire Sagardi Argentina team, we appreciate the time you have dedicated to evaluating us positively. All the best, Sagardi Group
review_translated_text: Muy bien el lugar, excelente carrillera y tortilla. El mousse de turron es una bomba. Excelente servicio (Sergio se llamaba el camarero, de 10)
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola, eduardo schenone, Muchisimas gracias por tus calidas palabras. Nos entusiasma saber que hemos estado a la altura de tus espectativas. De parte de todo el equipo de Sagardi Argentina agradecemos el tiempo que has dedicado en valorarnos positivamente. Un saludo, Grupo Sagardi

review_text: If you are celiac or have dietary restrictions and you love Italian food, you have to visit this place, the flavors and proposals are magnificent. They dont have delivery but they do have take away. Vegetarian options: There is a vegan option Dietary restrictions: Celiacs, TACC Free, Gluten Free.
review_translated_text: Si eres celiaco o tienes restricciones de dieta y te encanta la comida italiana tienes que conocer este lugar, los sabores y propuestas son magnificas. No tienen delivery pero si tienen take away. Vegetarian options: Existe una opcion vegana Dietary restrictions: Celiacos, Sin TACC, Sin Gluten.

review_text: On Wednesday I went to lunch with my partner. We spent 43 thousand pesos on 2 dishes of pasta, a lemonade and a Coca-Cola. The pasta I ordered was with meatballs but they had hard pieces that looked like pebbles and the pasta was hard (not hot) and seemed raw. So good money wasted.
review_translated_text: El miercoles fui a comer con mi pareja. Gastamos 43 mil pesos en 2 platos de pasta, una limonada y una Coca-Cola. La pasta que pedi era con albondigas pero tenian pedazos duros que parecian piedritas y la pasta estaba dura (no ardente) parecia cruda. Asi que bueno dinero mal gastado.

review_text: It is perfect! Nothing to improve. I love him. Of course, it needs more vegan variety.
All that is good!
review_translated_text: Todo lo que esta bien !

review_text: I went here for dinner with high expectations after reading the reviews. Unfortunately, the food was terrible and totally overpriced, the Lasagne was 14,900 (prices are not on the menu) and is probably the worst Lasagne Ive ever eaten. It had nothing to do with a Bolognese Lasagne. Would not go back and cant recommend this place at all.

Everything excellent. My lunch and dinner would be there every day   The pastas are one tastier than the other. Its quality and flavors are 99% the same as Cucina Paradiso Soho. I love that it is an all gluten free option. My favorite: Cappelacci di zucca alla mantovana
Friendly staff. I ate a slice of beef and I was satisfied. Excellent coffee like in Italy. I would definitely go back
review_translated_text: Personale gentile. Ho mangiato una tagliata di manzo e mi ha soddisfatto. Ottimo caffe come in Italia.  Ci ritornerei sicuramente

review_text: Typical Italian
review_translated_text: Tipico Italiano

review_text: I ordered the only vegan option: noodles with pesto. When I tried it it had a very bitter taste. I ask and they tell me that they make the pesto with RUCULA because they make the one with basil with cheese. The worst pesto I ever tried in my life.
review_translated_text: Pedi la unica opcion vegana: fideos con pesto. Cuando lo pruebo tenia un sabor muy amargo. Pregunto y me dicen que el pesto lo hacen con RUCULA porque el que tiene albahaca lo preparan con queso. El peor pesto que probe en mi vida.

review_text: Good food. Prices are not listed on the menu!!
review_translated_text: Buena comida. En la carta del menu no figuran los precios!!

review_text: Incredible food. Very good service.
review_translated_text: Increible comida. Muy buen servicio.

review_text: Amazing food and great service

Excessively expensive, the bathroom was from a service station, (Arevalo) everything was very disproportionate in price compared to other large places. The wine list, very simple and very expensive. A shame, its not worth what they ask for on the menu.
review_translated_text: Excesivamente caro, el bano era de una estacion de servicio, (Arevalo) todo muy desproporcionado en precios respecto otros grandes lugares. La carta de vinos, muy simple y muy cara. Una pena, no vale lo que piden en la carta.

review_text: Classic restaurant, without much  fru fru . The waitresses, although always very busy, are very attentive and friendly. The food is well served and tasty, and the price is very good. I recommend!
review_translated_text: Restaurante classico, sem muito  fru fru . As garconetes, embora sempre muito ocupadas, dao muita atencao e sao simpaticas. A comida e bem servida e saborosa, e o preco e muito bom. Recomendo!

review_text: The waitress (super nice) recommended ribeye and it was amazing! Juicy, tender, delicious. Great experience. Would definitely go again.
Excellent restaurant... Typical Argentine food. Good Prices. Attentive staff. Black pudding, chorizos, empanadas...
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurant... Comida tipica argentina. Precios Buenos. Personal atento. Morcilla, chorizos, empanadas..

review_text: Simple atmosphere and very friendly service. Tender and tasty fillet (about 350 g) with a side of potatoes. Good Argentine wines with prices - for us Europeans - modest. You can pay by credit card, they do not accept reservations. Two can have a (really good) dinner for around  40! Highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Ambiente semplice e servizio molto cordiale. Filetto tenero e saporito (circa 350 gr) con contorno di patate. Buoni vini argentini con prezzi - per noi europei - modici. Si puo pagare con carta di credito, non accettano prenotazioni. In due si cena (proprio bene) con 40  circa! Consigliatissimo.

review_text: Fantastic!!!!
review_translated_text: Fantastico!!!!

review_text: Excellent service and very good food.
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio y la comida muy buena.

review_text: Is incredible!!! The quality of the food is spectacular, they are fast, friendly  they have it all! I want to highlight the excellent staff, great professionals with large print!

My go-to parrilla whenever Im in Buenos Aires. Mouthwatering tender steak they cut for you with a spoon, and you can taste the fire grill from it. The price is really good for a pretty cental place. I normally order the Ojo de Bife with fried eggs and salad, and it has never let me down.
Still life of Buenos Aires. Very good cuts of meat. Good cuisine. According price and quality
review_translated_text: Bodegon de Buenos Aires . Muy buenos cortes de carne . Buena cocina . Acorde precio y calidad

review_text: We had lunch at around 1pm on a Monday, we didnt wait in line. We were very well taken care of. We ordered a rare steak ojo and they got the meat right. Excellent value for money! Unsophisticated atmosphere, with great quality food! I recommend!
Great steak, incredibly cheap. Place was packed both times we went so I don t understand why they don t raise their prices, but I didn t complain.
The waiters are excellent. This time Oscar attended to me. A phenomenon!!!
review_translated_text: Los mozos son excelentes.  Esta vez me atendio Oscar. Un fenomeno!!!

review_text: Its okay, its just that the portions are small... Goulash is a strange dish for those who have never eaten it. The cuts of meat are very small... And youre really like its very little.
review_translated_text: Esta bien, solo que las porciones son pequenas... El goulash para quien nunca lo ha comido es raro este plato.. Los cortes de carne muy reducidos... Y de verdad quedas como es muy poquito..

review_text: They took us to dinner with people who had already attended with a very good impression, today was disastrous for everyone. For the price it was get up and leave with the starter and thats it. The regular empanadas, the off-season kidney sauce, the smoked deer ravioli were nothing, bland like the pink sauce they suggested... The sheep stew was edible and the goulash was a monumental joke. Seeing our discontent, they gave us a dessert and we knew beforehand it would be subtracted. By the value that they use frozen red fruits you get an idea of how they underestimate the diner. For the price, the place has plenty of atmosphere and lacks a lot of cuisine. To close the liqueurs... Alcohol with coloring.
review_translated_text: Nos llevaron a cenar gente que ya habia concurrido con muy buena impresion, hoy fue nefasto para todos. Por el precio era levantarse e irse con el entrante y listo. Las empanadas reguleras, la salsa de los rinones fuera de punto, los raviolones de ciervo ahumado eran la nada misma, insulsos como la salsa rosa que me sugirieron... El guisado de oveja era comible Y el gulash un chiste monumental. Viendo nuestro descontento nos regalaron un postre y de antemano se sabia iba a restar. Por el valor que usen frutos rojos congelados te das una idea de como subestiman al comensal. Por el precio al lugar le sobra ambiente y le falta muuucha cocina. Para cerrar los licores... Alcohol con colorante.

review_text: Super nice, beautiful atmosphere, overlooking the lake, wonderful service from Isabela (a super friendly Brazilian) Everything we ordered was delicious.
review_translated_text: Ambiente super agradavel, bonito, com vista para o lago, atendimento maravilhoso da Isabela (brasileira super simpatica) Tudo o que pedimos estava delicioso.

review_text: Everything is exquisite! Excellent care. Flor the gargoyle who served us a sweet treat! The atmosphere is very pleasant, calm... Its not cheap, but its worth it!

Excellent place. Beautiful views of the lake and very good food. Super recommended for the pepper loin. They welcomed us with 10 and Flor attended us, with very good vibes and super efficient. In addition, it is one of the few places in Bariloche that is pet friendly and they welcome dogs like one of their own, geniuses. Super recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar. Lindisimas vistas al lago y muy buena comida. Super recomendable le lomo a la pimienta. Nos recibieron de 10 y nos atendio Flor, con muy buen onda y super eficiente. Ademas, es de los pocos lugares en Bariloche que es pet friendly y reciben a los perritos como uno mas, unos genios. Super recomendable.

review_text: Everything is excellent!!! I recommend 100%
review_translated_text: Excelente todo!!! Recomiendo 100%

review_text: Excellent, all very very good. Dietary restrictions: Many gluten-free options suitable for celiacs.

Very good place! Recommendable!! With a beautiful view of the lake. A good atmosphere and they serve you 10! Flor attended us, a love! Abundant portions to share. The best: one of the few places in Bariloche that accept pets        They welcome them like one more!
review_translated_text: Muy buen lugar! Recomendable!! Con una lindisima vista al lago. Un buen ambiente y te atienden de 10! Nos atendio Flor, un amor! Porciones abundantes como para compartir. Lo mejor: de los pocos lugares en Bariloche que aceptan mascotas        Los reciben como uno mas!

review_text: Excellent food, good cocktails and wonderful service. We had a spectacular time
review_translated_text: Excelente comida, buena cocteleria y maravilloso servicio. La pasamos espectacular

review_text: I think it could be one of the best places to come and eat in Bariloche, the word I think is because I dont know many places yet, but if I compare it with the rest of the world, it is one of the best in terms of flavor. Really everything here it is proven to be rich; We ordered some empanadas and some crispy blood sausages as a starter, then the chorizo steak and the lamb, one with puree and the other with risotto, and for dessert the red fruit lasagna with a flan. Everything is exquisite, if you have to choose a dish I would choose the steak only because the lamb itself has a stronger and more annoying flavor, but in itself it was very delicious. I highlight the courtesy of the house, a kind of pebre with beans and a very good sopaipilla, and the chimichurri they give has a lot of flavor too. If they had to improve it would be the complimentary bread, which was good but I have tried better. It is more expensive than the norm of places in Bariloche but it is totally worth it
review_translated_text: Creo q puede ser uno de los mejores lugares para venir a comer en Bariloche, la palabra creo es porque no conosco muchos lugares aun, pero si lo comparo con el resto del mundo, es de los mejores en cuanto a sabor, Realmente todo lo que aqui se prueba es rico; pedimos de entrada unas empanaditas y unas morcillas crocantes, luego el bife chorizo y el cordero, uno con pure y otro con rissoto, y de postre la lasagna de frutos  rojos con un flan. Todo todo exquisito, si deben elegir un plato me quedo con el bife solo porque el cordero en si es un sabor mas fuerte y hostiga, pero en si era muy rico. Destaco la cortesia de la casa una especie de pebre con porotos y una sopaipilla muy bueno todo, Y el chimichurri q dan tiene mucho sabor tambien. Si tuvieran que mejorar seria el pancito de cortesia, que estaba bien pero he probado mejores. Es mas caro q la norma de lugares en Bariloche pero lo vale totalmente

review_text: The meats are delicious, however their values and the little variety of their accompaniments. The reception is very pleasant as is the attention.
Good service.
review_translated_text: Buen servicio.

review_text: Delicious food and fantastic service
review_translated_text: Comida deliciosa e atendimento fantastico

review_text: Excellent !!!
review_translated_text: Excelente !!!

review_text: I had the privilege of traveling to many countries, including Italy. I dont think Ive ever eaten a pasta as incredible as the one I tried today. I recommend the loin ravioli with malbec sauce. The wine list is very complete and you can find different price ranges, as well as commercial wines and others that are not so commercial. I would return a thousand times
review_translated_text: Tuve el privilegio de viajar por muchos paises, entre ellos Italia. No creo haber comido una pasta tan increible como la que he probado hoy. Recomiendo el raviol de lomo con salsa al malbec. La carta de vino es muy completa y podes encontrar distintas gamas de precio, como tambien vinos comerciales y otros que no tanto. Volveria mil veces

review_text: I went to this restaurant accompanied by 2 chefs, a Scotsman and a Chinese from NYC. What is redeemable is the service offered by the waiters and waitresses who do not rest for a second, very attentive and polite. There are three things that Doro must learn to consider itself an Italian restaurant: Pasta is served hot, Spaghetti is served al dente, dishes are presented to the diners table at the same time. The coffee was terrible and it was better not to talk about the bathrooms.
review_translated_text: Fui a este restaurante acompanado por 2  chefs, un escoses y un chino de NYC. Lo rescatable es el servicio que ofrecen los camareros y camareras que no descansan un segundo, muy atentos y educados. Hay tres cosas que Doro debe aprender para considerarse un restaurante italiano: La pasta se sirve caliente, los Spaghetti se sirven al dente, los platos se presentan a la mesa de los comensales al mismo tiempo. El cafe era pesimo y de los banos mejor no hablar.

review_text: Delicious food. Captivating service. But make a reservation, the restaurant is small. Upon arrival, you are served a basket of bread, a plate with a small starter with buffalo cheese, tomato and basil, and a glass of wine. I didnt like the wine but I thought the intention was good. The dishes were super tasty and well seasoned. Beautiful drinks. Prices a little above average but it was worth it. Vegetarian options: Tasty meat-free dishes
review_translated_text: Comida deliciosa. Atendimento cativante. Mas faca reserva, o restaurante e pequeno. Ao chegar e servido uma cesta de paes, um prato com uma pequena entrada com queijo de bufala, tomate e manjericao, e uma taca de um vinho. Eu nao gostei do vinho mas achei boa a intencao. Os pratos super saborosos e bem temperados. Drinks bonitos. Os precos um pouco acima da media mas valeu a pena. Vegetarian options: Pratos saborosos sem carne

review_text: Excellent dishes, fast and attentive service, we ordered 1 salad as a starter, 2 dishes and water, everything cost around R$280.00, we thought the price was fair for the quality.
review_translated_text: Pratos excelentes, atendimento rapido e atencioso , pedimos 1 salada de entrada 2 pratos e agua, tudo ficou em torno de R$280,00 achamos preco justo pela qualidade.

review_text: Absolutely impeccable. Attention to details, perfect and abundant dishes, ideal atmosphere. Point aside the attention of Emanuel, an outlier. Highly recommended 10/10
review_translated_text: Absolutamente impecable. Atencion a los detalles, platos perfectos y abundantes, ambiente ideal. Punto aparte la atencion de Emanuel, un fuera de serie. Recomendadisimo 10/10 Dietary restrictions: Great gluten free dishes

review_text: Emanuel waited on us and from the moment we arrived he received us kindly and was very attentive with the dishes we ordered, since one was without tacc. I recommend knowing the place. Dietary restrictions: There are plates without tac.
review_translated_text: Nos atendio Emanuel y desde que llegamos nos recibio amablemente y fue muy atento con los platos que le pedimos, ya que uno era sin tacc. Recomiendo conocer el lugar. Dietary restrictions: Hay platos sin tacc.

review_text: Emanuelle helped me, excellent service and good wine recommendations Vegetarian options: There is
The loin and mushroom ravioli EXCELLENT
review_translated_text: Los ravioles de lomo y champinones EXCELENTE

review_text: Excellent. I recommend it, Emanuels attention is unbeatable. The impeccable food.
review_translated_text: Excelente. Lo recomiendo , la atencion de Emanuel inmejorable . La comida impecable .

review_text: Very good food, we ordered a gonhchi pesto and a fettuccine. We could split it but theres a 30% fee, so thats the bill that we dont pay if were hungry, hahah. Its worth paying the higher price and sharing as the gnhocci is especially large.
review_translated_text: Comida muito boa, pedimos um gonhchi pesto e um fettuccine. Dava pra dividir mas tem uma taxa de 30% ai entra aquela conta que com fome a gente nao faz ne hahah. Vale a pena pagar esse valor maior e dividir pois e grande o gnhocci principalmente.

review_text: Beautiful place. Delicious food. Excellent attention.
review_translated_text: Lindisimo lugar. Riquisima comida. Excelente atencion.

review_text: Nice atmosphere, very good food, although a little salty. Very good attention, always attentive. The wines are a bit expensive for their real value. Beyond what was mentioned, quite acceptable.
review_translated_text: Lindo ambiente, muy buena comida, aunque un poco salada. La atencion muy buena siempre atentos. Los vinos un tanto caros para su valor real. Mas alla de lo mencionado bastante aceptable.

review_text: Beautiful place, intimate but at the same time jovial and modern atmosphere; I highlight the attention of our waitress - I dont remember her name - also the complimentary summer red wine, very delicious. The starter of prawns with vermouth sauce, a delight. I was a little disappointed with the gnocci with pesto and stracciatella, the pesto invaded the other flavors too much. But the rest incredible. The prices are a little high but the experience is worth it. They have free parking, which is something very good to know. Thank you
review_translated_text: Hermoso local, ambiente intimo pero a la vez jovial y moderno; destaco la atencion de nuestra camarera- no recuerdo el nombre-tb el tinto de verano de cortesia, muy rico. La entrada de langostinos con salsa de vermouth, una delicia. Me decepciono un poco el gnocci con pesto y stracciatella, el pesto invadia demasiado los demas sabores. Pero el resto increible. Los precios un poco elevados pero vale la pena la experiencia. Cuentan con estacionamiento sin cargo, algo muy  bueno p saber. Gracias

review_text: Chocolate cake is divine.  Interior is so cute.  Food was good but not spectacular. Service was excellent. Parking: Street parking

I would like to add truth to this review by highlighting an aspect to improve, but the truth is I cant think of any! We arrived and were served immediately, without a reservation even though the restaurant was full. The attention from the beginning was impeccable, they brought us delicious entrees and were concerned at all times with anything we needed. The waiting time was reasonable and the food was delicious, beyond belief, and super abundant. The prices according to the experience, excellent!
review_translated_text: Quisiera agregar veracidad a esta resena destacando un aspecto a mejorar, pero la verdad no se me ocurre ninguno! Llegamos y fuimos atendidos enseguida, sin reserva pese a que el restaurante estaba lleno. La atencion desde el comienzo impecable, nos trajeron unas entradas riquisimas y se preocuparon en todo momento por cualquier cosa que necesitaramos. El tiempo de espera fue razonable y la comida riquisima, de no creer, y super abundante. Los precios acordes a la experiencia, excelente!

review_text: Excellent service, warm and attentive, in just the right measure. My dish, delicious and special. I recommend Parking: All very well
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion, calida y atenta, en la justa medida. Mi plato, delicioso y especial. Recomiendo Parking: Todo muy bien

review_text: Great attendance by Lucas!!
Excellent food and good service from the staff
review_translated_text: Excelente comida y buena atencion del personal

review_text: As always, a pleasure to have lunch in this place. I hadnt visited them since before the pandemic. Very satisfied with the dedicated attention of each waiter. The exquisite menus! I only missed that they dont celebrate the clients birthday more, with singing, the Tiramisu portion with a candle and the lemonchelo gift. (Although the latter is not important!) But the little moment of Celebration is missed. Thank you beautiful people!! See you soon!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!! We hope to see you soon Gladys
review_translated_text: Como siempre un placer almorzar en este  lugar. Desde antes de la pandemia que no los visitaba. Muy conforme con la atencion dedicada de cada mozo. Los Menues exquisitos! Solo extrane que no Festejan mas el cumpleanos del cliente, con el canto, la porcion de Tiramisu con velita y el regalo de lemonchelo. (Aunque esto ultimo no es de importancia!) Pero se extrana el momentito de Festejo. Gracias Gente linda !! Hasta pronto!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie!!! Esperamos verte pronto Gladys

response_from_owner_text: Giovanna, thank you for your rating! We hope to see you soon!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Giovanna, gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos pronto!

review_text: Its always nice to go to La Parolaccia. Good service, good food and good price-value ratio.
response_from_owner_text: Noemi, thank you for your rating! We want you to continue enjoying our service. We hope to see you soon!
review_translated_text: Siempre es lindo ir a La Parolaccia. Buena atencion, buena comida y buena relacion precio-valor.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Noemi, gracias por tu calificacion! Queremos que sigas disfrutando de nuestro servicio. Te esperamos pronto!

review_text: Excellent food, super romantic and beautiful restaurant, with music at the appropriate volume for good conversations even with more people at the table. Service is super polite and helpful, but takes a while.
response_from_owner_text: Grazie infinite! Your rating is very important to us. See you soon Cibele!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie infinite! Tu calificacion es muy importante para nosotros. Hasta pronto Cibele!

review_text: Laura, the lady at the reception, is very kind!!!!!! Very good Laura
response_from_owner_text: Ciao Rodrigo! Thanks for your rating! We hope to see you again soon
response_from_owner_translated_text: Ciao Rodrigo! Gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos nuevamente pronto

response_from_owner_text: Ciao Nora! Thanks for your rating! We hope to see you again soon
response_from_owner_translated_text: Ciao Nora! Gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos nuevamente pronto

review_text: Good atmosphere, friendly staff and very good food!
response_from_owner_text: Gabriel, thank you for your rating! We want you to continue enjoying our service. We are waiting for you soon!
review_translated_text: Ambiente bom, funcionarios simpaticos e comida muito boa!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gabriel, gracias por tu calificacion! Queremos que sigas disfrutando de nuestro servicio. Te esperamos pronto!

response_from_owner_text: Molte Grazie Jorge!  , your opinion is very important to us!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Molte Grazie Jorge!  , es muy importante para nosotros tu opinion!

review_text: All the dishes we ordered were very good, the place is very well placed.
response_from_owner_text: Ciao Francisco! Thanks for your rating! We hope to see you again soon
review_translated_text: Todos los platos que pedimos estaban muy buenos, el local esta muy bien puesto.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Ciao Francisco! Gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos nuevamente pronto

review_text: Good atmosphere, good food, excellent service, have an incredible evening.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!! We hope to see you soon Sul
review_translated_text: Buen ambiente, buena comida , excelente atencion , pase una velada increible.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie!!! Esperamos verte pronto Sul

review_text: The panera, spectacular. The green gnocchi more or less. One of the dishes was brought wrong, but everything was fine. The fettuccini bolognese were good. The gratin sorrentinos, spectacular. In general terms, super friendly, good food and pleasant atmosphere.
review_translated_text: La panera, espectacular. Los gnoquis verdes mas o menos. Uno de los platos lo trajeron mal, pero todo bien. Los fetuccini bolognesa estuvieron bien. Los sorrentinos gratinados, espectaculares. En terminos generales, super amables, buena comida y ambiente agradable.

response_from_owner_text: Kikke, thank you for your rating! We hope to see you soon!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Kikke, gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos pronto!

response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!! We hope to see you soon Maria
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie!!! Esperamos verte pronto Maria

response_from_owner_text: Grazie infinite! Your rating is very important to us. See you soon Elisabete!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie infinite! Tu calificacion es muy importante para nosotros. Hasta pronto Elisabete!

review_text: Very good service. I didnt find the pastas good and the prices are too high for the quality of the food.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Damian, we would like to have more information about your experience, please write to us at www.laparolaccia.com. Thank you so much!
review_translated_text: Muy buen servicio. Las pastas no me parecieron buenas y los precios son demasiado elevados para la calidad de la comida.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola Damian, nos gustaria tener mas informacion sobre su experiencia, por favor, escribanos en www.laparolaccia.com . Muchas gracias!

response_from_owner_text: Grazie infinite! Your rating is very important to us. See you soon Patricia!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Grazie infinite! Tu calificacion es muy importante para nosotros. Hasta pronto Patricia!

review_text: Excellent service, high class. A place that may not be cheap when it comes to paying, but it is worth every penny. The lounge is very nice and the staff is wonderful. All payment months.
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio, de alta categoria. Un lugar que quizas no sea barato a la hora de pagar, pero que vale cada centavo. El salon es muy agradable y el personal atiende de maravillas. Todos los mesios de pago.

review_text: Fantastic! Excellent food, above expected service, calm, peaceful and pleasant atmosphere. No hype! Typical Italian restaurant in BS.
response_from_owner_text: Gilson, thank you for your rating! We hope to see you soon!
review_translated_text: Fantastico! Comida excelente, atendimento acima do esperado, ambiente calmo, tranquilo e agradavel. Sem badalacao! Tipico restaurante italiano em BS.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gilson, gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos pronto!

response_from_owner_text: Ciao Danielstruzer! Thanks for your rating! We hope to see you again soon
response_from_owner_translated_text: Ciao Danielstruzer! Gracias por tu calificacion! Te esperamos nuevamente pronto

review_text: Everything was very tasty, it took a while. But it was worth it.
review_translated_text: Estava tudo muito gostoso, demorou um pouco. Mas valeu pena.

review_text: Lunch menu was tasty and voluminous. Dessert not their strength.
Excellent executive menu!!! The house tiramisu is highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente el menu ejecutivo!!! Muy recomendable el tiramisu de la casa.

review_text: Great experience. Very good setting with a view of the dikes. The spaghetti dish with salmon cubes is on another level, highly recommended. Very good attention from Antonio.
review_translated_text: Gran experiencia. Muy buena ambientacion con vista a los diques. El plato de spaghetti con cubos de salmon es de otro nivel, muy recomendable. Muy buena atencion de Antonio.

review_text: Everything is good, both the dishes and the atmosphere and excellent service, but the prices are excessively high.
review_translated_text: Todo bien, tanto los platos como la ambientacion y una excelente atencion, pero los precios son excesivamente altos.

review_text: Price-quality does not correspond. The pasta leaves a lot to be desired. Very good service
review_translated_text: No se corresponde calidad precio. Las pastas dejan mucho que desear. El servio muy bueno

review_text: The place, food and excellent service.. The mosos with very good attention We return
Super nice atmosphere....incredible service..wonderful food
review_translated_text: Ambiente super agradavel....atendimento incrivel..comida maravilhosa

review_text: Excellent place! The food was exquisite (we ate pasta) and the wonderful attention from everyone. Without hesitation I would return and recommend it with closed eyes.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar! La comida exquisita (comimos pastas) y la atencion maravillosa por parte de todos. Sin dudar volveria y lo recomiendo a ojos cerrados.

review_text: They will make you a dinner offer you cant refuse! We were taken here by our local family, so didnt choose it ourselves. We might have been turned off by the Mafia kitsch but it turned out to be pretty fun. Also, the food was pretty great. Italian menu done really well. We had a variety of dietary requirements and they nailed it with everything. Hand made pasta was a huge hit and the steak was as juicy and succulent as you could imagine. The wine selection was great, too with some recommendations we absolutely loved. A winner, for sure
Very well prepared dishes. 100% recommendable. And reasonable prices.
review_translated_text: Platos muy bien elaborados. 100% recomendable. Y precios razonables.

review_text: I used to love this place until they served me a salad with a big bug, doused in dressing, at the bottom of the bowl. They tried to tell me maybe the bug fell from the awning into the bowl. It didn t. It was fully tossed into the salad I was 2 bites into. I loved this place until this happened
I had a good rib-eye medium rare, however the one of my friend was quite harsh. Service was fine, however 23k for a steak without side dishes is quite a lot
My favorite steakhouse in Buenos Aires!
Super cozy restaurant with great ambiance. Excellent service with delicious freshly grilled meat. You will get your money s worth!

Amazing and very filling Argentine steak. Service was also pretty good. Location is very central in the hip neighbourhood of Palermo Soho. The only problem was the restroom that was super dirty (I went a bit later in the afternoon after lunch time, so maybe thats why) the place itself is cool, but a little too rustic in need of a deep cleaning. Other thing is that like many other places in Argentina, the tip should be paid in cash, but we only had cards, the waiter did accept foreign currency as gratuity (I think dollars, euros and Brazilian real might be more appreciated). In the end, that wasnt a big issue, just be aware. Again the food which is the most important was fantastic!
They didnt let me in because I was alone. Horrible rude manager.
review_translated_text: Nao me deixaram entrar porque estava sozinha. Gerente mal educado horrivel .

review_text: I would like not to write this review, as our first experience at this restaurant was very nice - we were in a rush and ordered our food immediately after we were handed the menu, and the waiter did his best so that we got the food quickly. Steak was tasty and our wine was good. That was the reason we decided to come here for the second time, which was a mistake. The waiter was different that time - unpleasant, and seemed not willing to help us select the right meal. I think he then forgot about our steak - we received it almost after 50 minutes, when a guy next to us who came after us was already eating his steak. And guess what - the steak was completely raw in the middle, although we asked for medium. And as it was quite late already and we were not in the mood to fight, we decided to eat at least the outside parts that were more or less cooked. That was a mistake. There were only a few people left in the restaurant, and when paying, we noticed that the kitchen personnel was collecting leftovers from starters/sauces for the meat and putting them in separate big bowls - you can think for yourself what they do with it further. But I would not eat them after what I saw. And the main reason I decided to write this - I got an awful bowel infecting after eating here. Skip it if you want to spend 5 days exploring the city, and not being closed in 4 walls!!
Tasty food. We were happy with everything. I recommend.
Excellent barbecue, first-class service and majestic atmosphere. I will return without a doubt.
review_translated_text: Excelente asado, el servicio de primera y el ambiente majestuoso. Volvere sin dudas.

review_text: On the recommendation of a family member we went to this restaurant, it is really impeccable in everything. Reception, atmosphere, service, food. We ordered several appetizers, pastas, and I particularly had a chorizo steak, which to be honest, the best Ive eaten so far... a delicacy. I highly recommend this place
review_translated_text: Por recomendacion de un familiar fuimos a este restaurante, es realmente impecable en todo. Recepcion, ambiente, servicio, comida. Pedimos varias entradas, pastas, y yo particularmente un bife de chorizo que para ser sincero, el mejor que comi hasta ahora..un manjar. Recomiendo ampliamente este lugar

review_text: One of the best restaurants I have ever known. Excellent service and attention and the meat.... unbeatable
review_translated_text: De los mejores restaurantes que he conocido. Excelente servicio y atencion y la carne.... inmejorable

review_text: Excellent food and service, Provoleta and Ojo de bife the best
review_translated_text: Excelente comida y atencion, Provoleta y Ojo de bife lo mejor

review_text: We shared a chorizo, a portion of chinchulines, very tender roast with fries, all very delicious, an uxmal wine 750.2 sparkling waters, table service with panera and a triolet with creole sauce, chimichurri and spiced garlic, a delight. We will return
review_translated_text: Compartimos un chorizo, una porcion d chinchulines, asado tiernisimo con fritas, todo muyy rico, un vino uxmal 750,2 aguas con gas, servicio d mesa c panera y un triolet c salsa criolla, chimichurri y ajos especiados, una delicia. Volveremos

review_text: The best steaks in Buenos Aires and even in the world!
SPECTACULAR IN EVERY SENSE OF THE WORD!
review_translated_text: ESPECTACULAR EN TODO EL SENTIDO DE LA PALABRA!

review_text: I love all. They welcomed us with a warm bread basket and a set of 3 sauces, all of which were very good. We ordered a meat board as a main dish (steak, pork and chicken). There were 4 of us and it was abundant and everything was very delicious. To this we added a portion of potatoes and a salad. Everything was so good that we forgot to take photos. For dessert we ordered a chocolate volcano and a tiramisu which were incredible. The service was very good, they were always attentive to what we needed and very friendly. Would go again.
review_translated_text: Me encanto todo. Nos recibieron con una panera calientita y un conjunto de 3 salsas, muy buenas todas. Pedimos como principal una tabla de carnes (bife, cerdo y pollo) eramos 4 y fue abundante y todo muy rico, a esto le agregamos una porcion de papas y una ensalada. Estaba todo tan bueno que nos olvidamos de tomar fotos. Como postre pedimos un volcan de chocolate y un tiramisu que estuvieron increibles. La atencion fue muy buena, siempre estuvieron atentos a lo que necesitaramos y muy amables. Volveria a ir.

review_text: I went in November 2023 and I really liked it. But I returned in January 2024 and we noticed a significant deterioration in the food and service. A feather
review_translated_text: Fui em novembro 2023 e gostei muito. Mas retornei em janeiro 2024 e percebemos uma piora importante na comida e no servico. Uma pena

review_text: One of the best pizzas in Buenos Aires. Sometimes the place is a little noisy.
review_translated_text: De las mejores pizzas de Buenos Aires. A veces un poco ruidoso el local.

review_text: This time the experience was not the best. We arrived to eat early (around 8:30 p.m.) and although the place was quite full, we managed to sit down. We ordered three pizzas. All three were very good. The bad thing was that while we waited they didnt bring anything at all... Some courtesy wouldnt hurt. But what really bothered me was the waiters rush to lift our plates to clear the table. As soon as we finished the last bite, a girl came to pick everything up. They didnt offer us dessert or coffee. They clearly wanted to free the table for the next one. It is not good that they treat customers like this, especially because in addition to eating good pizzas, one goes as a family to share a pleasant moment and attitudes like the ones I describe ruin the outing.
review_translated_text: Esta vez la experiencia no fue la mejor. Llegamos a comer temprano (alrrefedor de las 20:30 hs) y si bien el local estaba bastante lleno conseguimos sentarnos. Pedimos tres pizzas. Las tres estaban muy buenas. Lo malo fue que mientras esperamos no traen nada de nada... Algo de cortesia no vendria mal. Pero lo que de verdad me cayo mal fue el apuro de las mozas por levantarnos los platos para liberar la mesa. Ni bien terminamos el ultimo bocado vino una moza a levantar todo. No nos ofrecieron postre ni cafe. Claramente querian liberar la mesa para el que sigue. No esta bueno que traten asi a los clientes sobre todo porque ademas de comer una buenas pizzas uno va en familia a compartir un momento agradable y actitudes como las que describo arruinan la salida.

review_text: The place is not bad, but very hot, if you have the oven as an excuse, add more air. It will be Neapolitan pizza and that means there is a shortage of products on top: a little sauce, a speck of cheese, thin and rubbery dough in the center, burnt on the edges. At the price of a loaded pixzza. A scam, they charge for what they put in, not for what they think they are. ugly bathrooms
review_translated_text: El sitio no esta mal, pero muy caluroso, si tienen como excusa el horno, pongan mas aire. Sera pizza napolitana y eso hace una escases de productos arriba: un poco de salsa, alguna manchita de queso, masa finita y gomosa en el centro, quemada en los bordes. Al precio de una pixzza cargada. Una estafa, cobren por lo que ponen, no por lo que creen que son. Banos feos

review_text: Excellent pizza, but for me it is for one person since it is finite and the truth is we were 6 people and we ordered 5 pizzas and they came within 15 minutes we ordered, very fast. So I will definitely go again, the only bad thing about the place is that the tables are very close to each other.
review_translated_text: Excelente pizza, pero para mi es para una sola persona ya que es finita y la verdad eramos 6 personas y pedimos 5 pizzas y vinieron a los 15 minutos que pedimos, muy rapido. Asi que sin duda volvere a ir, lo unico que es malo del lugar que las mesas estan muy pegadas unas a las otras.

review_text: The tre sapori pizza is spectacular, highly recommended, the large and thin pizzas are not heavy, I didnt like the tiramisu and the cannolo was delicious.
review_translated_text: La pizza tre sapori espectacular super recomendable las pizzas grandes y finas no caen pesadas el tiramisu no me gusto y el cannolo riquisimo

review_text: The best pizzeria there is
review_translated_text: La mejor pizzeria que hay

review_text: Very good Italian pizzas. One of the best Ive tried so far.
review_translated_text: Muy buenas las pizzas italianas. De lo mejor que probe al momento.

review_text: The best pizzeria in the world. I would go every day but I live 500 km away.
review_translated_text: La mejor pizzeria del mundo. Iria todos los dias pero vivo a 500 km.

review_text: All very rich
review_translated_text: Todo muy rico

review_text: The pizza was very delicious, it is Neapolitan style, large but very thin. I also tried the faina which was good, normal. They have several pizza options and also some appetizers and desserts. We were able to get a table without a problem but it was a little hot inside. They do not accept reservations.
review_translated_text: La pizza estuvo muy rica, es estilo napolitana, grande pero bien finita. Tambien probe la faina que estuvo bien, normal. Tienen varios opciones de pizza y tambien algunas entradas y postres. Pudimos conseguir mesa sin problema peeo hacia un poco de calor adentro. No aceptan reservas.

review_text: Neapolitan style pizza with very good quality ingredients.
review_translated_text: Pizza estilo napolitano con ingredientes de muy buena calidad.

review_text: It was a wonderful experience. The pizza is divine. gorgeous. Service out of 10. Congratulations to Nestor and his team and long live.
review_translated_text: Fue una experiencia maravillosa. La pizza es divina. esplendido. Servicio sobre 10. Felicitaciones a Nestor y su equipo y larga vida.

review_text: Wonderful!
review_translated_text: Maravilhosa!

review_text: Everything we tried was delicious.
review_translated_text: Riquisimo todo que probamos.

review_text: A classic trattoria that makes you feel like a Sunday at noon, always. Good proposal of dishes, with a reduced menu. I always go for the lasagna and its a 10. The garlic prawns should just be called prawns, I think it is the weakest dish. For dessert... chocotorta and tiramisu, to stay pipon pipon and have a nap.
review_translated_text: Una clasica trattoria que te hace sentir como un domingo al mediodia, siempre. Buena propuesta de platos, con carta reducida. Siempre voy por la lasagna y es un 10. Las gambas al ajillo, deberian llamarse solo gambas, creo que es el plato mas flojito. De postre  chocotorta y tiramisu, para quedar pipon pipon y meter siesta.

review_text: Pleasant place and attention. The dishes are not for sharing! The lasagna filled with minced meat and nothing more! The carbonara noodles, bland, tasteless, and with little sauce. The chocotorta was delicious, the flan seemed very small to me. I would not return, nor would I recommend the place.
review_translated_text: Lugar y atencion agradable. Los platos No son para compartir! La lasagna rellena con picada y no mas! Los fideos a la carbonara, insulsos, sin gusto, y con poca salsa. La chocotorta si estaba rica, el flan me parecio muy chico. No volveria, ni recomendaria el lugar.

review_text: I highlight the excellent service. But we were 4 people, we all ordered different dishes and none of us blew our minds. In my case Spaghetti Carbonara lacks taste and lacks sauce. The delicious desserts. But I dont agree on the price-quality ratio.

Traditional place. Abundant dishes, with good quality, fresh products. But recently prices have increased considerably. Before it was cheaper to order delivery, today there is no difference. The lunch menu is a very good option.
review_translated_text: Lugar tradicional. Platos abundantes, con productos de buena calidad, frescos. Pero en el ultimo tiempo aumentaron considerablemente los precios. Antes salia mas barato pedir delivery, hoy en dia no hay diferencia. El menu de mediodia es una muy buena opcion.

review_text: I have tried pasta carbonara in Italy and the one they served me was nothing like it, average service
review_translated_text: He probado la pasta a la carbonara en Italia y la que me sirvieron no se parecia nada, servicio regular

review_text: The dishes are expensive for the quality of what is offered. I ordered a burrata which was a regular supermarket cheese. The Sorrentinos had the same cheese inside and I repeat, the dishes were very expensive. It has nothing Italian cuisine.
review_translated_text: Caros los platos para la calidad de lo que ofrece . Pedi una burrata que era un queso comun y corriente de supermercado. Los sorrentinos tenian el mismo queso en su interior y repito, carisimos los platos . De cocina italiana, no tiene nada.

review_text: Homemade Italian food like at Nonas house. Made with love
review_translated_text: Comida casera italiana como en casa de la nona. Hecha con amor

review_text: Tasty and abundant food.
review_translated_text: Comida sabrosa y abundante.

review_text: Horrible food. We ordered some very tasteless spagettis, poorly made sauce, bad taste. The pizza is the worst I ate in Buenos Aires, raw dough. Its amazing how they cant do the basics right. A bluef, pure exterior look with Bodegon pretensions.
review_translated_text: Horrible la comida. Pedimos unos spagettis muy desabridos, salsa mal hecha, feo sabor. La pizza es la peor que comi en Buenos Aires, masa cruda. Es increible como no pueden hacer bien lo basico. Un bluef, pura pinta de afuera con pretenciones de Bodegon.

review_text: Terrible food. The margarita was terrible, thick, white dough, undercooked and bad cheese. The spaghetti bolognese, the ones made at home with San Vicente are better. pure smoke
review_translated_text: Pesima la comida. La margarita malisima, masa gruesa, blanca, poco cocinada y malo el queso. Los spaghetti bolognesa, son mejores los hechos en casa con San Vicente. Puro humo

review_text: A disappointment, a rather dirty place with a cat inside the premises, standing on the tables where people eat afterwards!, the same sauce for everything: the eggplant parmesan, the noodles, a shame because I had other expectations Parking: As Palermo is a very busy neighborhood, you have to go around and around until you find a place to park on the street. Wheelchair accessibility: There is no
review_translated_text: Una decepcion, un lugar bastante sucio con un gato dentro del local, subido a las mesas donde despues come la gente!, una misma salsa para todo: la berenjena parmesana, los fideos, una pena porque tenia otras expectativas Parking: Como Palermo es un barrio muy concurrido hay que dar muchas vueltas hasta encontrar un lugar donde estacionar en la calle Wheelchair accessibility: No hay

review_text: Top place! Simply an exquisite experience. To improve the environment a little. But highly recommended. All very rich! Really
Bad service, everything very expensive and a mediocre place!
review_translated_text: Mala atencion, todo carisimo y lugar medio pelo!

review_text: The service is rubbish, starting with the reception that they want to direct you to where you have to sit, the waitress upon realizing that we were Brazilians treated us very badly and in an unprofessional and unfriendly way, I dont recommend anyone to come, there are better establishments and who treat you decently
review_translated_text: O atendimento e um lixo, a comecar pela recepcao que querem mandar aonde vc tem que se sentar, a garconete ao perceber que eramos Brasileiros nos tratou muito mal e de forma nada profissional e antipatica, nao recomendo a ninguem que venha, tem estabelecimentos melhores e que te tratam decentemente

review_text: Please, what a good chorizo steak I ate and not to mention the roasted vegetables, UFFFFF. Alfonso, a luxury waiter, knows even the cooking points and everything.
review_translated_text: por favor que buen bife de chorizo que me comi y ni hablar de las verduritas asadas, UFFFFF. Alfonso un mozo de lujo, se sabe hasta los puntos de coccion y todo.

review_text: A very good place. Nice design, tasty food (one of the few places in BA where we had our steaks exactly as we asked them) and friendly service. Will come again.

I had an excellent experience at this restaurant. The service was great, the food was delicious, the portion was well served. Its a good price if you think about the location, quality of the food and service provided.
review_translated_text: Tive uma excelente experiencia nesse restaurante. O atendimento foi otimo, a comida estava gostosa, a porcao bem servida. Tem um bom preco se pensar na localizacao, qualidade da comida e servico prestado.

review_text: The price agreed to the country. The food is very delicious. The only thing to highlight is that the waiter can warn that the dishes are to share
review_translated_text: El precio acorde al pais. La comida muy rica. Lo unico para resaltar es que el mozo puede avisar que los platos son para compartir

review_text: Abundant, rich and prices in line with today. I leave the menu link https://qrco.de/bee856
Excellent place. I think it is the best Trattoria in Bariloche. Good quality, live music, unmatched service. Recommended for everyone.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar.   Creo que es la mejor Trattoria de Bariloche. Buena calidad, musica en vivo, atencion inigualable. Recomendado para todos.

review_text: The place is nice and well located, but the service is careless, you had to look for the waiters to serve you. We only tried the pizza which was average, very thick dough and even a little raw. We ordered beers and even though some were offered on the menu, there was only one type. Best of all was a man who played beautiful live music.
review_translated_text: El lugar es agradable y esta bien ubicado, pero la atencion es descuidada, habia que estar buscando a los garzones para que te atendieran. Solo probamos la pizza que era regular, masa muy gruesa e incluso algo cruda. Pedimos cervezas y a pesar de que en la carta se ofrecen algunas solo habia un tipo. Lo mejor de todo fue un senor que tocaba hermosa musica en vivo.

review_text: Excellent both the food and the attention of the staff who were very friendly. They have a very varied menu and the food arrives freshly prepared, hot and in a short time. Very good service and quality of food.
review_translated_text: Excelente tanto la comida como la atencion del personal quienes eran demasiado amables. Tienen un menu muy variado y la comida llega recien preparada, caliente y en un tiempo corto. Muy buena atencion y la calidad de la comida.

review_text: Very well attended place, fast, varied food, abundant and delicious dishes, quiet live music, spectacular place and very good location!
review_translated_text: Lugar muy bien atendido, rapido, comida variada, platos abundantes y ricos musica tranquila en vivo lugar espectacular y muy buena ubicacion!

review_text: We went twice with my friends because the pastas are very delicious. The service is very good and the atmosphere is calm. The price is according to the service they offer.
review_translated_text: Fuimos 2 veces con mis amigas porque las pastas son muy ricas. La atencion es muy buena y el ambiente es tranquilo. El precio es acorde al servicio que ofrecen.

review_text: The food was spectacular and Ninos treatment and service was even better. We have been in Bariloche for 3 days and we have had lunch and dinner 3 times at the restaurant. It is worth highlighting the pasta stuffed with trout with prawns, impressive. Deserved 5 stars.
review_translated_text: La comida espectacular y el trato y servicio de Nino mejor si cabe. Hemos estado en Bariloche 3 dias y hemos comido y cenado en 3 ocasiones en el restaurante. Cabe destacar la pasta rellena de trucha con langostinos, impresionante. Merecidas las 5 estrellas.

review_text: Both the food and the service are excellent. Highlight the work of Nino, who at all times is aware that you do not lack anything. Regarding the food, as I said, spectacular and at a very good price.
review_translated_text: Tanto la comida como el servicio es excelente. Destacar la labor de Nino, el cual en todo momento esta pendiente de que no te falte de nada. Respecto a la comida, lo dicho, espectacular y a un muy buen precio.

review_text: Spectacular service and food.
review_translated_text: Espectacular atencion y comida.

review_text: Bad service, average food below, the malfatis were actually gnocchi without texture or taste.
review_translated_text: Mala atencion, la comida promedio para abajo, los malfatis eran en realidad noquis sin textura ni gusto.

review_text: We were there on Monday 2/5/24. Excellent service, well decorated, and I got to enjoy good music... it was pleasant. The missing star in the FOOD rating: I use NEW oil every day for frying.
review_translated_text: Estuvimos el Lunes 5/2/24. Excelente atencion,  bien ambientado, y me toco disfrutar de buena musica... fue agradable.   La estrella que falta en la calificacion COMIDA:  en las frituras  yo usarla aceite  NUEVO dia a dia.

review_text: Excellent Italian restaurant. Good dishes, reasonable price, very good service. Every time I visit Bariloche, my wife and I stop by for lunch. Highly recommended. Parking: You have to park in a parking lot about 2 blocks away.
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante italiano. Buenos platos, precio acorde, muy buena atencion. Cada vez que visito Bariloche, pasamos con mi esposa a almorzar. Muy recomendable. Parking: Hay que estacionar en una playa de estacionamiento como a 2 cuadras.

review_text: Everything is delicious!! Lasagna top 10
review_translated_text: Rico todo !! Lasana top 10

review_text: All good, highly recommended. The singer who entertains and the waiter put the show aside. Im referring to the one on Bustillo Street. The other one in the center is not the same. We went four nights for dinner.
review_translated_text: Todo bien muy recomendable. El cantante que ameniza y el mozo espectaculo aparte. Me refiero al que esta sobre la calle Bustillo. El otro de centro no es lo mismo. Fuimos cuatro noches a cenar.

review_text: Rich pasta. Very tasty. Very Italian place with an extensive menu, including all kinds of pastas and meats. The somewhat nostalgic  bajonera  live music. Ninos service was very attentive, although at times it could be a bit invasive or intense. Too helpful. Price accordingly. Not very abundant dish: 5 or 6 agnolotis/sorrentinos.
review_translated_text: Rica pasta. Muy sabrosa. Lugar bien italiano con amplia carta, incluyendo todo tipo de pastas y carnes. La musica en vivo algo nostalgica  bajonera . Muy atento el servicio de Nino, aunque por momentos podia resultar un tanto invasivo o intenso. Demasiado servicial. Precio acorde. Plato no muy abundante: 5 o 6 agnolotis/sorrentinos.

review_text: The place is not fine or distinguished. Its a trattoria. It has a partial view of the lake and is barely decorated (some tablecloths and napkins). The service is good. There are very affordable menus and the food is well prepared. I ordered some pasta with pumpkin filling and my mother ordered some lamb ravioli. The pasta is very good, the sauces a little weak (especially the cream sauce). Considering the cost, the food is good. I went at noon, there was a television with cartoons blaring and the cooks children (or perhaps the maids, or both) were walking around the dining room. Then, thank God, a man came and sang some very 80s covers and they turned off the TV. Maybe at night these things dont happen.
review_translated_text: El lugar no es fino ni distinguido. Es una trattoria. Tiene vista parcial al lago y esta apenas ambientada (unos manteles y servilletas). El servicio es bueno. Hay menus muy economicos y la comida esta bien preparada. Yo pedi unas pastas con relleno de calabaza y mi madre unos ravioles de cordero. La pasta esta muy bien, las salsas un poco flojas (en especial la salsa a la crema). Considerando el costo, la comida es buena. Fui al mediodia, habia un televisor con dibujos animados a todo volumen y los ninos del cocinero (o quizas de la moza, o de ambos) se paseaban por el salon comedor. Luego, gracias a Dios, vino un hombre que canto unos covers muy de los 80 y apagaron la tele. Quizas de noche estas cosas no suceden.

review_text: Very good food... Presentation and prices!!!
Cozy atmosphere, excellent food, live music and immediate attention. Nino very attentive to every detail so that the experience was the best.
review_translated_text: Ambiente acogedor, comida excelente, musica en vivo y atencion inmediata. Nino muy atento a cada detalle para que la experiencia fuera la mejor.

review_text: An unforgettable experience Very good
We couldnt have chosen better! Excellent food with personalized and friendly treatment in a calm and relaxed atmosphere.
review_translated_text: !No pudimos elegir mejor! Comida excelente con un trato personalizado y amable en un ambiente tranquilo y relajado.

review_text: Today 02/09/24 we came to Sorrento, here in Puerto Madero and were served by Daniel El Tuco, great service, excellent food. INCREDIBLE!!!
review_translated_text: Hoje 09/02/24 viemos ao Sorrento, aqui em Puerto Madero e fomos atendidos pelo Daniel El Tuco, otimo atendimendo, excelente comida. INCRIVEL!!!

review_text: Best lasagna Ive ever eaten. Excelent reception!
review_translated_text: Melhor lasanha que comi. Atendimento excelente!

review_text: Good restaurant in Puerto Madero, good food, but it is not extraordinary like other places I was

review_text: Great food, atmosphere and service. Loved our dinner here.
Everything perfect

review_text: Extremely rude service, bad food, stinky place
review_translated_text: atendimento extremamente grosseiro, comida ruim, local fedido

review_text: Terrible service and bad food
review_translated_text: Atendimento terrivel e comida ruim

review_text: Terrible service and terrible food!!!
review_translated_text: Pessimo atendimento e comida sofrivel !!!

review_text: Excellent service, food was incredibly tasty. We were also lucky that the evening was accompanied by live music. I recommend the restaurant if you want to have a very exclusive meal.
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio, la comida era increiblemente sabrosa.  Tambien tuvimos la suerte de que la velada estuvo acompanada de musica en directo.  Recomiendo el restaurante si quieres tener una comida muy exclusiva.

review_text: One of the best pastas I ate. Beautiful atmosphere and views. The Service Quality
review_translated_text: De las mejores pastas que comi. Hermoso ambiente y vistas. La atencion del personal excelente

review_text: All wonderful !! To not lose!

review_text: Very cozy atmosphere. The mushroom pasta was something! Super thin and delicate. I went unpretentiously and was surprised
review_translated_text: Ambiente muito aconchegante. A massa com cogumelos estava algo! Super fina e delicada. Fui despretensiosamente e me surpreendi

review_text: The Maitre d Jerson was 5 stars
Special!
review_translated_text: Especial!

review_text: A very nice place with good people and one of the best rib eyes I ate in Buenos Aires
review_translated_text: rib eye

review_text: Lunch Saturday at noon. We ordered the executive menu which includes starter, main course, dessert and drink. The truth is that it was a total pleasure! They treated us like royalty, the food was excellent, the perfect temperature, a very good atmosphere in general! The place was impeccable and super neat. I ordered the raw ham with mozzarella and cherry tomato which was a 10, and the main dish was the catch of the day, delicious! I accompanied it with a glass of red wine and almond dessert. The panera and welcome drinks are superlative! I love this place!!!!
review_translated_text: Almuerzo sabado al mediodia. Pedimos el menu ejecutivo que incluye entrada, plato principal, postre y bebida. La verdad que fue un placer total! Nos atendieron como a reyes, la comida excelente, la temperatura perfecta, muy buen ambiente en gral! El lugar impecable y super prolijo. Yo pedi el jamon crudo con muzzarela y tomatito cherry que fue un 10, y de principal la pesca del dia, riquisima! Acompane con copa de vino tinto y de postre almendrado. La panera y los tragos de bienvenida son superlativos! Amo este lugar!!!!

review_text: Excellent food, staff, and overall wonderful dining experience

A beautiful place, 4 or 5 blocks from the La Recoleta Cemetery, friendly and efficient service. They welcomed us with a glass of house sparkling wine or spritz, and a good assortment of different types of bread. I ordered some agnolotti stuffed with chicken, with butter and sage. Something simple, but very well executed, like only those who know how to do. To close, a very well prepared afogatto. This restaurant is highlighted by the Michelin guide.
review_translated_text: Un bello lugar, a 4 o 5 cuadras del Cementerio de La Recoleta, atencion amable y eficiente. Nos recibieron con una copa de espumante o Spritz de la casa, y una buen surtido de diferentes tipos de panes. Pedi unos agnolotti rellenos de pollo, con mantequilla y salvia. Algo sencillo, pero muy bien ejecutado, como solo los que saben, saben hacer. Para cerrar, un afogatto muy bien preparado. Este restaurant esta destacado por la guia Michelin.

review_text: Not a fan.  The food is super rich v delicious.  Our waiter had an attitude.  Others were offered Aperol or champagne but we were offered neither. Great atmosphere but you get the impression that if you re not a regular you won t get the same service.
Awesome. But expensive nowadays.
Excellent place, very good atmosphere and service and very good seating, the portions could only be a little larger. 100% recommended
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar muy buen ambiente y atencion y l acomoda muy buena solo podria ser un poquito mas grandes las porciones .recomendable 100%

review_text: Excellent food, excellent location and ambience. Services impeccable. Great value!  Highly recommended. Must try when in Buenos Aires.
Excellent Italian restaurant. There was even complimentary champagne. Spaghetti al Nero is very good. Great carpaccio and salmon trio too.
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante italiano.  Teve ate champanhe cortesia. Espagueti ao Nero e muito bom. Carpaccio e trio de salmao otimos tambem.

review_text: Everything very good

review_text: It connects very well, the place is nice, the only thing that stood out is that my husband ordered 1 glass of wine for himself and when we were chatting and the waiter saw his empty glass, he came very quickly and refilled it without asking my husband if Do you want another glass of wine? And my husband just looked and well, when he was served, he took the glass of wine   and obviously they billed for the 2 glasses of wine, but they should ask first to avoid misunderstandings.
review_translated_text: Se cone muy bien, el lugar es lindo, lo unico q resalto es q mi esposo pidio 1 copa de vino para el solo y cuando estabamos charlando y el mozo vio su copa vacia vino rapidisimo y la volvio a llenar sin preguntarle a mi esposo si desea otra copa de vino ? Y mi esposo solo miro y bueno al estar servido tomo la copa de vino   y obvio q facturan las 2 copas de vino,  pero deberian preguntar primero asi se evita malos entendidos.

review_text: Excellent service and the place is a trip to the past

review_text: VERY EXPENSIVE! I went many times and this time they disfigured me!

review_text: Still life yes, crazy prices for the place

review_text: Very nice place to enjoy a good meal
