review_text: Picturesque place. The spectacular finish. Very good service even though we arrived at 1 a.m.
review_translated_text: Pintoresco lugar. La faina espectacular.  Muy buena atencion a pesar de q llegamos 1 a.m.

review_text: Picturesque place with delicious food and drinks. The attention is very remarkable.
review_translated_text: Lugar pintoresco con rica comida y bebidas. Muy destacable la atencion.

review_text: Good restaurant atmosphere but with Gourmet restaurant prices. The proposal is good and has a reduced menu but with quality products. They give you a welcome vermouth and a limoncello when you ask for the bill, which adds up. Very good service, kind and friendly guys. As I said, the prices are a little high for the average, with main dishes exceeding 11 thousand pesos and they are not for sharing. Drinks are also expensive, with few affordable wine options. We ordered liter lemonade and so much ice was barely enough for 2 glasses. Overall, good; The food is delicious but it is not for all budgets.
review_translated_text: Ambiente bien de bodegon pero con precios de restaurante Gourmet. La propuesta esta buena y tiene una carta reducida pero con productos de calidad. Te dan un vermut de bienvenida y un limoncello al pedir la cuenta, lo que suma. La atencion muy buena, los chicos amables y simpaticos. Como dije, los precios son un poco elevados para la media, con platos principales superando los 11 mil pesos y no son para compartir. Las bebidas tambien caras, con pocas opciones de vinos accesibles. Pedimos limonada de litro y de tanto hielo apenas alcanzo para 2 vasos. En general, bien; se come rico pero no es para todos los bolsillos.

review_text: Great place with more than 100 years, the stories, the stories of the owners inherited a legacy of delicacies, with a renewed mix, Gourmet Bodegon, variety of tapas, preserves, cheese boards, place of beautiful Vermouths, good music! I recommend Sunday Brunchs and perfect place for a date with lanterns and aromas
Incredible place!!!!
review_translated_text: Increible lugar!!!!

review_text: It is a very particular style, friendly as a neighborhood to share among friends and sports fans, a unique place that is no longer full of stories.
review_translated_text: Es un estilo muy particular, amistoso como de barrio para compartir entre amigos y fanaticos del deporte ,un lugar unico  que ya no quedan lleno de historias

review_text: Its picturesque

review_text: Poor food. Service was erratic and tried to keep a higher tip than we provided voluntarily. Price is lower than most restaurants in the area, but the price/quality ratio is terrible. Dont recommend it at all.
The osso bucco risotto is EXCELLENT
review_translated_text: Le risotto a l osso bucco est EXCELLENT

review_text: Honestly, rating this restaurant with a rating of 5 and having no taste... the olive oil they use is an oil and it only has this oil which ruins any salad. The cheese starter dish is honestly the best at the fair near my house. They only got the wine right because you cant go wrong here in Buenos Aires. I recommend not going.
review_translated_text: Sinceramente avaliar esse restaurante com nota  5 e nao ter paladar   o azeite que eles usam e um oleo e so tem esse oleo o que estraga qualquer salada . O prato de entrada de queijos sinceramente como melhor na feirinha perto de casa . So acertaram o vinho porque esse nao tem erro aqui em Buenos Aires . Recomendo nao irem .

review_text: Travelling from Australia staying in Luxury Apartments Puerto Madero BA.  Right across the road we found this georgious restaurant. Absolutely top food and service on the water front. Thoroughly recommend this restaurant. Food
Very nice place, delicious food and good service, recommended as long as they dont arrive around 3 pm, in which case, the service is bad and you eat whats left.
review_translated_text: Muy agradable lugar, rica comida y buen servicio, recomendable  siempre y cuando no lleguen a eso de las 15 hs, en cuyo caso, es malo el servicio y comes lo que queda.

review_text: The waiter askip for the tips

review_text: If you want to go and live an experience its good, but if youre looking for quantity I dont think its the place. The attention is good, a calm atmosphere. The only thing I didnt like is that the menu doesnt offer drinks so until the end you dont know what prices you paid for it.
review_translated_text: Si quieres ir a vivir una experiencia esta bueno, pero si lo que buscas es cantidad no creo que sea el lugar. La atencion es buena, un ambiente tranquilo. Lo unico que no me gusto es que la carta no ofrece bebestibles por lo que hasta el final no sabes que precios pagaste por ello.

review_text: Nice place and excellent atmosphere. The food is very delicious. Note that drinks do not appear on the menu, which I think is relevant to detail.

We had a menu of the day for lunch, they give you a choice of 3 options, and you can add a starter and dessert with a small additional cost, the prices are low. The food was good but it was very basic. Maybe its according to the price.
review_translated_text: Almorzamos menu del dia, te dan a elegir 3 opciones,  y podes sumarle entrada y postre con un pequeno costo adicional, los precios son bajos. Se comio bien pero como que fue muy basico. Quizas esta acorde al precio.

review_text: We ordered two salads and they didnt have them.
review_translated_text: Pedimos dos ensaladas y no tenian

review_text: Tell us which part of the meat you want, because if you dont say it, it will be overcooked.
review_translated_text: Fale qual ponto da carne vc quer, pois se nao falar vem muito passada.

review_text: Good food, beautiful atmosphere, but the service is the worst in Buenos Aires.
review_translated_text: Comida boa, ambiente bonito, mas o atendimento e o pior de Buenos Aires.

review_text: Delicious food and the desserts were all exquisite, my favorites were the tiramisu and the panna cota!
review_translated_text: Comida deliciosa y los postres todos exquisitos, mis preferidos el tiramisu y el panna cota!

review_text: Very bad mistreatment of the man who is at the cashier towards the employees, it is not a rude and arrogant way to treat them and speak to them.

review_text: conflict

review_text: Delicious!!!

review_text: Very bad service. The waiters were slow to serve. They wrote down one more wrong order, the most expensive meat we ordered came doubled. The price is very expensive for food that is not good and takes a long time to arrive. I do not recommend!
response_from_owner_text: Good night. We apologize for the experience you had in our restaurant. We take pride in the service we provide and the quality of our food. There are times when high demand causes a slight delay in orders but it is not customary or policy to leave customers unattended. Its simply that all our clients are equally important. Thank you and we hope you can give us a second chance.
review_translated_text: Servico muito ruim. Os garcons demoraram a atender. Anotaram um pedido errado a mais, justamente a carne mais cara que pedimos veio dobrada. O preco e muito caro para uma comida que nao e boa e que demora a chegar. Nao recomendo!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Buenas noches. Nos disculpamos por la experiencia que paso en nuestro restaurante. Nos enorgullecemos en el servicio que brindamos y la calidad de nuestra comida. Hay momentos en que la alta demanda provoca una pequena demora en los pedidos pero no es costumbre ni politica dejar sin atender a los clientes. Es simplemente que todos nuestros clientes son igual de importantes. Gracias y esperamos que nos pueda dar una segunda oportunidad.

review_text: The best grill Ive ever been to, really. Incredible and every time I come back it gets better and better.
review_translated_text: La mejor parrilla que ya fui, de verdad. Increible y siempre que vuelvo es cada vez mejor.

review_text: One of the best steaks I had during our Argentina trip. Nice, attentive service, highly recommended.
The canateros are super friendly, and we ate the best parilleros throughout Argentina. Kid-friendliness: An unforgettable birthday, with limoncello.
review_translated_text: Los canateros son super amables, y comiamos los mejores parilleros por toda Argentina. Kid-friendliness: Un cumpleanos inolvidable,con limoncello.

review_text: Excellent food! And the staff are super friendly.. Couldnt ask for more
Wonderful restaurant in the middle of Iguazu Falls park. Great buffet with a South American style BBQ station. Really enjoyed the food.
It s ok - not many options but the food was fine.
Ancho so well done I thought it was charcoal.
You can taste and compare about 5 types of meat.
The service and environment are top notch! The barbecue is very good! The buffet and dessert are average.

review_text: I can say that the prices are quite good compared to Iguazu. A hearty menu with drinks costs 12-13 USD. Tastes were good

review_text: Stopped for lunch during visit to Iguazu falls. Fairly busy. Lots of choices in lunch buffet. Service was prompt and friendly.

They don t have vegan or vegetarian protein. They could make beans without meat, but they told us they won t do it. They told us they have enough salads. If they want tourism they should think about everybody.
Excellent Kid-friendliness: It is the best, you are with the noise that the waterfalls make and surrounded by vegetation, the children really enjoy the place Wheelchair accessibility: Yeah
review_translated_text: Excelente Kid-friendliness: Es lo mas, estas con el ruidos q hacen las cataratas y rodeados de vegetacion, los ninos disfrutan mucho del lugar Wheelchair accessibility: Si

review_text: Very good, very expensive

review_text: Armed robbery. 12/19/23 1 jyq empanada, $1600 2 small potato cones, $5000 1 Sprite 375 ml, $1900 Magnets, 6500. Mugs with inscriptions referring to CDI, between 18 and 24k. Expensive and not rich. They take advantage of foreign tourists. There is no need to go back.

review_translated_text: In buen bufete

review_text: The place is nice, accessible for people with disabilities. The attention and organization of the staff is very good, Kevin attended to us at night and was very friendly. The food is TERRIBLE!! And excessive price

review_text: We ate pasta! One with seafood and another with cheese sauce for celiacs. Celiac is a package deal! We drink wine. Reduced menu. Very expensive and without homemade pasta, at least the celiac one. Almost 70,000 Dietary restrictions: For celiacs!
review_translated_text: Comimos pastas! Una con mariscos y otra con salsa de queso para celiacos. La celiaca es de paquete!  Tomamos vino. Carta reducida. Carisimo y sin pastas caseras, al menos la celiaca. Casi 70.000 Dietary restrictions: Para celiacos!

review_text: The place was too dark, you couldnt read the menu I ate Risotto, the rice was raw The best? Some eggplant canapes that they brought us along with the bread basket
A unique, beautiful place, with some of the best service I have ever experienced. The food, a separate luxury. Mega recommended! A special mention and all our thanks to Guillermo.
review_translated_text: Un lugar unico, hermoso, con una de las mejores atenciones que experimente. La comida, un lujo aparte. Mega recomendable! Una mencion especial y todo nuestro agradecimiento para Guillermo.

review_text: Excellent service, highlighting Guillermo in his work, a crack!
review_translated_text: Excelente el servicio, destacando a Guillermo en su labor, un crack!

review_text: A unique experience of exquisite Italian food in a quiet and intimate atmosphere. We must highlight Guillermos fantastic service, friendly, attentive and knowledgeable about the details of each dish. Thank you! Super recommended!
review_translated_text: Una experiencia unica de exquisita comida italiana en un ambiente tranquilo e intimo. Debemos destacar la fantastica atencion de Guillermo, amable, atento y conocedor de los detalles de cada plato. Gracias! Super recomendable!

review_text: The waiters are friendly but there are opportunities for improvement in everything in general... I think the place that appears is more than what it is... As soon as you arrive they serve you water without asking you if you want it, which you assume is free. Well no! They charge you separately from the cover. They take a long time to bring the menu and take your order. The dishes are abundant, the caccio e pepe gave me the feeling that the waiter didnt know what else to scrape from the orma... its delicious but it didnt dazzle me. The noodles with seafood were delicious and so was the ham with burrada. The wine lacked cold. Thats it, a figure of 6 numbers for 4 people Which left a lot to be desired.
review_translated_text: Los mozos son amables pero hay oportunidades de mejora en todo en general... creo que el lugar  que aparenta mas de lo que es.... Ni bien llegas te sirven agua sin preguntarte si queres, lo que uno asume que es gratis. Pues no! Te la cobran aparte del cubierto. Demoran mucho en traer la carta y tomarte el pedido. Los platos son abundantes, el caccio e pepe me dio la sensacion que el mozo ya no sabia que mas raspar de la orma... es rico pero no me deslumbro. Los fideos con mariscos estaban ricos y el jamon con burrada tambien. El vino le faltaba frio. Es fin, una cifra de 6 numeros para 4 personas Que dejo mucho que desear.

review_text: The best!

I loved this restaurant!!! The place is beautiful, the food is the best I have ever eaten!!! And of course he couldnt fail to mention the attention of all his staff, especially Marcials. I congratulate you and may the successes continue!!!
review_translated_text: Me encanto este restaurante!!! El sitio bellisimo, la comida lo mejor que he comido!!! Y por supuesto no podia dejar de nombrar la atencion de todo su personal, en especial el de Marcial. Los felicito y que sigan los exitos!!!

review_text: The noodles in the cheese mold, spectacular
review_translated_text: Los fideos en la horma de queso, espectaculares

review_text: Excellent
review_translated_text: Excelente

review_text: We enjoyed an excellent evening, everything was impeccable, the food exceptional.
review_translated_text: Disfrutamos una velada excelente, todo fue impecable, la comida excepcional.

review_text: The food my partner ordered was great, mine was hard to swallow. The attention was amazing, the waiters were super nice , the decor was pretty, but I left with a sad taste. Just to be nice to the staff I wont post the photo of what I ate.

The price of the dishes, especially that of the day, is very affordable. Anyway, we ordered a 6-slice pizza, (fugazzeta and Pepsi line soda) and it was a lunch that went through paperwork. In this regard, it took them a long time to bring it. We sat in one of the boxes, close to the window and there was a lot of noise from both inside (I suppose due to glass bouncing, I honestly couldnt say since I am not an expert in acoustics, nor was I sitting in another sector to compare) and From the outside with the high window half open there was a lot of noise from vehicular traffic. Bus lines and horns of people in a hurry pass by. I didnt go to the bathrooms or stay too long to evaluate other things. The service wasnt bad, but I wasnt there for long either.
review_translated_text: El precio de los platos, sobre todo el del dia muy accesible. De todas formas nosotros pedimos pizza de 6 porciones, (fugazzeta y gaseso linea Pepsi) y fue un almuerzo al paso por tramites. Al respecto demoraron bastante en traerla. Nos sentamos en uno de los boxes, cercano a la ventana y habia muchisimo ruido tanto de interior ( supongo por rebote en vidrios, la verdad no sabria decir ya que no soy experta en acustica no tampoco estuve sentada en otro sector como para comparar) y del exterior con la ventana alta a medio abrir habia mucho ruido de trafico vehicular. Pasan lineas de colectivos y bocinas de gente apurada. No pase a los banos ni estuve demasiado como para evaluar otras cosas. La atencion no fue mala, pero tampoco estuve mucho tiempo.

review_text: Average delicious pizza with 6 slices for 10 thousand pesos; you just need to adjust the service better;
review_translated_text: Pizza gostosa mediana de 6 fatias de 10 mil pesos; so precisa ajustar melhor o atendimento;

review_text: We will return, exquisite gastronomy
review_translated_text: Vamos a volver, exquisita gastronomia

review_text: The Calabrian pizza was pretty good, the eating spaces are quite small and the atmosphere is quite simple.
review_translated_text: La pizza de calabresa estaba bastante bien, los espacios para comer son bastante chicos y el ambiente es bastante simple.

review_text: Very delicious food!
review_translated_text: Muy rica comida!

review_text: Good attention
review_translated_text: Buena atencion

review_text: The place is not nice, somewhat neglected, very closed inside. The arugula and ham pizza $15,900 a pint $2900
review_translated_text: No es lindo el lugar , algo descuidado, muy cerrado dentro. La pizza de rucula y jamon $ 15.900 una pinta $2900

review_text: Good price-quality ratio.
review_translated_text: Buena relacion  precio - calidad.

review_text: A spectacle the attention and food. Quiet atmosphere and very good vibes and food!!
review_translated_text: Un espectaculo la atencion y comida. Ambiente tranqui y muy buena onda y comida!!

review_text: Very nice place, food and attention! I recommend!
review_translated_text: Muy lindo lugar, comida y atencion! Recomiendo!

review_text: Beautiful Everything!
review_translated_text: Bello Todo!

review_text: I loved! The chef (Marco) gave me a special menu because he knows that I dont like Italian food a bit (I only eat noodles HAHA) nice patio and beautiful service and the owner was super kind to me
review_translated_text: Me encanto! El chef (Marco) me dio un menu especial porque sabe que no me gusta un poco la comida italiana (solamente como fideos JAJA) lindo patio y hermoso servicio y la duena super amable conmigo

review_text: Incredible place with a lot of peace, very good prices, delicious food and excellent service
review_translated_text: Lugar increible con mucha paz, precios muy buenos, comida riquisima y excelente atencion

review_text: Very good service and very good prices.
review_translated_text: Muy buena atencion y muy buenos precios.

review_text: Very good experience. The food is fair but very tasty. Very good prices and in our case excellent service from the Mosa.
review_translated_text: Muy buena experiencia. La comida justa pero muy sabrosa. Los precios muy buenos y en nuestro caso una excelente atencion de la mosa.

review_text: Very good experience. Recommendable.

Beautiful old house, with tables inside and in the patio. I have to visit them on a very hot day and they have no air or fans. It was almost empty, so the service was very fast, the portions seemed generous to me. I ordered a tower of eggplant, with tomato sauce and gratin cheese, my companion a tower of potatoes that also come with gratin cheese, all very delicious. Parking: It is difficult to find places on the street, there are parking garages nearby and you pay by the hour.
review_translated_text: Hermosa casona antigua, con mesas dentro y en el patio. Me toco visitarlos en un dia muy caluroso y no tienen aire ni ventiladores. Estaba casi vacio, por lo que la atencion fue muy rapida, me parecieron generosas las porciones. Yo pedi una torre de berenjenas, con salsa de tomate y queso gratinado, mi acompanante una torre de papas que tambien vienen con queso gratinado, todo muy rico. Parking: Es dificil encontrar lugares en la calle, existen cocheras para estacionamiento cercanos y se paga por hora.

review_text: We had a mishap where we waited 2 hours and couldnt eat. They lost our command, but this happens and its okay. The place is beautiful but we werent able to taste the food, which looked wonderful. The owner apologized to me and I understand what happened, Im just describing it in order to help you improve.
review_translated_text: Tivemos um contratempo onde ficamos 2 horas esperando e nao conseguimos comer. Perderam nossa comanda, mas isto acontece e nao tem problema. O lugar e lindo mas nao conseguimos degustar a comida que estava com aspecto maravilhoso . A dona me pediu desculpas e entendo o ocorrido, so estou descrevendo com intuito de ajudarem a melhorar

review_text: We used to come with my family and we even brought several friends to see the place. Today we attended and it was a disaster. It took them 20 minutes to serve us and more than 1 hour and 30 to bring the food. One of the dishes was even brought some time later. The food was very spicy and overcooked, the quality dropped a lot. At one point we asked if it was too long before the dishes were delivered and we never got an answer. 4 families sat down and ended up leaving since they were never attended to. The truth is completely disappointed in the experience since it was a restaurant that we used to enjoy. Very bad treatment and attention
review_translated_text: Soliamos venir con mi familia e incluso trajimos a varios amigos para que conozcan el lugar. Hoy concurrimos y fue todo un desastre. Tardaron 20 minutos para atendernos y mas de 1 hora y 30 para traer la comida. Incluso uno de los platos lo trajeron un tiempo despues. La comida estaba muy picante y pasada de pimienta, bajo mucho la calidad. En determinado momento preguntamos si faltaba mucho para que entreguen los platos y nunca obtuvimos respuesta. 4 familias se sentaron y se terminaron yendo ya que nunca los atendieron. La verdad completamente decepcionada de la experiencia ya que era un restaurante que soliamos disfrutar. Muy mal trato y atencion

review_text: Horrible place. I came two years ago and it was great. I came again and it was a disaster. 30 minutes for the menu, 20 minutes to come take our order and then 1 HOUR AND A HALF to bring the food. We didnt leave before they brought the food because it was already late, but it was a disaster. During all that time, people were coming in to play in the room, which should make the place more pleasant, but playing loudly and poorly produces the opposite. If I could I would give it negative stars.
review_translated_text: Horrible lugar. Vine hace dos anos y estuvo barbaro. Volvi a venir y fue un desastre. 30 minutos para la carta, 20 minutos en venir a tomarnos el pedido y despues 1 HORA Y MEDIA en traer la comida. No nos fuimos antes que trajeran la comida porque ya era tarde, pero un desastre. Durante todo ese tiempo iban entrando gente a tocar en el salon lo cual deberia hacer mas ameno el lugar, pero tocando al palo y mal produce todo lo contrario. Si podria le pondria estrellas negativas.

review_text: 30 minutes to be served and more than an hour and a half waiting for the food, they never told us the reason. But the worst was having to listen to 3 artists in a row drilling into your head and not letting you eat in peace.
review_translated_text: 30 minutos para que nos atiendan y mas de una hora y media esperando la comida, nunca nos dijeron el motivo. Pero lo peor fue tener que escuchar a 3 artistas seguidos taladrandote la cabeza y no dejandote comer en paz

review_text: Very good place. Also ideal for events.
review_translated_text: Muy buen lugar. Ideal tambien para eventos.

review_text: The gastronomy, atmosphere and service is excellent. The place is spacious and comfortable. Ideal for lovers of Italian culture.
Excellent service, quick service, very friendly. Delicious food and a very nice atmosphere.
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio, rapida en la atencion, muy amable. Riquisima la comida y un ambiente muy lindo.

review_text: I went to a wedding. Excellent attention. I loved the decoration and the patio, a dream full of plants and very period.
review_translated_text: Fui a un casamiento. Excelente atencion. Me encanto la decoracion y el patio un sueno lleno de plantas y muy de epoca

review_text: Beautiful place, very well decorated inside and outside, but the service was not the best, they were respectful, but we were in the patio and they rarely came out to serve us. Then there were delays in the kitchen and the food was delicious, but nothing that stands out, I think they can improve.
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar, muy bien ambientado adentro y afuera, pero la atencion no fue de las mejores, fueron respetuosos, pero nosotros estabamos en el patio y salian poco a atendernos. Luego hubo demoras en la cocina y la comida estuvo rica, pero nada que resalte, creo que pueden mejorar.

review_text: Insufficient menu, there is no stuffed pasta, there was no spaghetti, pre-cooked risotto without fungui in sight, orechietti with peanuts without nuts. They do not have peccorino. Good attention. It was better before, I wont go back!!!
review_translated_text: Carta insuficiente, no hay pasta rellena, no habia spaghetti,risoto precocinado sin fungui a la vista, orechietti con mani sin nueces. No tienen peccorino.Buena atencion. Antes era mejor, no vuelvo mas!!!

review_text: Authentic Italian food. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our experience here. The manager, Lucas, went above and beyond to make our meal excellent. Highly recommend!!! Ask him for the house special where he shreds the Parmesan by hand.
Very good food The excessive price And several prices are not listed
We came at 4:50 p.m. and it was closed until 7:00 p.m. They told me it was because of summer time. They should update the schedules on Google Maps to prevent customers from wasting their time.
review_translated_text: Vinimos a las 16:50 y estaba cerrado hasta las 19:00. Me comentaron que fue por horario de verano. Deberian actualizar los horarios en google maps para evitar que los clientes pierdan su tiempo

review_text: Excellent attention especially chef Daniele and his team, very good dishes especially c oleo chocolate mousse Super recommended!!
Excellent trattoria, the pasta alla ruota is wonderful, the tiramisu is the same, the attention 10 out of 10
review_translated_text: Excelente trattoria, la pasta alla ruota una maravilla, el tiramisu igual, la atencion 10 de 10

review_text: Very delicious place to eat good pasta. The attention is fast and good. Yes or yes, order the pappardelle pesto and gorgonzola and the chocolate mousse. The menu could have more variety and is a little expensive but very delicious.
review_translated_text: Lugar muy rico para comer una buena pasta. La atencion es rapida y buena. Si o si pedir los pappardelle pesto y gorgonzola y la mousse de chocolate. La carta podria tener mas variedad y es un poco caro pero muy rico.

review_text: I love it, excellent food, fair price and good service. I recommend it!!
review_translated_text: Adoro, excelente comida, preco justo e bom servico. Recomendo sim!!

review_text: Its not worth what they charge. Noodles full of cheese not stuffed pasta, ribbons of wheat flour)...Dec 2023, each dish cost around $15,000. Massive place, air was not good. For that price there are much better places.
review_translated_text: No vale lo que cobran. Fideos lleno de queso no pastas rellenas, cintas de harina de trigo)...dic 2023, cada plato costo alrededor de $15000. Lugar maso, aire no andaba bien. Por ese precio hay lugares muy superiores.

review_text: Pretentious place, with crazy prices and common food, without anything exceptional. For 2 dishes, a dessert and a wine we paid more than $40,000. I would not return
review_translated_text: Lugar pretencioso, con precios delirantes y comida comun, sin nada excepcional. Por 2 platos, un postre y un vino pagamos mas de $40000 No volveria

review_text: Beautiful place !!!! Above all Cecilia, a genius!!! excellent attention he gave us!!!!!
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar !!!! Sobre todo Cecilia una genia !!!  excelente atencion  que nos dio!!!!!

review_text: The food excellent. The view is wonderful. Impeccable service. Cecilia is great. Highly recommended!!!
review_translated_text: La comida excelente. La vista una maravilla. El servicio impecable. Cecilia una genial. Muy recomendable!!!

review_text: Everything was very good except for the steak, which I asked for juicy and it was completely raw. I returned it and I didnt want to continue eating because I went with my family and they deducted 10% of the value of the steak. A shame The incredible view
Great! Good ambient music, to be perfect, the only thing missing was live music
review_translated_text: Excelente! Boa musica ambiente,  pra ser perfeito, so faltou musica ao vivo

review_text: A dinner with live music, a view of the triple border with delicious food. Everything impeccable.
review_translated_text: Una cena con musica en vivo, una vista de la triple frontera con deliciosa comida. Todo impecable.

review_text: Nice place, very good attention and dedication from the girl who served us, pretty good prices. recommendable
review_translated_text: Lindo lugar, muy buena atencion y dedicacion de la chica q nos sirvio, bastante bueno los precios. Recomendable

review_text: Beautiful view of the river, good prices, rich and abundant.
review_translated_text: Hermosa vista al rio,  buenos precios, rico y abundante.

review_text: The view is a privilege! Kid-friendliness: Its a family atmosphere
Very delicious pizzas
review_translated_text: Muy ricas pizzas

review_text: Beautiful view, abundant gnocchi and bondiola dishes with flavor and good presentation, waiters with good service. Desserts not recommended Brownie is sponge cake and was burnt. Cheese cake with cookie dough served in a jar that is very uncomfortable to eat.

Beautiful place, beautiful view and delicious food. Beautiful view of the union of the Iguazu and Parana rivers, from its terrace you can see the coasts of the three countries. It has a very extensive menu that can satisfy different palates. The wine list is acceptable as is the beer list; If you go in a group or as a family, the only drawback I can find is that both water and soft drinks are served in cans or small bottles, which means you have to order several units and thus generates a lot of waste. The service is excellent both in the attention and in the preparation of the dishes. The times we went there was live music. Super recommended for all occasions.
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar, hermosa vista y comida riquisima. Hermosa vista de la union del rio Iguazu y el Parana, desde su terraza se pueden ver las costas de los tres paises. Cuenta con un menu bien amplio y que puede satisfacer a diferentes paladares. La carta de vinos es aceptable al igual que la de las cervezas; si vas en grupo o en familia, la unica contra que encuentro es que tanto las aguas como las gaseosas se sirven en lata o botellas pequenas, lo que hace que se deba pedir varias unidades y asi se generen muchos residuos. El servicio es excelente tanto en la atencion como en la preparacion de los platos. Las veces que fuimos habia musica en vivo. Super recomendable para toda ocasion.

review_text: Excellent everything
review_translated_text: Excelente todo

review_text: Great food, very good lamb
review_translated_text: Gran comida, el cordero muy bueno

review_text: Excellent attention from Pablo!!!!
review_translated_text: Excelente la atencion de Pablo!!!!

review_text: They served us 10. Pablo, our waiter, very good attention. Thankssss
Excellent attention from Pablo!!!! A genius!!!
review_translated_text: Excelente la atencion de Pablo!!!! Un genio!!!

review_text: Just awesome!

It wasnt what I expected, the bartender wasnt there, it was bad there because I was going partly for the signature cocktails, the waiter recommended mojito, I said yes, but when it arrived it was disgusting, then he fixed it and it was worse than before, In order not to ruin the night, I ordered a Fernet with coke and I didnt drink it and I told the waiter when he asked me. Then for the starter we ordered meat empanadas 10/10, very delicious, the main course was medium bland, very average, I imagined something much better to be honest, I reach that level at home, and the dessert was very delicious, the pancakes. In conclusion, it is not worth going because for some good empanadas there are a million cheaper options and the dessert is everywhere, finally the waiter also charged me on the bill for the lousy mojito and the worst of my life, He wasnt even ashamed     I have also worked in restaurants and the recipe for mojitos abounds on the internet
review_translated_text: No era lo que esperaba, no estaba el barman, mal ahi porque iba en parte por los cocteles de autor, el garzon me recomienda mojito, le dije que si, pero cuando llego estaba asqueroso, luego lo  arreglo  quedo peor que antes, para no arruinar la noche me pedi un Fernet con coca y no me lo tome y le dije al garzon cuando me pregunto. Luego la entrada pedimos empanadas de carne 10/10 muy ricas, el plato de fondo medio soso, muy regular, me imagine algo mucho mejor la verdad, ese nivel lo alcanzo en mi casa, y el postre muy rico los panqueques. En conclusion, no vale la pena ir porque por unas buenas empanadas hay un millon de opciones mas baratas y el postre se encuentra en todos lados, finalmente el garzon de igual forma me cobro en la cuenta el pesimo mojito y el peor de mi vida, no le dio ni verguenza     yo igual he trabajado en restaurantes y la receta de los mojitos abundan en internet

review_text: Excellent place and very good gastronomy, Geronimos attention was excellent, values according to the place
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar y muy buena gastronomia ,, la atencion de Geronimo fue excelente, valores acorde el lugar

review_text: Wonderful food, impeccable and attentive service from Pablo made our experience even more pleasant, we recommend the restaurant and without a doubt we will return whenever we are in Bariloche. Pablo congratulates you on your service!
Pablo was attentive and kind throughout our stay. Wonderful food!
review_translated_text: Pablo foi atencioso e gentil o tempo toda da nossa permanencia. Comida maravilhosa!

review_text: 6 of us went for lunch and some of us described it as  one of the best dinners of our lives  the perfect food and wonderful desserts. Although what stands out was the attention of Paz, one of the waitresses, she made us feel at home. Without a doubt 100% recommended
review_translated_text: Fuimos a comer 6 y algunos de nosotros lo describieron como  una de las mejores cenas de nuestra vida   la comida perfecta los postres maravillosos. Aunque a destacar fue la atencion de Paz una de las camareras nos hizo sentirnos como en casa. Sin duda 100% recomendado

review_text: Wonderful place, great service especially from Jonatan. I recommend it to everyone...
review_translated_text: Local maravilhoso,  otimo atendimento em especial pelo Jonatan. Recomendo a todos...

review_text: Beautiful views of the lake, cozy atmosphere and good music. Variety of dishes on the menu. The waiter Jonatan was excellent and very good disposition. The food is nothing remarkable. Extremely expensive prices despite sharing a plate. We will not return.
review_translated_text: Hermosas vistas al lago, ambiente acogedor y buena musica. Variedad de platos en la carta. El mozo Jonatan excelente y con muy buena disposicion. La comida nada destacable. Precios exageradamente caros a pesar de compartir plato. No volveremos.

review_text: comfortable place Very good attention from Jonatan but the super exorbitant prices out of reach of the pocket super expensive
Everything excellent. Pablos attention a 10!!
review_translated_text: Todo excelente. La atencion de Pablo un 10!!

review_text: Pablo, who attended us, a genius!
review_translated_text: Pablo, quien nos atendio, un genio!

review_text: Very good attention from Pablo! Dietary restrictions: Non-touch options
Perfect service from waiter Jonatan! And very good food!!!
review_translated_text: Atendimento perfecto del camarero Jonatan! Y comida muy buena!!!

response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Sergio!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Sergio !

review_text: Iconic ristorante, the service is very friendly, attentive and fast, the pastas are generally abundant and of very good quality, perhaps it would lack a little presentation, but it does not lose charm. The atmosphere is a little noisy so it takes away some seriousness. Parking: Parking with entrance near a service station around the corner, with direct access to restaurants, one hour bonus
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Luciano! We hope to welcome you again soon!
review_translated_text: Iconico ristorante, el servicio es muy amigable, atento y rapido, las pastas son por lo general abundantes y de muy buena calidad, tal vez le faltaria un poco de presentacion, pero no pierde encanto. El ambiente es un poco ruidoso por lo que le quita cierta seriedad. Parking: Estacionamiento con entrada cerca de una estacion de servicio a la vuelta, con acceso directo a los restaurantes, una hora bonificada
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Luciano ! Esperamos volver a recibirlo pronto !

review_text: We had a problem with the spinach fritters which were very hard, the rest of the food was very good. Excellent attention as always
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Carlos, we are sorry that you had a problem with the fritters, when something is not to your liking please let us know and we will change it immediately. We hope to welcome you again soon! Kind regards
review_translated_text: Tuvimos un problema con los bunuelos de espinaca que estaban muy duros, el resto de la comida muy bien . La atencion excelente como siempre
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Carlos lamentamos que haya tenido un inconveniente con los bunuelos , cuando algo no sea de su agrado por favor usted nos deja saber y se lo cambiamos de inmediato . Esperamos volver a recibirlo nuevamente pronto ! Saludos cordiales

review_text: Excellent place, waiters of 10, super friendly, abundant food. Like and cute.

review_text: Excellent beef, super excellent wines (see pics) and service and friendliness you cannot beat. What a friendly, welcoming place. My filet was top notch. Im from Alberta Canada AND a picky eater. The burrata salad- fresh and flavorful. The filets- perfectly done. The Spanish style French fries who hoo! Loved them! The deserts- apple crepe and a limonata- both huge portions but who cares?? They were delicious! Dana was our server- so friendly. Reuben- told us where to shop for gear after AIR CANADA lost my husbands bag(PS. NEVER FLY AIR CANADA). Both excellent people and I highly recommend this restaurant.
