review_text: Very bad attention from the waiter. I had an awkward moment.
review_translated_text: Muy mala la atencion del mozo. Pase un momento incomodo.

review_text: Believe me when I tell you that I dont mind paying whatever it takes to eat well. The cefira exceeded my expectations, I ordered black dough panzottis (squid ink) stuffed with salmon, it was delicious... mild in flavor because of the pink sauce that had milk cream and at the same time intense because of the salmon, the dough was just right just... A flavor that brings to mind good times. Highly recommended
review_translated_text: Creanme cuando les digo que no me importa pagar lo que sea por comer bien. La cefira supero mis expectativas, pedi panzottis de masa negra (de tinta de calamar ) relleno de salmon, estaba riquisimo.. de sabor suave por la salsa rosa q tenia crema de leche y a la ves intenso por el salmon, la masa en su punto justo... Un sabor que te trae a la mente buenos momentos. Muy recomendable

review_text: Exquisite food! Its like eating at home with grandmas recipes!! They serve with unusual kindness!! You wont regret it!!!
review_translated_text: Exquisita comida! Es como comer en casa con las recetas de la abuela!!. Atienden con una amabilidad poco comun!!. No se van a arrepentir!!!

review_text: I liked the pastas that we enjoyed, the waiters and the owner were very friendly, I recommend everything clean and tidy!!
review_translated_text: Me gusto riquisimas las pastas que desgustamos muy amable los mozos y la duena lo recomiendo todo limpio y ordenado!!

review_text: Very pleasant and a very light dough! I just thought the portion was small (you see, thats what I ordered, lasagna), but very light and tasty! Cozy atmosphere.
review_translated_text: Muito agradavel e uma massa bem leve! So achei a porcao pequena (vai ver foi a que pedi, lasanha), mas muito leve, saborosa! Ambiente aconchegante.

review_text: It is eaten very well, recommended
review_translated_text: Se come muy bien recomendable

review_text: The pastas I tried were delicious: the gnocchi with forest sauce and the brie cheese ravioli with pink sauce. Excellent service, warm, friendly and super attentive. If you are about to jump in and feel like eating some pasta. This place is ideal for it.
review_translated_text: Riquisimas las pastas que probe: los noquis con salsa bosque y los ravioles de queso brie con salsa rosada. Excelente la atencion, calidos, amables y super atentos. Si estas por salta y te dan ganas de comer algo de pastas. Este lugar es ideal para ello.

review_text: Very good place but closes very early
review_translated_text: Muy buen lugar pero cierra muy temprano

review_text: Good service and friendliness. Bad experience eating pasta. Very small and uncomfortable plates for the sauce. Mushrooms flavored with wine alcohol. Very liquid sauces. Very salty dishes.
review_translated_text: Buen servicio y amabilidad. Mala experiencia comiendo pastas. Platos muy pequenos e incomodos para la salsa. Hongos con sabor a alcohol del vino. Salsas muy liquidas. Platos muy salados.

review_text: In a city, Salta, where the vast majority of restaurants are grills, La Cefira has been, for years, gourmet cuisine.
review_translated_text: En una ciudad, Salta, donde la gran mayoria de los restaurantes son parrilladas, La Cefira es, desde hace anos, cocina-gourmet.

review_text: Everything was just perfect
Restaurant to eat pasta. Cozy atmosphere, good music!
review_translated_text: Restaurante para comer pastas. Ambiente acogedor, buena musica !

review_text: The 4 cheese sorrentinos were very delicious, the place was well decorated and the service is one of the best I have received so far
review_translated_text: Muy rico los sorrentinos de 4 quesos, el lugar estaba bien ambientado y el servicio es uno de los mejores que recibi hasta el momento

review_text: There is a kids menu, and the kids pizza is delicious. The staff is also very friendly.

I went in without making a reservation because I arrived a little early to accommodate my childs time, but since there was a line afterward, I think it would be smoother to make a reservation. The menu is written in Japanese, and there is also a kids menu. The avocado spring rolls were really delicious, but when I ordered them thinking about the size of spring rolls, they were much larger than I expected and I couldnt finish them all. If you ask for a take-out container for the leftovers, youll receive a pizza box, so I packed it myself and took it home. All dishes were delicious. Kid-friendliness: The store is spacious, so there is space to store strollers. They have small pizzas for kids at a great price. When I asked for water for my child, it was given to me in a plastic cup with a lid. No cutlery for children. There are chairs for children.
review_translated_text: Kid-friendliness:

review_text: I left my phone behind and went back, so they took good care of it.

If you are looking for a nice dine in pizza/pasta restaurant, this is one of the places on Guam you can go.  Their food is always good here.  We had their portobello mushroom ravioli, avocado club egg rolls, and margherita pizza.
Pizza was under cooked. The avocado rolls were okay. Sangria barely had any fruit. Service was not great even though they were not busy.

The burnt taste of the steak and pizza was so bad that I couldnt eat it. The inside of the steak is red, but the outside is too burnt... Pasta is okay. Its busy, but the staff are reasonably friendly~

I ordered AVOCADO CLUB EGG ROLLS and original BBQ chicken pizza. The egg roll is quite heavy and voluminous. I didnt have much of an appetite, so when my husband and I shared it (3 slices each), we could only eat one slice of the main pizza. However, the taste is excellent. If it were served at a Japanese izakaya, it would probably become a popular menu item. You can get water for free. Kid-friendliness: Childrens bolognese is easy to eat because the pasta is fusilli. A little nutmeg? Or something, and its not Japanese meat sauce but Bolognese. For cutlery, you will receive a set of small spoons and forks. They also provide water in a cup with a lid. The tables are quite high, so it is better to check if there are childrens chairs.
review_translated_text: AVOCADO CLUB EGG ROLLS        BBQ                                                    2         3             1 Kid-friendliness:

review_text: Be sure to try the miso shrimp salad. The staff are all friendly and the food is really delicious. Also, in Guam, there is a saying that steaks are overcooked, so order them medium rare, but here, they cook them honestly, so you can order them medium rare :) Although it is a pizza restaurant, the steak was really delicious.

I enjoyed pizzas and food here before.  However, when I visited last night for to-go, I found a big cockroache hanging on the wall.  I had no choice but to go to another place.  Hope this good restraunt to take better care of hygiene
Guam food overall was salty but delicious.
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: It was delicious too The staff was so friendly I cleaned up my drink while going to the bathroom. Immediately admit your mistake In the meantime, the pizza that came out was burnt, so they made it again. The pizza crust was tasty enough. But dont eat mojito

Spaghetti and salad are okay~ Pizza is delicious! However, the staff at the entrance guiding people to their seats was unfriendly... This is my first time seeing racism in a place where most tourists are Asian. The server was friendly.
The pizza was fine, Adding shrimp to creamy pasta is a must.

The food was excellent - we already know several restaurants in Puerto Iguazu but this one was missing and it definitely made it into our top 3. The price was very fair: we ordered two starters; two main dishes (one with meat - ojo de steak - another with pasta - gnocchis rellenos); dv catena; and everything came out to 255.00. The exchange rate is the same as that used in the citys restaurants and almost the same as at the currency exchange store. I recommend!!!
review_translated_text: A comida estava excelente - ja conhecemos diversos restaurantes em Puerto Iguazu mas faltava esse e definitivamente entrou em nosso top 3. O preco muito justo: pedimos duas entradas; dois pratos principais (um com carne - ojo de bife - outro de massa - nhoquis rellenos); dv catena; e tudo saiu 255,00. Cotacao e a mesma praticada nos restaurantes da cidade e quase igual a loja de cambio. Recomendo!!!

review_text: It was delicious. They did charge us more for not staying there. They didnt tell us in advance.
review_translated_text: Estaba muy rico. Si nos cobraron mas por no hospedarnos ahi. No nos lo dijeron con anticipacion.

review_text: I didnt love the food, but good presentation. They charged us more than the price on the menu for not staying at the hotel (we didnt know before).
Beautiful place for dinner. Excellent quality food, impressive wine cellar.
review_translated_text: Lindo local para jantar. Comida de Excelente qualidade, adega que impressiona.

review_text: Um excelente lugar para apreciar um belo corte argentino acompanhado de um vinho. Local agradavel, com atendimento impecavel. As empanadas estavam divinas. Pedi carne mal passada e o ponto veio perfeito. Se sobremesa, o famoso doce de leite argentino acompanhado de sorvete. Recomendo a experiencia para brasileiros que buscam um local bacana em puerto iguazu.
Top of the range Price according to the food, and this is worth it The atmosphere of the hotel greatly accompanies

restaurant inside the iguazu jungle lodge hotel. classic, beautiful and elegant environment. we ordered a quinoa salad and gnocchi which were great, the fish was just good. The day we went there was live instrumental music, which was quite pleasant.
review_translated_text: restaurante dentro do hotel iguazu jungle lodge. ambiente classico, bonito e elegante. pedimos uma salada de quinoa e um nhoque que estavam otimos, o peixe apenas bom. no dia que fomos tinha musica instrumental ao vivo, bastante agradavel.

review_text: I dont understand why the rating is so high. Cost-effectiveness is poor.
response_from_owner_text: We are sorry to hear that your experience at Jungle did not meet your expectations. Our team is committed to providing high quality food and excellent service. We take your feedback seriously and continue to improve, but sometimes we may not recognize or appreciate what someone has said. We would also like to thank you for your valuable feedback and will continue to be interested. Thank you. S.A.C.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Jungle                          .                                          .                    ,                 ,                                          .                        ,                     . . S.A.C

review_text: Still wonderful! I went about 5 years ago and only now came back, its still very tasty, with flavor, well made and not expensive. Very good service! Very helpful waiters and very polite service, I will definitely be back! Grade 10! The dessert was also wonderful!!!
review_translated_text: Continua maravilhoso! Tinha ido ha uns 5 anos atras e so agora voltei, continua muito gostoso, com sabor, bem feito e nao e caro. Atendimento muito bom! Garcons muito prestativos e atendem muito bem com bastante educacao, voltarei com certeza! Nota 10! A sobremesa tbm estava maravilhosa!!!

review_text: I really enjoyed every menu I ordered. Exquisite!!! The attention is excellent
Excellent dishes and attention!
review_translated_text: Excelentes platos y atencion!

review_text: The pizza is delicious, the pasta has a strong olive oil flavor, and the noodles are hard. The price is not expensive, and it is a good choice for a satisfying meal.
review_translated_text: Pizza

review_text: I came here because the Seoul restaurant was closed. The soup was delicious~ The spaghetti was just so-so for my taste~

When I came to Guam with my kids, I got run over by sheep. My daughter wanted to eat Korean food, so I packed a piece of seafood spaghetti after hearing that there was a lot of portion size. Hmm... 4 people, including my three children and myself, ate to our hearts content and enjoyed it.
Staffs are really kind. Dishes size are large. Taste good.

New Policy: You have to pay before any order can be started on. Good luck if youre driving at night. Its too dark and dangerous to try to read out your credit card while driving. We dont need anymore auto accidents. So youll have to pull over and park somewhere. If youre paying by cash, youre screwed. Youll just have to pay when you get to the restaurant, but theyll only start on your order after you pay. And of course thats a 20-40min wait time. Suggestion: Online/app ordering.

The female manager at the desk was very unfriendly. There was racism, and she called in late even though there were seats left. The employees were friendly, but some were not good. I didnt like the explanation as to whether the menu was half-sized or only one coupon could be used. People in Guam and people I know a little bit are nice to me, but I feel like customers are a secondary priority.

Conveniently located in the center of Guams Hotel Road. Actually, the restaurant next door was the steakhouse OUTBACK, and I went to both restaurants on alternate days. Just like in Japan, its a large dish, so youll want to share it with everyone. Kid-friendliness: My daughters favorite is the hearty lasagna from the childrens menu.
review_translated_text: OUTBACK Kid-friendliness:

review_text: The amount of food is huge One pasta dish is enough for two people. The pizza dough is really soft. Caesar salad is just a salad, but there is too much of it. Just as it is basic for everyone to pack and leave when going out.
A store where you can feel safe!
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Im Korean~ I like kimchi and dried fish. The pasta and pizza here arent that great, but theyre pretty good~^^
discrimination?

I left very disappointed and very upset. Im never going again. I regret not seeing the name tag of the male server in charge. Ink pasta, New York steak and drinks Even if you wait 50 minutes after ordering, a male employee will pass by and come out soon. We just said that all the food would be served at once, and another table that came in behind us had the same ink pasta served right away. After waiting for an hour, they barely gave me a piece of pasta, and they only said that the steak would be coming soon, which made me feel so bad that I thought it was racism. The ink pasta wasnt that good and the steak wasnt that good either. Its tough... Later, when I asked for the bill, I felt uncomfortable with the credit card, so I paid in cash and waited for the change and receipt for more than 10 minutes, but they didnt give it to me. So I went to the counter and asked why they didnt give it to me, and then the male employee brought it to me, which made me feel really embarrassed. Even if I come to Guam again, I will never go again. I wouldnt even recommend it.
This is a restaurant where you can eat comfortably.

The food is delicious. The squid is so soft. Calamari seafood spaghetti lasagna and two colas It cost $60 including tip. A 10% service charge is already added at checkout. There is also a tip calculation underneath, so it can be confusing, but just ignore it.

The male employee taking the order was friendly. The food tasted okay, but it was so greasy. I seriously couldnt finish half of it. But it was good up to this point. I hate the attitude of the female staff member blatantly trying to get a tip when paying, so it ruins the atmosphere.
I had a delicious meal. The amount of spaghetti is really big. Rice croquettes, pizza, and spaghetti were delicious.
Pasta was huge and taste alright

The clam chowder was just delicious, not too salty! I was surprised at how big it was, but it was good for two people to eat. I ordered half-size seafood spaghetti for pasta, and it was perfect!! I heard there was a lot of portion, so I ordered one clam chowder soup and one half size pasta and it was perfect for two people :) I highly recommend the seafood spaghetti!! My husband and I both enjoyed our meal so much that it was memorable haha. The seafood was delicious and fresh. I got ice cream by presenting my credit card, but I was so full that I only ate one scoop and had some left over. lol If there are two of you eating pasta, be sure to order a half size! Its not specifically written on the menu, so just mention it when ordering! Highly recommended! And all the staff were friendly^*^
Beautiful place
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar

review_text: Excellent complex to stay in Bariloche outside the center. It is right at the junction of the small circuit and the Swiss colony. The cabins are very well equipped. The common spaces of the hotel look very well cared for. He highlighted the attention of the staff who were friendly and helpful at all times. The breakfast is very complete and you enjoy it with a beautiful view. They have a movie theater that is incredible and worth enjoying. The pool is internal and heated and is ideal for the afternoon after having done some trails and several kilometers of walking. I highly recommend this place. We will be back!.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much German for your comments! We are glad you enjoyed the Bosque experience!
review_translated_text: Excelente complejo para hospedarse en Bariloche fuera del centro. Esta justo en la bifurcacion de circuito chico y colonia suiza. Las cabanas estan muy bien equipadas. Los espacios comunes del hotel se los ve muy cuidados. Destaco la atencion del personal que en todo momento fue amable y servicial. El desayuno es muy completo y lo disfrutas con una hermosa vista. Tienen una sala de cine que esta increible y que vale la pena disfrutar. La pileta es interna y climatizada y es ideal para la tarde luego de haber realizados algun sendero y varios kilometros de caminata. Recomiendo ampliamente este lugar. Volveremos!.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias German por tus comentarios ! Nos alegra que disfrutaran la experiencia de Bosque !

review_text: Stayed in a super comfortable cabin, including hotel services. Breakfast 10 points. Excellent location.
response_from_owner_text: Good morning Rocio! Thanks a lot for sharing your experience !
review_translated_text: Alojados en una cabana super comoda, incluidos los servicios de hotel. Desayuno 10 puntos. Excelente ubicacion.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Buenos dias Rocio ! Muchas gracias por compartir tu experiencia !

review_text: Good place
review_translated_text: Buen lugar

review_text: Very basic and bad breakfast, chalets are much worse than the pictures, cleaner left dirty rags in the sink, very far from the main town, not a good view
response_from_owner_text: Dear Vincent! We would love to know why your rating was so low. Without comments it is difficult to help you. I remain available to assist you. Thank you
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimado Vicent! Nos encantaria saber porque su calificacion fue tan baja. Sin poner comentarios es dificil poder ayudarlo. Quedo a disposicion para asistirlo. Gracias

review_text: Beautiful place
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Natalia!
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Natalia !

review_text: Unbeatable attention. They assisted us with everything we requested and more. Spectacular views. Excellent quality-price ratio not to be missed.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Juliet! We look forward to seeing you again whenever you like!
review_translated_text: Inmejorable atencion. Nos asistieron en todo lo solicitado y mas. Vistas espectaculares. Exelente relacion precio calidad a no perderselo.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Julieta ! Los esperamos de nuevo cuando gusten!

review_text: Beautiful hotel! The superior rooms are well equipped and if you visit the Spa, the massages are crazy, 100% recommended.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Paulina!
review_translated_text: Hermoso Hotel! Las habitaciones superiores bien completas y si visitan el Spa, los masajes son una locura, recomendable 100%
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Paulina !

review_text: A dream place. As seen in the sites publication. 100% recommendable. Rooms: Excellent comfort. Safety: Security in all facilities. Noteworthy details: Preferential attention.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Alejandra! Your words make us very happy!
review_translated_text: Un lugar de ensueno. Tal como se ve en la publicacion del sitio. 100% recomendable. Rooms: Excelente confort. Safety: Seguridad en todas las instalaciones. Noteworthy details: Atencion preferencial.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Alejandra ! Nos ponen muy contentos tus palabras !

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: An unacknowledged misunderstanding on the part of the girl ended up overshadowing what had been a very good experience.
review_translated_text: Un malentendido no asumido de la moza termino opacando lo que venia siendo una muy buena experiencia.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: The food is excellent. Thats why I give it a star. The remaining ones that I should put so that there are 5 unfortunately it will not be like that because the waitress asked her for a kids dish and she clarified that it was kids noodles with butter. Basically. And he brought me and charged me for another dish that was the same but for adults, that is, from the menu. I have no problem paying 9,600 pesos for that dish versus 5,000 and something for the kids. But she defended herself by saying that I ordered that dish and not the kids. Clearly it was not like that. He wanted to be too lively, it seems to me. A shame. Because the experience is very good but that girl in that sense leaves a lot to be desired. Also saying that I asked for that dish when clearly not why each of the adults had ordered their dish and that was for my 3 year old daughter. I cant describe how many restaurants I went to eat. In the north. In the south. Abroad. And dont leave a tip in any of them. Its the first time. Congratulations
review_translated_text: La comida es excelente. Por eso le pongo una estrella. Las restantes que deberia ponerle para que sean 5 lamentablemente no va a ser asi debido que la moza le pedi un plato kids aclarado que era kids fideos con manteca. Basicamente. Y me trajo y cobro otro plato que era lo mismo pero para adultos o sea de la carta. No tengo problema en pagar 9600 pesos que vale ese plato contra 5000 y algo que valia el kids. Pero ella se escudo en que yo le pedi ese plato y no el kids. Claramente no fue asi. Se quiso pasar de viva me parece. Una pena. Por que la experiencia es muy buena pero esa chica en ese sentido deja mucho que desear. Ademas diciendo que yo le pedi ese plato cua do claramente no por que cada uno de los adultos habia pedido su plato y ese era para mi hija de 3 anos. No puedo describir a cuantos restaurantes fui a comer. En el norte. En el sur. En el exterior. Y en ninguno no deje propina. Es la primera vez. Felicitaciones

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: One of the best places to eat in Iguazu, this time we went to the food court and everything was excellent as always!
review_translated_text: Uno de los mejores lugares para comer de Iguazu, esta vez fuimos a patio de comidas y todo excelente como siempre!

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Signature cuisine, delicious dishes, recommended
review_translated_text: Cocina de autor, deliciosos platos, recomendado

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Good meal, humm cellar wine regular. Good service...
review_translated_text: Boa refeicao, vinho humm adega regular. Servico bom ...

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: The best food in all of Argentina, Favios wonderful attention.
review_translated_text: La mejor comida de toda Argentina, la atencion de Favio maravillosa.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Highly recommended from the food, the atmosphere of the place and the attention of the staff, thanks to Matias for his recommendations and congratulations to the chef. A gem in the city of Puerto Iguazu.
review_translated_text: Altamente recomendable desde la comida, la ambientacion del lugar y la atencion del personal, gracias a Matias por sus recomendaciones y felicitaciones al chef. Una joya en la ciudad de Puerto Iguazu.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Everything excellent in this restaurant. Incredible attention provided by the waiters. Very good menu, all delicious dishes. Even the paintings, crockery and cutlery stand out in this restaurant.
review_translated_text: Todo excelente en este restaurante. Increible la atencion brindada por los meseros. Muy buen menu, todos los platos deliciosos. Hasta las pinturas, la vajilla y los cubiertos destacan en este restaurante.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Very good ! And the service was a positive difference! I recommend the filet with malbec and the crepe with crayfish!

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: Excellent gastronomy. Very friendly and attentive service, we ordered the pasta with pancetta and the Malbec loin, everything was delicious. My girl loved the show, I recommend it.
review_translated_text: Excelente gastronomia. Servicio muy amable y atento, pedimos las pastas con panceta y el lomo malbec riquisimo todo. A mi nena le encanto el espectaculo, lo recomiendo.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: We ordered sushi, it took 40 minutes and they told us that a system error they lost the order they had to do it again. It took a while longer, I asked for the bill and I left, I lost one night of my vacation in this place... they offered me a 10% discount if I continued with the order. Thank you, you made me hungry!!
review_translated_text: Pedimos sushi, demoraron 40 minutos y nos dijeron q un error de sistema perdieron el pedido tuvieron q hacerlo nuevamente. Tardaron un rato mas pedi la cuenta y me fui,  perdi una noche de mis vacaciones en este lugar...  me ofrecieron 10% de descuento si seguia con la orden. Gracias me sacaron el hambre!!

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: We had a terrible experience: we ordered a pizza from the kids menu for a 6-year-old girl and after 20 minutes they canceled our order because that menu could not be ordered as it was inside the restaurant (you can only order that on the patio) a justification Totally ridiculous and my niece had to order some kids noodles that had no flavor, some marolio were better. In addition, it literally took them 1 hour to place the order, we went to ask if there was too much left and they responded in a bad way...There were 8 of us and they only gave us a small basket of bread. They said they ran out because there were a lot of people but reservations are made beforehand so they knew how many people were coming. We ordered pasta and they didnt give us grated cheese, we had to ask for it. The service is really bad for the price they charge and the comments we had seen. I wouldnt go again.
review_translated_text: Tuvimos una pesima experiencia: pedimos una pizza de menu kids para una nena de 6 anos y despues de 20 minutos nos cancelaron el pedido porque ese menu no se podia pedir al estar adentro del restoran( solo en el patio se puede pedir eso) una justificacion totalmente ridicula y mi sobrina tuvo que pedir unos fideos kids que no tenian sabor, unos marolio eran mejor. Ademas tardaron literalmente 1 hora en el pedido, fuimos a consultar si faltaba mucho y nos respondieron de mala manera Eramos 8 y nos dieron solo un canastito chico de pan. Dijeron que se quedaron sin mas porque habia mucha gente pero las reservas se hacen antes por ende sabian la cantidad de personas que iban. Pedimos pastas y no nos dieron queso rallado, tuvimos que pedirlo. La atencion realmente mala para el precio que manejan y comentario que habiamos visto. No volveria a ir.

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: It took more than an hour to bring us the food.
review_translated_text: Tardaron mas de una hora en traernos la comida

place_name: De la Fonte Restaurant- Patio de Comida
review_text: We went one day for dinner and we liked it so much that we went again every night we had left of our stay in Iguazu. 10/10
review_translated_text: Fuimos un dia a cenar y nos gusto tanto que volvimos a ir todas las noches que nos quedaban de nuestra estadia en Iguazu. 10/10

review_text: Beautiful place, excellent service, unbeatable food and view!!!
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar, excelente servicio, comida y vista inmejorable!!!

review_text: We enjoyed a Christmas dinner with my family in 2022. Excellent cuisine and extraordinary views! I remember that the chef was Spanish, we congratulated him on the quality of the dishes.
Excellent restaurant
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante

review_text: I went for lunch. Excellent
review_translated_text: Fui almorzar. Excelente

response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter for your rating. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again. a cordial greeting
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Peter por su calificacion. Esperamos tener la oportunidad de recibirlo nuevamente. Un cordial saludo

review_text: Wonderful food   magnificent view    wonderful experience. This region is magical.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Vera for your magnificent review. We hope to welcome you in the near future. Cordially
review_translated_text: Comida maravilhosa   visual magnifico    experiencia maravilhosa. Essa regiao e magica.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Vera por tu magnifica resena. Esperamos recibirte en un futuro cercano. Cordialmente

review_text: Excellent in all aspects, worth what they charge
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ricardo for your excellent review. We hope to welcome you again in the near future. KInd regards.
review_translated_text: Excelente en todo los aspectos, vale lo que cobran

response_from_owner_text: Thank you Claudia for your excellent rating. We hope to welcome you again in the not too distant future. Cordially
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Claudia por su excelente calificacion. Esperamos recibirla nuevamente en un futuro no muy lejano. Cordialmente

review_text: I cant think of a more romantic place to stay.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jose for your excellent review. We hope to welcome you again in the not too distant future. Kind regards
Thank you Guillermo for your outstanding rating. We hope to welcome you in the near future. Cordially
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Guillermo por su sobresaliente calificacion. Esperamos darle la bienvenida en un futuro cercano. Cordialmente

review_text: We went to dinner. Dishes that are not abundant and very high in price. The place is beautiful with a nice view of the lake.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Mariana C, We are sorry that our proposal was not to your liking. We also regret that your assessment is based on price and quantity and not quality. We offer a complete step menu and we consider that the size of the dishes (which are not intended for sharing) and the price are in line with the excellent service we wish to offer, of course this opinion may not be shared. Cordially
review_translated_text: Fuimos a cenar. Platos poco abundantes y muy subidos de precio.  El lugar es hermoso y con linda vista al lago.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimada Mariana C , Lamentamos  que nuestra propuesta no fuera de su agrado. Lamentamos tambien  que su valoracion se base en precio y cantidad y no en calidad. Ofrecemos un menu de pasos completo y consideramos que el tamano de los platos (que no estan pensados para compartir)  como el precio son acordes  al excelente servicio que deseamos ofrecer, por supuesto que esta opinion puede no ser compartida. Cordialmente

review_text: Great experience in an amazing cottage with fabulous view ! I went with a group of 14 friends as one of them was celebrating her birthday. It was excellent ! Alejandra , Camila and all the employees were kind and helpful at all times. Hospitality , great service and comfort are the best here !! The restaurant is top notch and the menu is great ! Breakfast is really complete, with buffet and other options like eggs that you can order every morning . Great location, swimming pool and jacuzzi are a plus ! Thank you for everything! I am sure I will be back with my family !!
response_from_owner_text: Dear Andrea, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Charming. We love reading your great review and knowing that we have met your expectations. We hope to welcome you again in the not too distant future. Kind regards.
Thank you for your excellent rating. We look forward to your visit again in the not too distant future. Cordially
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias por su excelente calificacion. Esperamos su visita nuevamente en un futuro no muy lejano. Cordialmente

review_text: Fantastic hotel; everything amazing.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Emre for your excellent rating. We hope to welcome you again in the near future. A cordial greeting.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Emre por su excelente calificacion. Esperamos darle la bienvenida nuevamente en un futuro cercano. Un cordial saludo.

review_text: Everything was excellent, the place, the view, at least the one we had. The external facilities and the cabins, the attention of all the staff and especially the reception who were always very willing to resolve our concerns even beyond what we expected.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Alberto for your magnificent review. We are very happy to know that your stay has been excellent and that the personalized attention of our team has exceeded your expectations. We hope to welcome you in the not too distant future. A cordial greeting.
review_translated_text: Todo excelente, el lugar, la vista, al menos la que nos toco a nosotros. Las instalaciones externas y las cabanas , la atencion de todo el personal y muy especialmente el de la recepcion que siempre estuvieron muy dispuestas a resolver nuestras inquietudes incluso mucho mas alla de lo esperabamos.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Alberto por su magnifica resena. Nos alegra mucho saber que su estadia ha sido excelente y que la atencion personalizada de nuestro equipo haya superado sus expectativas. Esperamos darle la bienvenida en un futuro no muy lejano. Un cordial saludo.

review_text: I spent 7 wonderful days. The cabin with an incredible view, the beautiful outdoor spaces, the beach just a few steps away, the attention of all the employees (especially reception) outstanding. Thank you all!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Silvina for your magnificent review. We are very happy to have met your expectations and to know that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel. We hope to welcome you again in the not too distant future. A cordial greeting.
review_translated_text: Pase 7 dias maravillosos .La cabana con una vista increible, los espacios exteriores bellos ,la playa a solo unos pasos ,la atencion de todos los empleados (especialmente de recepcion)sobresaliente .Gracias a todos !!!!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Silvina por su magnifica resena. Nos sentimos muy felices de haber alcanzado sus expectativas y saber que ha tenido una estadia maravillosa en nuestro hotel. Esperamos poder darle la bienvenida nuevamente en un futuro no muy lejano. Un cordial saludo.

review_text: First time dining here! Yes, this is an excellent restaurant to eat at. The service was great, I never had an empty glass nor did I have to wait long for my food. Definitely coming back! I love trying new foods! I highly recommend the Smoked Salmon pizza! I am from the Pacific Northwest and never had anything like this before. It is a Must try!
Not authentic Italian food.  I ate a little but didnt like the taste.

Surprised!!  The amount of pasta is enough for 3 people. Ill order takeout on my way home. The taste is delicious and I think it suits Japanese people. I ate 14 ounces of steak at Lone Star yesterday, so Im probably going to go home from Guam gaining about 3 kg. I should have read the reviews first.

December 24, 2023 At the shopping center in Hagatna While shopping, my son found out that there is also one in Japan. I want to go to Capricciosa. Japanese capricciosa is also quite large. It was a lot, so I made it into 3 items. Three servings of pasta? But its delicious. Clam chowder in bread too Huge... Moreover, if you dont eat it right away, it will turn into bread. The soup was sucked and it looked terrible. Pizza quattro or something Hmm Smells like gas? I guess its cheese, I guess we didnt meet them.

Capricciosa is always a good time for me and my family. I used to try to order just what I could eat from the menu because the plates are family style (meant for sharing). Now I just order whatever Im in the mood for and always have leftovers to bring home.

I wasnt aware that the portions were that huge and we ordered too much food! One meal feeds two for sure! When I saw the bowl with my corn soup my jaw dropped! It could feed four! It was delicious though and me and my husband finished it all. We werent crazy about the main meals though. I had pasta with chicken and spinach in a creamy sauce. There was barely any sauce, chicken or spinach. It was a plate full of mostly pasta. Service was beyond amazing though. Super nice, very attentive and worked fast.
Good, family restaurant atmosphere Lots of pasta The taste is normal.
so so....
Good place to eat. Big portions
A place I always visit whenever I go to Guam
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Great place to gather family for Special occasions.
Cozy place with excellent service.
review_translated_text: Lugar acogedor con excelente servicio.

review_text: Very good.
review_translated_text: Muito bom.

review_text: Excellent place, excellent snack board and very good rabas
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar , excelente tabla de picadas y las rabas muy buenas

review_text: Spectacular! The portions are generous and everything is delicious.
review_translated_text: Espectacular! Las porciones son abundantes y es todo rico

review_text: First class food. Excellent
review_translated_text: Comida de primera. Excelente

review_text: Delicious
review_translated_text: Delicioso

review_text: I asked to meet the griller to congratulate him! Crispy chinchus, bone-in roast and delicious chorizo steak!
review_translated_text: Pedi conocer al parrillero para felicitarlo! Chinchus crocantes,asado con hueso para despegar y bife de chorizo sabrosisimo!

review_text: Its warm and you can watch while they make the pizza
review_translated_text: Es calido y podes ver mientras hacen la pizza

review_text: Everything is excellent! We went last Thursday and everything was great, we ate pizza, hamburger and Caesar salad (one tastier than the other!!) I really stood out for the kindness of the waitress who served us, very cordial and willing to help with everything we need!
review_translated_text: Excelente todo! Fuimos el jueves pasado y la verdad todo genial, comimos pizza, hamburguesa y ensalada Cesar (uno mas rico que el otro!!) destaco muchisimo la amabilidad de la camarera que nos atendio, muy cordial y predispuesta a ayudar en todo lo que necesitamos !

review_text: Unfortunately the fish we had was far too fatty. My wife didnt eat it, I did, hunger drove it in. We both left the vegetables lying around. Totally overcooked. Unfortunately I cant say anything good about the fries. They were in the deep fryer too long. Rake off. Bad luck with the restaurant.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Mr. Neunaber We are sorry that your experience in our restaurant was not in line with your expectations and we appreciate your comment, this helps us to constantly improve our service to provide a better experience. We will clarify to our next diners that Surubi is a river fish that differs in taste from sea fish, which is why we combine it with sauteed vegetables with gremolata and lemon, which accompanies the flavor of river fish. Grateful EGO Restaurant.
review_translated_text: Der Fisch den wir hatten war leider viel zu fettig. Meine Frau hat diesen nicht gegessen, ich ja, der Hunger treib s rein. Das Gemuse haben wir beide liegen lassen. Total zerkocht. Leider kann ich zum den Pommes auch nichts gutes berichten. Die waren halt zu lange in der Fritteuse. Abharken. Pech gehabt mit dem Restaurant.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimado Sr. Neunaber Lamentamos que su experiencia en nuestro restaurant no estuvo acorde con sus expectativas y agradecemos su comentario, esto nos ayuda a mejorar constantemente nuestro servicio para brindar una mejor experiencia. Aclararemos a nuestros proximos comensales que el Surubi es un pescado de rio que difiere su gusto a los pescados de mar por eso combinamos con vegetales salteados con gremolata y limon lo que acompana al sabor de pescado de rio Agradecidos EGO Restaurant.

review_text: Delicious pizza
review_translated_text: Riquisima la pizza

review_text: We shared a ribeye steak here today with the wok veggies on the side and it was excellent. Like a tenderloin !  Comfortable seating, atmosphere and very friendly service. Reasonably priced. Wifi. Clean washrooms.
All very rich.
review_translated_text: Todo muy rico.

review_text: Really happy with our choice of this restaurant for dinner.

I ordered a dish with Ojo de Bife, the meat was burnt and tiny (there are many restaurants that charge the same but the meat is well served)... The rice was tasteless and the potatoes took a while to arrive . Puerto Igazu has many wonderful options for eating meat, but this restaurant is not one of them!
review_translated_text: Pedi um prato com Ojo de Bife, carne veio esturricada e minuscula (tem muito restaurante que cobra o mesmo mas que a carne vem bem serbida)  . O arroz sem gosto e a batata demorou a chegar . Puerto Igazu tem muitas opcoes maravilhosas para comer carne, mas este restaurante nao e um deles!

review_text: We ordered tails as a starter and then Neapolitan Milanese with salad (lettuce, tomato and onion). The Rabas are good (the lampreado has Provencal and that does not allow you to identify if the rabas are fresh or very good). As for the Milanese, the meat is a little tough. The salad is good, as for the cocktail sector, there is a ten for the bartender. The attention of the waiters is very good. On the second night we enjoyed the cocktails again. I appreciate the kindness of the waitress since they were about to close and despite that they prepared us two drinks 15 minutes before closing. A round of applause for the entire work team.
review_translated_text: Pedimos rabas de entrada y luego milanesa a la napolitana con ensalada (lechuga, tomate y cebolla). Las Rabas bien( el lampreado cuenta con provenzal y eso no te permite identificar si las rabas son frescas o estan muy buenas). En cuanto a la Milanesa  la carne un poco dura. La ensalada bien, en cuanto al sector de coctel ahi si un diez para el barman. La atencion de los mozos es muy buena. En la segunda noche disfrutamos nuevamente de la cocteleria. Agradezco la amabilidad de la moza ya que estaban por cerrar y a pesar de eso nos prepararon dos tragos a 15 minutos de cierre. Un aplauso para todo el equipo de trabajo.

review_text: Fantastic from the welcome to the last moment. Good pairing tips. Guaranteed entertainment. I highly recommend it.
review_translated_text: Fantastico desde as boas-vindas ate o ultimo momento. Boas dicas de harmonizacao. Entretenimento garantido. Recomendo demais.

review_text: We had a wonderful time at the Argentine Experience with a small group of friends. I was fearing that it ll be too touristy but was pleasantly surprised at the balance of the experience participation part and the enjoying the food and the company dinner part. Bruno and the ladies helping us were very attentive and helpful. Happy I went!
This is a must-have experience. From start to finish, the best gastronomic experience I had on this trip. In fact, on many trips...
review_translated_text: Essa e uma experiencia obrigatoria. Do inicio ao fim, a melhor experiencia gastronomica que tive nessa viagem. Na verdade, em muitas viagens...

review_text: You really have to try this. Well its expensive, around 75 euros pp. But a real experience to try.
review_translated_text: Il faut vraiment essayer cela.  Bon cest cher, environ 75 euros pp. Mais une reelle experience a tester.

review_text: Beautiful, convivial and decidedly Argentine experience! Excellent quality of food and wine, but above all excellent cooking experiences
review_translated_text: Esperienza bellissima, conviviale e decisamente argentina! Ottima qualita del cibo e del vino, ma soprattutto ottime esperienze di cucina

review_text: The most pleasant surprise of our trip! And to think we almost wouldnt do it. My wife and I considered it the most fun experience of our trip to Foz do Iguacu and its surroundings. I also recommend doing the wine tasting experience, which takes place before dinner. Mathias and Bruno are sensational, very fun and patient in answering our questions. We arrived much earlier for fear of delaying customs and they, even though they were busy with dinner preparations, took turns keeping us entertained with a great chat! I learned a lot about Argentine cuisine. I highly recommend it!!!
review_translated_text: A mais grata surpresa da nossa viagem! E pensar que quase nao iriamos fazer. Eu e minha esposa consideramos a experiencia mais divertida da nossa viagem a Foz do Iguacu e arredores. Recomendo fazer tambem a experiencia de degustacao de vinhos, que ocorre antes do jantar. O Mathias e o Bruno sao sensacionais, muito divertidos e pacientes para tirar nossas duvidas. Chegamos bem mais cedo por receio de demorar na aduana e eles, mesmo ocupados com os preparativos do jantar, se revezavam para nos manter entretidos com um otimo papo! Aprendi muito sobre a culinaria Argentina. Super recomendo!!!

review_text: Great experience The experience was really cool... we had fun, ate good food, drank good wine, learned a little about the local culture. It was very worth it. Bruno was very friendly and fun... note: we did it together with a very funny American, I think his name is Matt, wow, what a funny guy... I really wanted to learn Portuguese... hehehehehe
review_translated_text: Otima experiencia A experiencia foi muito legal... nos divertimos, comemos boa comida, bebemos bons vinhos, aprendemos um pouquinho da cultura local. Valeu muito a pena. O Bruno foi muito simpatico e divertido... obs.: fizemos junto com um americano muito engracado, acho que se chama Matt, putz, que cara engracado... queria muito aprender portugues.... hehehehehe

review_text: From the reception onwards we enjoyed the experience, Bruno did everything he could to understand us and he speaks great Portuguese. Our experience companions were also special and livened up the night. All the activities proposed were great and well enjoyed. Good food and top quality wine. Anyone who can take advantage of the opportunity.
I loved!!! It is a complete experience from the moment you enter the premises! Workshop on drinks, empanadas, wines and top-notch food!
review_translated_text: Me encanto!!! Es una experiencia completa desde que ingresas al local! Taller de tragos, de empanadas, vinos y comidas de primera!

review_text: We ll worth the price. You ll need to book in advance and the time is specific because the experience is shared with the other guests that book the same evening. The food is amazing and there is a lot of participation and learning about the food, the culture, and how it s made. We went with our whole family and the kids loved it. We were concerned they would get bored, but it was entertaining enough to keep even our nine year old interested.

Mateus, Bruno and Julio are a fantastic team who provide a wonderful Argentinean gourmet experience over a fun, educational and delicious evening. Excellent wines were paired with foods that we inexpertly helped make (our empanada creations were hilarious!). Our hosts were warm and welcoming and nothing was too much for them to handle. Highly recommended!
We had an incredible time! Excellent attention, quality of food and service!
review_translated_text: Pasamos un momento increible! Excelente la atencion, la calidad de las comidas y el servicio!

review_text: The dishes are very delicious, the sweets are the best, the service is great. They allow you to go with puppies Recommendable!! ( I will be back)
An incredibly delicious dinner! The atmosphere is magnificent, the food is definitely fabulous! Delicious!!! And Nicolass attention is IMPECCABLE. We will be back!!!!
review_translated_text: Una cena increiblemente rica! El ambiente es magnifico, la comida es definitivamente fabulosa! Riquisima!!! Y la atencion de Nicolas IMPECABLE. Volveremos!!!!

review_text: (I went for Sunday brunch service) Its a place to go when hungry. It has a wide selection of cold things to eat and several options of hot things. The service is an open buffet so everyone gets what they want when they want. The attention is spectacular, there is constantly someone attentive to the needs that one may have but without being overwhelming. The space is very nice but with so many people it can feel a little cramped.
review_translated_text: (Fui al servicio de brunch de domingo) Es un lugar para ir con hambre. Tiene una amplia seleccion de cosas frias para comer y varias opciones de cosas calientes. El servicio es buffet libre por lo que cada uno se agarra lo que quiere cuando quiere. La atencion es espectacular, constantemente hay alguien atento a las necesidades que uno puede llegar a tener pero sin ser abrumador. El espacio es muy lindo pero al haber tanta gente puede sentirse un poco apretado.

review_text: Decadence has arrived, and it seems to be very established. Terrible service, not very educated, they have no idea about service in food service. Hitting the table with the bottle, plates, etc. All the stars fell off, and eventually the forks (in the rating). Problems with charging cards for all clients, claiming that they were rejected... I would like to know the reason why they do it. They transform a celebration into a decadent experience. They should prepare staff properly, or minimally supervise them. Also, they must have a shortage of cards, since they brought 2 to a table of 3 people.... Or do they want to know if we know how to share? Decadent, sad, dull and regrettable Everything.
review_translated_text: La decadencia llego, y parece estar muy instalada. Pesima atencion, Poco educados, no tienen ni idea de atencion en un servicio de comida. Golpeando la mesa con la botella, platos, etc . Se le cayeron todas las estrellas, y eventualmente los tenedores (en la calificacion). Problemas para cobrar con tarjeta en todos los clients, aduciendo que estaban rechazadas... Me gustaria saber la razon por la que lo hacen. Transforman una celebracion, en una experiencia decadente. Deberian preparar al personal correctamente, o minimamente, supervisarlo. Ademas, deben tener faltante de cartas, ya que trajeron 2 en una mesa de 3 personas.... O querran saber si sabemos compartir? Decadente, triste, apagado y lamentable Todo.

review_text: We came for the special Christmas dinner. The food is good and so is the service but they dont create the atmosphere nor is there Christmas decoration, nothing special. Its a regular dinner like any other. The price of the cutlery is not justified.
review_translated_text: Vinimos para la cena especial de Navidad. La comida es buena y la atencion tambien pero no generan el ambiente ni hay decoracion navidena, nada especial. Es una cena regular como cualquier otra. No se justifica el precio del cubierto.

review_text: Breakfast options are average and service is not great too . Very old hotel

Excellent service Attentive and careful attention, especially from Lucia and Nicolas, the waiters who received us that night. The food was delicious, the hyper creamy zucca risotto. Worthy of recommendation
review_translated_text: Excelente servicio Atencion atenta y esmerada sobre todo de Lucia y Nicolas camareros que nos recibieron esa noche Una delicia la comida el risotto di zucca hiper cremoso Digno de recomendacion

review_text: The buffet breakfasts are good, but the menu is very average, I would say bad for what they charge. I ordered the entrecote that comes with a sauce that I dont know what it is that takes away the prominence of the meat that wasnt that bad. The accompaniment is a cassava puree prepared in the form of a tortilla that is terrible. The ice creams are average  In general it disappoints
review_translated_text: Los desayunos buffet son buenos, pero la carta muy normal, diria que malo por lo que cobran. Pedi el entrecote que viene con una salsa que no se de que es que le quita protagonismo a la carne que no estaba tan mal. El acompanamiento es un pure de yuca preparado en forma de tortilla que esta pesimo. Los helados son normales  En general decepciona

review_text: Perfect breakfast, delicious scrambled eggs, fruit, bread, professional service
review_translated_text: Doskonale sniadania pyszna jajecznica owoce pieczywo profesjonalna obsluga

review_text: Excellent food, attention and service!
review_translated_text: Comida, atencion y servicio excelentes!

review_text: We went to Sunday brunch. The service is very good. The complete brunch. It is located on the ground floor of the Sheraton hotel. Parking is included
review_translated_text: Fuimos al brunch del domingo. El servicio es muy bueno. El brunch completo. Esta ubicado en la planta baja del hotel Sheraton. El estacionamiento esta incluido

review_text: Fair restaurant, not authentic Italian. They missed the carbonara by using cream and lack of pecorino, for sure they do not use guanciale. The pizzas are not Italian, they are tipical Argentinian pizzas. The other dishes all have Argentinian flavor with a touch o italianita, but not Italian. Service is also fair, the waiters do not write the orders and misses the instructions.

Incredible tasting menu with the best meat I ve tasted in South America. Super knowledgeable and friendly staff that enhances the experience. Fantastic value for the quality you get and in general definitely worthy of some stars.

I have to say the experience was impressive. Everything that s hot is cooked on a custom grill right in front of you. The food was served by the same people cooking it which in itself made for an unusual experience. While the food was impressive, I have to give a special shoutout to the staff. They were friendly, helpful, attentive, gave each group individual attention, and overall seemed like a fun group of people. They were who made the experience special. Happy to recommend the Fogon experience!
It was an amazing experience dining at Fogon Asado . The food , the service , the atmosphere all were perfect. Everything was beyond our expectations. Highly recommended !
Great food and wine. Almost a 3 hour experience that was well worth the money and time.
It is an experience of all your senses.  A wonderful way to spend 3 hours and enjoy a 9 course tasting and appreciate what can be cooked over wood.
Very good food I recommend it
review_translated_text: Muy buena comida lo recomiendo

review_text: One of the best restaurants we ate at during our recent visit. Excellent service, wine and value for money considering the quality of the food. The smoked ribeye cap was exceptional - the best dish I had on this trip. My only feedback is that the atmosphere in the summer is an issue for guests that come from cold climates. I realize that it is simply hot in Jan/Feb in Buenos Aires and the air conditioning was on, but eating around the fire pit at nearly 30C is hard when you come from a cold country. This level of heat takes away from the food, wine and experience. If we had known it would be so hot at lunchtime, we would have booked the dinner session

The Fogon gourmet restaurant in Buenos Aires is a true culinary gem that transcends the highest expectations. From the moment you walk through its doors, you are transported to a world of sensory delights where gastronomy reaches unparalleled heights. Every dish is a work of art, meticulously prepared with unparalleled fresh ingredients and limitless creativity. The ambiance is both elegant and warm, creating the perfect setting for an unforgettable dining experience. The service is impeccable, with attentive and passionate staff dedicated to providing an exceptional dining experience for every diner. The exquisite flavors that emanate from each plate are a true feast for the taste buds, transporting diners on an exhilarating taste journey. Each bite is an explosion of tastes and textures, masterfully orchestrated by talented and inspired chefs. Whether youre a food lover or simply looking for a memorable dining experience, Fogon Restaurant in Buenos Aires is a must-visit destination. Prepare to be amazed and enchanted by exceptional cuisine that elevates the art of gastronomy to new heights.
review_translated_text: Le restaurant gastronomique Fogon a Buenos Aires est un veritable bijou culinaire qui transcende les attentes les plus elevees. Des linstant ou vous franchissez ses portes, vous etes transporte dans un monde de delices sensoriels ou la gastronomie atteint des sommets inegales. Chaque plat est une  uvre dart, meticuleusement preparee avec des ingredients dune fraicheur inegalee et une creativite sans limites. Lambiance est a la fois elegante et chaleureuse, creant le cadre parfait pour une experience gastronomique inoubliable. Le service est impeccable, avec un personnel attentif et passionne qui se consacre a offrir une experience culinaire exceptionnelle a chaque convive. Les saveurs exquises qui emanent de chaque assiette sont un veritable festin pour les papilles, transportant les convives dans un voyage gustatif exaltant. Chaque bouchee est une explosion de gouts et de textures, orchestree avec maestria par des chefs talentueux et inspires. Que vous soyez un amateur de gastronomie ou simplement a la recherche dune experience culinaire memorable, le restaurant Fogon a Buenos Aires est une destination incontournable. Preparez-vous a etre emerveille et enchante par une cuisine dexception qui eleve lart de la gastronomie a de nouveaux sommets.

review_text: We arrived in Soho without a reservation, in fact on a weekday at 12:20. The staff communicates in English and Spanish, accompanying each dish with an explanation and recommendation. This is a great place to get to know Argentina for the first time as a friendly neighbor. It is better to choose a place where there is no access to the parisha, so you can see everything that is happening in the kitchen and enjoy the atmosphere of the establishment. Despite the small space, there is excellent exhaust hood and breathing is very easy. The main dishes will be hidden, and their descriptions will be posted in the comments. Relevant for those who want the effect of surprise. What did we take Tasting menu: Seasonal Vegetable - Eggplant asado was small but tasty. Try eating it slowly to feel the subtle taste and aroma. For those who want a large portion, I recommend Atte. Provoleta Cheese - a bite and a half piece of cheese with aromatic pear in the perfect ratio of salt and sugar. Molleja - thyroid gland. A very strange crispy delicacy, reminiscent of swollen deep-fried pork skin with its own pronounced aftertaste. El Matrimonio de Chorizo y Morcilla - I advise you to try the chorizo first, then the blood sausage, so as not to excite your receptors before the next dish. Chorizo is very tasty, rich in spices and meaty, bloody - for a lover of bloody liver, just as full-bodied. Pork Matambre - tender pork with a wonderful refreshing vegetable salad with lime. The only negative is that the meat cools down very quickly and is served barely warm. Slow braised Asado - divine meat on the bone, if youre lucky with a portion. Smoked Ribeye Cap - it feels like youre eating freshly cooked smoked ham. The aroma is the same. The taste is richer. Very tender meat. And incredible corn! Ribeye - 200g of meat served with potatoes, champignon cap and onion. Your chimichurri is used for the salsa. The doneness will also be known to you in advance. Recommended - medium rare. But I wondered, is it her? This piece was not particularly impressive, perhaps due to a poorly sharpened knife that barely cut the meat - there is a separate presentation when the knife is replaced before serving the meat. Or the presence of veins. Crepes with Dulce de Leche is a thin and delicious crepe, with a generous dollop of dulce de leche inside and caramelized sugar on top. Served with buttery sour cream and red berries. Very tasty, but the sour cream is greasy. Coffee, Tea - pour an unlimited number of times into 50 ml cups. A bonus is a gift, as well as perhaps a Salentein dessert white wine to try, and any remaining meat that is not suitable for serving. They will generously offer it to you on the board. So dont refuse, there are beautiful pieces there Pssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss] 74400$ = 61U$D per person without wines
