review_text: This dinning experience is out of this world!!! You have to experience it to believe it! Trust me on this, I don t do a lot of reviews but this one I cannot miss
Best experience, everything impeccable.
review_translated_text: Melhor experiencia, tudo impecavel.

review_text: Amazing cooking experience with a tasting menu of 9 different dishes from veggies to meat. We could mix our own spices. All the food was amazing, wines too. I can recommend if you are in BA, you love food, but you dont want to eat a kilo of steak, rather trying different types of meat. Flavorbomb!
Ekkks everything about this place is amazing. Will be craving it for a while
Price is $120. USD which is C. 100,000$APesos
With kk and mom. Small, which made the quality of service increase.

Absolutely amazing experience. The service and food were brilliant. Each of the 9 courses were delicious and filling. The wines paired with them were also expertly done. An absolute must do anytime you re in Buenos Aires. I will definitely be back.

Experience very consistent with the proposal. Tasting menu around the grill, with high-quality delivery and good service. It worked very well for teenage children, who enjoyed every minute of it. Like every experience, it has a theatrical touch, but it is with good intentions. I highly recommend it, as it is one of the best meats in BsAs. Tip: dont waste time in the degrading queue at Don Julio and make your reservation at Fogon Asado.
review_translated_text: Experiencia muito consistente com a proposta. Menu degustacao em volta da parrilla, com entrega em alto nivel e bom atendimento. Funcionou muito bem para filhos adolescentes, que curtiram cada minuto. Como toda experiencia, tem um que de teatral, mas e na boa intencao. Super recomendo, pois e das melhores carnes em BsAs. Dica: nao perca tempo na fila degradante do Don Julio e faca sua reserva no Fogon Asado.

review_text: Every time we go to Bariloche we try to go but we never get a place. Finally we did it and although the dishes and the service were very good, we left with the feeling that several dishes are very small and that if you dont choose correctly you could leave hungry. We went for the three course option and I think the mistake was ordering 1 starter, 1 main and 1 dessert. You can order if you want 3 main dishes and the truth is if we had known before selecting the dishes we might have changed the options. Everything we tried was very good and you can tell that they put a lot of passion and dedication into each dish.
review_translated_text: Siempre que vamos a Bariloche intentabamos ir pero nunca conseguiamos lugar. Finalmente lo logramos y si bien los platos y el servicio estuvieron muy bien, nos fuimos con la sensacion de que varios platos son muy pequenos y que si no elegis correctamente te podes quedar con hambre. Fuimos por la opcion de tres pasos y creo que el error fue pedir 1 entrada, 1 principal y 1 postre. Se puede pedir si uno quiere 3 principales y la verdad si lo hubiesemos sabido antes de haber seleccionado los platos quizas hubieramos cambiado las opciones. Todo lo que probamos estuvo muy bien y se nota que le ponen mucha pasion y dedicacion a cada plato.

review_text: Tiny, excellent restaurant
Excellent restaurant...deserved Michelin award...
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante ...merecido premio Michelin...

review_text: The best restaurant in BRC
review_translated_text: El mejor restaurante de BRC

review_text: Very good dishes and attention
review_translated_text: Muy buenos platos y atencion

review_text: Probably the place with the most different dishes in Bariloche. They are also very friendly
The best food in Bariloche. Great level. The atmosphere could be improved and the service could be faster, but you shouldnt miss out.
review_translated_text: La mejor comida de Bariloche. Gran nivel. El ambiente podria mejorar y el servicio podria ser mas rapido, pero no hay que dejar de ir.

review_text: We experienced an exceptional gastronomic delight at Anima de Bariloche, led by the talented chef couple Florencia and Emanuel. Winners of the Prix Baron B - Edition Cuisine in 2023, their restaurant stands out for its excellence and transformative vision. On each visit, our family enjoyed an intimate experience where the connection with sustainability, respect for the environment and regional products were protagonists. Definitely, an authentic connection with nature through cuisine.
review_translated_text: Experimentamos un deleite gastronomico excepcional en Anima de Bariloche, liderado por la talentosa pareja de chefs Florencia y Emanuel. Ganadores del Prix Baron B - Edition Cuisine en 2023, su restaurante destaca por la excelencia y vision transformadora. En cada visita, nuestra familia disfruto de una experiencia intima donde la conexion con la sustentabilidad, el respeto por el medio ambiente y los productos regionales fueron protagonistas. Definitivamente, una conexion autentica con la naturaleza a traves de la culinaria.

review_text: Absolutely perfect, all the ingredients are the best and fresh and exactly what you want. incredible!
review_translated_text: Absolutamente perfecto, todos los ingredientes estan el mejor y fresca y exacto lo que quieres. increible!

review_text: Impressive, creative gourmet food that began with Patagonian olives ala Anima and culminated with a delicious grilled beef escalivada in a pleasant forest like setting.
The best place in Bariloche!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
review_translated_text: El mejor lugar de Bariloche!! RECOMIENDO MUCHISISMO!!

review_text: It is a must go every time you are in Bariloche. World class food, amazing hospitality and great atmosphere. Thank you as always Flor & Ema and congratulations again!
I went three times. They were all incredible. Careful, creative, surprising gastronomy. Impeccable service. Kindness. I would return a thousand times more
review_translated_text: Fui tres veces. Todas fueron increibles. Gastronomia cuidada, creativa, que sorprende. Servicio impecable. Amabilidad. Volveria mil veces mas

review_text: Probably the best restaurant we tried. The dishes are honestly spectacular. Its not a cheap restaurant, but its clearly worth it. If its on the menu, the burrata with confit peppers is amazing.
review_translated_text: Probablemente el mejor restaurant que probamos. Los platos son sinceramente espectaculares. No es un restaurant barato, pero claramente lo vale. Si esta en el menu, la burrata con pimientos confitados es alucinante.

review_text: Spectacular! Flavors, textures, product and preparation accompanied by a more than interesting wine list! Congratulations! One of the best I have tried on this beautiful trip through Argentina. Thank you so much
review_translated_text: Espectacular! Sabores, texturas, producto y elaboracion acompanado de una carta de vinos mas que interesante! Felicidades! De lo mejor que he probado en este hermoso viaje por Argentina. Muchas gracias

review_text: Best food we had in Bariloche! Very creative dishes with local ingredients. Highly recommend to book well in advance through whatsapp.

Anima is a must eat in Bariloche!!  We heard about the restaurant from guests at our hotel we are staying and we were lucky to get a reservation last minute because of a cancellation. To book you need to use WhatsApp to text Florence. She also will send the current menu options you must choose prior to the dinner experience. We choose the Burrata, Salmon Omelette, beef and lamb. Everything was fresh and beautifully presented. Postres were delicious as well! Flore  was very kind and welcoming! The entire place has about 8 tables it s like having dinner at a friends home. Book before your trip!!
Very small restaurant, with only 20 seats. Open by appointment only. Beautiful experience.
review_translated_text: Restaurante bem pequeno, com apenas 20 lugares. So atende com hora marcada. Bela experiencia.

review_text: Pleasant
review_translated_text: Agradable

review_text: Very nice service. Buffet clean and varied. You can pay either as a flat rate or based on weight. Price performance ratio is appropriate for tourists.

We can clearly see that this is a facility that has seen many years of usage. You must have been fantastic on opening days with such lovely floors and local accents of decor. Though the age its very apparent when you look about. Mold here and there. Wearing spots in the floor. Those unsightly cracks in the wood of the joists. The staff though is ever present and ever working on keeping up appearances as well as delivering service to make sure that all patrons are well adjusted and comfortable for resting and consuming food. If youre wearing shorts be ready for some mosquito bites. Keep that bug spray handy.

Expensive lunch options that do not match the delivery of the place. I understand that, due to the location, the buffet service is a little more expensive, but I believe that at the moment it is overpriced.
The service is good, but the menu was not very varied, at least at the time I was there, otherwise they have large air-conditioned spaces and many tables to choose from.
review_translated_text: La atencion es buena , pero el menu no era  muy variado al menos a la hora que estuve alli, por demas tienen espacios amplios aire acondicionado y muchas mesas para elegir

review_text: The price-quality ratio seemed terrible to me. $16000 x kg. And it does not include drinks. The boy who greeted us was friendly. The cashier not much. There wasnt much variety. And it seemed unacceptable to me that they do not accept MercadoPago. Actually nowadays you dont go out with a lot of cash (and at that price you need a lot of cash) or with cards because we have them all in MercadoPago. The air conditioning was kind of weak, it was hot. PS that they even charge you for bread seemed very cheap to me.
review_translated_text: La relacion precio calidad me parecio pesima. $16000 x kg. Y no incluye bebidas. El chico que nos recibio fue amable. La cajera no mucho. No habia demasiada variedad. Y me parecio inaceptable que no acepten MercadoPago.  Realmente hoy en dia uno no sale ni con mucho efectivo (y a ese precio necesitas bastante efectivo) ni con tarjetas porque las tenemos todas en MercadoPago. La climatizacion medio floja, hacia calor.  PD que te cobren hasta el pan me parecio muy rata.

review_text: Beautiful place in a sensational environment. The attention is spectacular
review_translated_text: Hermoso lugar en un entorno sensacional. La atencion es espectacular

review_text: Very good food and prices
review_translated_text: Muy buena la comida y los precios

review_text: Excellent attention. Good, varied and abundant food. Highly recommended
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion. Comida buena, variada y abundante. Muy recomendable

review_text: Excellent food and service. Thank you for your hospitality.
I loved it, super cozy place
review_translated_text: adorei lugar super acochegante

review_text: The food is wonderful The service is 10 The atmosphere is very cozy

Self-service. Medium price. Good food with many options. It was better than fast food for a few more pesos Kid-friendliness: The meal is self-service you decided the weight you buy.  Informt of the restaurant there are an square with childrens games such as free hammocks Wheelchair accessibility: Yes you can access with wheelchair
Fabulous food, pleasant atmosphere, Im very satisfied.
review_translated_text: Comida fabulosa ambiente agradavel estou muito satisfeita.

review_text: Expensive and bad
review_translated_text: Caro e ruim

review_text: To put it bluntly, its not good. When I finally ordered dessert, I ordered an espresso and it didnt come even after waiting 30 minutes, and when I complained, they brought me a different one. Not recommended for those who cannot speak English.

Please be kind. This is a friendly restaurant that makes you feel good. And the food portion is huge. I ordered pizza, meatball pasta, and grilled chicken with my three children, but the pizza and grilled chicken were packaged and brought home. I was already full after eating the bread, soup, and salad before the meal. The server was very kind, but I was sorry that I couldnt give you a tip because I didnt take my wallet with me because Koreans have a habit of only carrying cell phones... The pictures are a little off. I took this picture while eating. And the entrance is located deep inside the building, in every corner.

Great family restaurant, lasagna is awesome and you can t beat all u can eat salad, soup and bread sticks   . At the end make ur own ice cream sandwich with a scoop of ice cream and the never ending bread sticks. Check out my video tutorial on how to make it.

Saturday 8pm party of 4, 2 adults 1 teen, 1 child. Appetizers came out very fast, shrimp was great, mushrooms seemed overcooked as cheese was blackened on the edges, artichoke dip also looked to be left in oven for too long but tasted ok. After we had finished our Appetizers we still did not receive our drinks, it did not arrive till the main coarse arrived. Not even a glass of water while we waited for our food to arrive Ordered: Pepperoni pizza, it was decent but dough was very flimsy and had to roll it in order to eat it. kids spaghetti and meatballs, the meatballs was the only thing that tasted good, sauce tasted like it came from a hunts can and lightly heated. We had to remind the staff after an hour to please deliver his ice cream which came with the meal, very frustrating they forgot. They seemed more focus on closing. wife had the soup and it was quite nice and tasty. I had the tour of Italy and I barely finished it as the lasagna was barely warm, tasteless and seemed like it came out of a Payless frozen food section. The fettuccine sauce was awful, nothing like the other times I have eaten it there. The chicken was super dry and they used the same tasteless sauce on it that they used on my sons spaghetti. Overall: This is not the same Olive Garden my family and I have loved since it came on the island. The quality of the food, ingredients and care in preparing the meals has taken a serious nose dive. Ill give them a year till I ever come back to see if anything has improved but for now they have lost my business. I understand times are tough in Tumon and tourism but these cuts in quality will definitely hurt their local market in the long-term. I hope they can make changes sooner as we do love going there.

I called to inquire about private rooms. The employee Michelle said there were none with a tone as if I should know their layout. Then I asked if theres a corner booth, again she was so unhelpful and unwelcoming with her tone. Its very sad that the smallest inquires will be dealt with moodiness and unprofessionalism.

Nothing is cheap in Guam, but out of the various places I ve eaten at while here, Olive Garden is probably the best for value for money, service, and quality. Been there twice so far, will try to get back there again before I go home.
Very beautiful and welcoming restaurant.  Excellent service from waitress, she deserves all the gratitude.  Very professional, conversive . Foods were very deserving of the process. A+
There is an all-you-can-eat soup, salad, and bread. Its very reasonable and the taste and quantity are satisfying. Its also available in Hawaii, so I highly recommend it.
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Olive Garden is one of my favorites but this time the chicken was pink and it was really bad for my expectations
Pizza is delicious, pasta is not tasty
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: i came here with my friends thinking i would have a good time. Well, we thought wrong. teo of my friends ordered chicken Alfredo. My two friends got fettuccine and i got nothing. we waited for a time for them to confirm our food too. overall, 2 stars and disappointment.
Salad, soup excellence & mangia contorni! great selection, drinks too; wish they have cannoli, though.
Had a great experience eating here. The soups, salad, breadsticks, and dipping sauces were very tasty and fresh. Gary, the bartender and our server, was very nice and professional.
I have a glass of ice peach tea and one Margherita. Undoubtedly, tea and pizza are all above average. The atmosphere, including music and all of the decorations, is intoxicating like I am in Italy.
Weve gone to dinner! Always with prior reservation, the food is very good, excellent pastas, lamb risotto and pine mushrooms 10 points! Like the lamb ravioli, excellent service!!!
review_translated_text: Hemos ido a cenar! Siempre con reserva previa, la comida muy buena, pastas excelentes, risotto de cordero y hongos de pino 10 puntos! Al igual que los ravioles de cordero, atencion excelente!!!

review_text: Very rich and abundant
review_translated_text: Muy rico y abundante

review_text: Highly recommended. The menu is extensive and the prices are in line with the quality. The food is exquisite. Recommended: Trout sorrentinos with 4 cheese sauce, Caesar salad and steak eye with mashed potatoes.
review_translated_text: Muy recomendable. La carta es amplia y los precios acordes con la calidad. La comida es exquisita. Recomendables: Sorrentinos de trucha con salsa 4 quesos, ensalada Caesar y Ojo de bife con pure de papa.

review_text: A hidden gem within the Club Hotel DUT. Congratulations to Tano, Daiana and the entire kitchen team. Excellent atention. Family atmosphere. Delicious and abundant dishes. Excellent price-quality ratio. Lake view. It has a cellar to grab the wine you are going to drink yourself. We will return without a doubt.
review_translated_text: Una joya oculta dentro del Club Hotel DUT. Felicitaciones para el Tano, Daiana y el todo el equipo de cocina. Muy buena atencion. Ambiente familiar. Platos riquisimos y abundantes. Excelente relacion precio-calidad. Vista al lago. Tiene una cava para agarrar vos mismo el vino que vas a tomar. Volveremos sin dudas.

review_text: Unfortunately we were not able to taste their highly valued dishes. We attended with great enthusiasm, but when we arrived they told us that we could not enter with our little dog. Its a shame that a place in full contact with nature does not have a small space for this purpose. In our case, and being a day with almost no attendance, 5 diners who wanted to enjoy apparently good cuisine preferred to miss out...
review_translated_text: Lamentablemente no pudimos degustar sus platos tan valorados. Concurrimos con muchas ganas, pero al llegar nos comentaron que no podiamos ingresar con nuestra pequena perra. Una pena que un lugar en pleno contacto con la naturaleza no cuente con un pequeno espacio para tal fin. En nuestro caso y siendo un dia casi sin concurrencia, prefirieron perderse 5 comensales con ganas de disfrutar una aparente buena gastronomia...

review_text: Our family of five had a delicious dinner at Il Ritorno; excellent steak, lamb, pumpkin risotto, and pizza. The wait staff are all friendly and helpful as we decided among their many great looking dishes.  Recommend!
The tastiest homemade ravioli Ive ever tried. The SUPERIOR trout ones!! Very good place. Highly recommended
review_translated_text: Los ravioles caseros mas ricos que probe. Los de trucha SUPERIORES!! Muy buen lugar . Muy recomendable

review_text: The quality of the food, the service, are very, very good, Tano is attentive to everything, he loves what he does, I stayed chatting with him and I understood why the quality of everything in general, and the prices, super economical For the quality it gives you, we ordered trout ravioli with four cheeses, oh my god, how crazy, steak eye with puree which is given to you on a griddle and one part more cooked than the other so that when you finish the first half The other one did not cool down and was finished cooking as if it had just come out, and a Caesar salad that was perfection, pancakes for dessert, details, the pancake made on the spot, and the ravioli, although it sounds incredible, too!!!! I write what I experienced and I want to go back now!!!!
review_translated_text: La calidad de la comida ,la atencion,son muy pero muy buenos,el tano esta atento a todo,ama lo que hace,me quede charlando con el y entendi el porque de la calidad de todo en general,y los precios,super economico para la calidad que te da,pedimos raviolones de trucha a los cuatro quesos,ay dios ,que locura,ojo de bife con pure el cual te lo da en una plancha y una parte mas cocida que la otra para que cuando termines la primer mitad la otra no se enfrio y se termino de cocinar como recien salida ,y una ensalada Cesar que era la perfeccion , panqueques de postre,detalles,el panqueque echo en el momento,y los raviolones, aunque suene increible, tambien !!!! escribo lo vivido y quiero volver ya!!!!

review_text: Everything is excellent at Il Retorno. An experienced chef. The dishes are exquisite: we tried mushroom risotto, ravioli, gnocchi, pizza, tirami. Everything top quality. Daiana attended to us with care, kindness and efficiency. A place to return to many times.
review_translated_text: Todo es excelente en Il Retorno. Un chef experimentado. Los platos son exquisitos: probamos risotto de hongos, raviolones, noquis, pizza, tirami su. Todo de primera calidad. Daiana nos atendio con solicitud, amabilidad y eficiencia. Un lugar para volver muchas veces.

review_text: The best trout ravioli. The attention is at the level of their dishes. I would always come back for some pasta.
review_translated_text: Los mejores raviolones de trucha. La atencion esta a la altura de sus platos. Volveria siempre por unas pastas.

review_text: The tano dishes were very delicious and the waiter treated us very well. I recommend the lamb ravioli with lamb stew.
On our trip to Bariloche we found the restaurant Il Ritorno that we can recommend. The food is good, homemade, prepared with taste and Diegos company is charming.
review_translated_text: en nuestro viaje a bariloche encontramos el restaurante il ritorno que podemos recomendar. la comida es buena, casera, preparada con gusto y la compania de diego es encantadora.

review_text: Excellent attention! The waiter (Diego) a phenomenon! We ate a provoleta starter and then an excellent Shrimp and Prawn risotto! Highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente la atencion! El mozo (Diego) un fenomeno! Comimos una provoleta de entrada y despues un rissotto de Camarones y Langostinos excelente! Muy recomendable.

review_text: The incredible truth, we found it on maps by chance. The service was very friendly and the food was excellent. I ordered some trout ravioli with prawn sauce that were exquisite! We will definitely go back! Super recommended! Parking: The parking lot is located within the same hotel property where the restaurant is located.
review_translated_text: La verdad increible, lo encontramos en maps de casualidad. La atencion fue muy cordial y la comida excelente. Pedi unos raviolones de trucha con salsa de langostinos que estaban exquisitos! Definitivamente vamos a volver! Super recomendable! Parking: El estacionamiento esta ubicado dentro del mismo predio hotelero donde se encuentra el restaurante.

review_text: Super recommended!!!
review_translated_text: Super recomendable!!!

review_text: Very delicious food, excellent service, quiet atmosphere. 10/10
review_translated_text: Muy rica comida, servicio excelente, ambiente tranquilo. 10/10

review_text: Restaurant next to the lake and with a family atmosphere. Diegos attention stands out and the dishes are excellent. Especially the local pasta, lamb and trout. One can see the flames from the kitchen while they prepare your dish. The price/quality ratio is unbeatable. 100% recommended.
review_translated_text: Restaurante al lado del lago y de ambiente familiar. La atencion de Diego destaca y los platos son excelentes. En especial las pastas, el cordero y la trucha del lugar. Uno puede ver las llamaradas de la cocina mientras preparan tu plato. La relacion precio/calidad es inmejorable. 100% Recomendado.

review_text: Excellent restaurant with very delicious and well presented dishes. We arrived after 11 pm and they treated us very well.
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante con platos muy ricos y bien presentados. Llegamos despues de las 23 hs y nos atendieron super bien.

review_text: The pizzas are very delicious!! But the Tiramisu...unmissable!!! Excellent attention!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, I am very happy. Always welcome

response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much.

response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias.

response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!!!! We are waiting for you whenever you like. Enjoy your beautiful vacation

response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Fiorella.

review_text: Everything is exquisite!! Homemade food, tasty, forceful!! ! Good prices !! And very good attention!!   super recommended

review_text: Excellent service, a beautiful and cozy place, and the food was the finishing touch! Simply exquisite!!!! You cant not stop by here...
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Carlos. It makes me very happy!! Always welcome.
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion, un lugar hermoso y acojedor, y la comida el broche de Oro! Simplemente exquisita!!!! No pueden no pasar por aqui...
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Carlos. Me pone muy contenta!! Siempre bienvenidos.

review_text: Excellent food!! and good price, excellent service, I was very pleasantly surprised, when I pass by Los Menucos again I will go for dinner again.

review_text: Nice atmosphere, very good service, horrible sushi, the worst Ive ever eaten! The salmon looked old, very bad.
response_from_owner_text: Good night. Were sorry you didnt like it. We work with fresh, quality salmon, we always pay special attention to this, which is why we find it rare. We regret that you did not tell us anything during your dinner so that we could verify and, failing that, rectify the situation. We regret giving us a star and thus lowering our score since thanks to this many people give us the opportunity to serve them and help us to continue growing, especially in such a difficult economic context for us and the families who make a living from this venture. . We hope you can return at some point. Greetings
response_from_owner_translated_text: Buenas noches. Lamentamos que no le haya gustado. Trabajamos con salmon fresco y de calidad, siempre prestamos especial atencion a esto, por ese motivo nos resulta raro. Lamentamos que no nos haya dicho nada durante su cena para poder verificar y en su defecto enmendar la situacion. Lamentamos nos ponga una estrella y de esa forma nos baje la puntuacion ya que gracias a ello mucha gente nos da la oportunidad de servirle y nos ayuda a seguir creciendo sobre todo en un contexto economico tan dificil para nosotros y las familias que vivimos de este emprendimiento. Esperamos pueda volver en algun momento. Saludos

review_text: Excellent place, very well decorated and sublime service.

response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias por tu comentario y valoracion!! Nos anima a seguir creciendo

review_text: Regarding a delivery order: I have never seen them send you sushi without soy sauce, something essential! The tails are chewy, flavorless and oily. The worst thing Ive tried in a long time and once I understood it but its something common apparently. I recommend that you go to Nobuko, the food is much tastier and there is a good relationship between price and quality, it is not an overrated place.
review_translated_text: Sobre un pedido de delivery: nunca vi que te manden los sushis sin salsa de soja, algo fundamental! Las rabas chiclosas, sin sabor y aceitosas. Lo peor que probe en mucho tiempo y, una vez lo entiendo pero es algo comun por lo visto. Recomiendo que vayan a Nobuko, la comida es muchisimo mas rica y hay una relacion precio y calidad, no es un lugar sobrevalorado.

review_text: Excellent meal.
review_translated_text: Excelente comida.

review_text: The chicken giosas were almost raw as if thawed, the chicken had a bad taste as if it were soggy. He made us pay for the giosas even though they were not edible. The octopus ceviche did not taste like octopus as if it came out of a can. The catch of the day had to be cooked in the wok but it was grilled. The puree was sweeter than a dessert and took on all the flavor of the fish. The chef has to learn to cook. I dont recommend it.
review_translated_text: Los giosas de pollo  estaban casi crudo como descongelados , el pollo tenia mal gusto como pasado. Nos hizo pagar los giosas aunque no eran comestibles    El ceviche de pulpo no tenia gusto de pulpo como si salio de una lata. El pesca del dia tenia que estar cocido al wok pero le hizo a la plancha. La puree era mas dulce que un postre y tomo todo el gusto al pescado. Tiene que aprender a cocinar el chef. No le recomiendo.

review_text: WONDERFUL! Im sure Ill visit every time I return to Posadas! I recommend!

review_text: Today, after several times I went and had a first class dinner, I met new people, the service was very different, the place was a little run down and the saddest thing was, the sushi I ate today was really bad.
response_from_owner_text: Good evening, we are sorry not to have been to your liking. But we told you that the staff is exactly the same as 2 years ago. We would also like more details about the sushi that you did not like so we can correct it. We are waiting for you in our Instagram inbox. Kind regards.

Maybe its because its New Years Day, but when I went there with a reservation at 6pm, there were a lot of people with young children, so it didnt have an adult atmosphere. If you want to go as a surprise, it might be best to go later in the day.

review_text: I used it for a year-end dinner. It was my childs birthday, so I asked for a cake, which he gladly accepted, and we were able to safely celebrate on the day, making it a great keepsake. Thank you for your courteous service. All of the meals were delicious, and personally, the Mont Blanc I had for dessert at the end was the best.

review_text: Review of Kim Tongdak..Visited as our anniversary coincided with our trip. I couldnt make a reservation for Taxgux, so I made a reservation for Oxtable. From the entrance to the escort setting and service, they were extremely friendly. Location: 3rd floor of the lobby elevator (same floor as Sox Restaurant) Price: About $300 for appetizer steak (900), 2 sides, and wine. (For couples who dont eat a lot, 450g is enough to create an atmosphere, so it can be priced in the $200 range.) Menu: Caesar salad (price... 4 pieces of lettuce for one and a half servings of King Sejong) I personally liked the 900g ribeye medium rare (moderately soft and not tough at all). Wine: Alexander Cavenet (lots of house wine) Additional: Table spacing is wide so you can enjoy it in relative privacy. Famous for its famous Seonsen restaurant (depending on the weather, sometimes I come here just for the dip, myself) Nambawan with Steak in Guam Reservation required. We recommend making a reservation at least one day in advance. A bit of a dress code is needed (if you dont want to be criticized for being from Rungguk, refrain from wearing sweats, flip-flops, or other clothes that dont look good on anyone, but if youre going to say Rungguk, its okay) The response was very good even with a little disturbance. They were friendly from start to finish, and everyone including the server manager were professionals. I 100% plan to visit again next time if our anniversary coincides.
response_from_owner_text: Dear    , Thank you for taking the time to leave an insightful and detailed review of your dining experience with us. Were happy to hear your overall experience with us was positive. As we continue to improve, we look forward to welcoming you back to another memorable experience at Alfredos Steakhouse.
Dear    , Thank you for taking the time to rate us! We hope you found everything well during your stay. As we continue to improve, we hope to welcome you back soon.

review_text: Unfortunately I was disappointed about the steak because I asked for medium rare and it came out medium well. It was really weird that the steak was absolutely dry and tasteless. Most disappointing fine dining I have ever had. The appetizers were nice though. The service was great too.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Justin Marsh, We kindly thank you for leaving us a review of your dining experience with us. We strive to continue to improve our products and services every day and hope that you can visit us again soon to an even better experience.

review_text: Small amount of food and poor service. I visited last night. (June 26th) A male server with glasses offered a poor service. I had to wait more than 40minutes for food and the server didn t care about it. Plus, I ordered T-bone steak but it didn t have a tenderloin part(filet mignon). There has to be two parts in T-bone; which are sirloin and tenderloin. But my T-bone only included sirloin part. So, I asked to check this, but the server pretended not to understand. He is supposed to know this to work and serve a STEAK. The overall food portions of spaghetti, fried rice, and salad are small. The T-bone steak was delicious. The ribeye had so much tendon that it was difficult to eat. We had to wait over 40 minutes for appetizers and wine. The server doesnt even check in the middle. It took 40 minutes for the wagyu fried rice and steak I initially ordered to arrive. (Later, I ran out of food, so I ordered extra wagyu fried rice and it came out in 5 minutes.) The atmosphere was nice and the food was delicious, but the sight of the staff giggling, laughing and playing around without showing any signs of apology even after dropping their own plates felt quite contrary to the atmosphere of the restaurant. The tall, thin, bespectacled server had no interest in our table and was indifferent to anything we asked. The T-bone steak we received only had sirloin on it and no tenderloin, so we asked,  Really?   What s supposed to be there?  I just shrugged, pretending not to know. Why do you work there?
response_from_owner_text: Dear EUNHYE LEE, Thank you for leaving us a review of your dining experience. We apologize for the frustrations you experienced; however, please note that the opinions of our guests are valuable to us and will be shared with the rest of the management team for improvement on the issues youve mentioned. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to welcome you back again and provide you with the level of service and quality you expected to receive here at Alfredos Steakhouse.

review_text: Still, I made a reservation at a high-end restaurant for my birthday, but they asked me in advance if it was my birthday, and even though I asked for a window seat when I made the reservation, they gave me a middle seat, and it took over 40 minutes for my food to come out... Other tables were getting birthday desserts, but they didnt even come to my table... I wouldnt know if I hadnt seen it, but I felt quite bad... A place I would never recommend to others

review_text: It was nice atmosphere for anniversary :) I came here after reading the review of Mutte Hanukubun, and it was chewy. I ordered medium rare. I ordered New York Steak and Ribeye, but I recommend the Ribeye more, and the atmosphere feels like its in a 5-star hotel. I dare to criticize the comment that mentioned Wolfgang, but I recommend it at least once if you stay for a long time because of the atmosphere and service. :)

First of all the service and atmosphere are wonderful. We waited over 1 hour for our food. I may be expecting a lot and dont really eat at high end restaraunts enough but I recently ate at Gordon Ramseys Hells Kitchen in Washington D.C. and we did not wait that long for our food. When the food arrived it was not spectacular the steak internal temp was on point but I felt it lacked seasoning and the steak was cold. The appitizer portions were quite small and were pricey in my opinion. Especially for the price of $22.00 for a medium sized bowl but a small bowl portion (I posted a picture). I think thier kitchen is not big enough to keep up with customer demand. Our server was great but the food was mediocre. I feel that if youre going to charge high end prices the food should be in line with the prices.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Joseph Santos, Thank you for leaving us feedback on your dining experience with us. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to welcome you back again and provide you with the level of service you expected to receive here at Alfredos Steakhouse.

Celebrated a double birthday breakfast for my sister Rose and I on the 28th of December 2023.
I had a $78 course dinner. The taste of a ready-made product. The meat is so tough
Their crabs are so fresh today. Best Friday lunch!! Their deserts still have room to improve. Food

review_text: * Lunch menu available from Monday to Wednesday / Unlimited use of salad bar * Guest discount * Free water!!! 1. Salad bar - There are a good variety of vegetables and toppings, so you can eat whatever you like. 2. Steak (5th lunch menu) - The advantage is that you can eat it much cheaper than lunch. - The sauce was strong, so I only brought vegetables from the salad bar. Its delicious to eat together - The rice is seasoned and really delicious. Looking at the reviews and Google, the menu is expensive for the $155 per person course, but if you aim for the lunch menu, the advantage is that you can taste high-quality cuisine at a low price.
Very nice buffet.

For the first time, I had steak at Roots Hills Grill House. The famous tomahawk was the best Ive ever had on Guam. The price is high due to exchange rates, but if you were to eat this aged meat in Japan, wouldnt it cost twice as much?

The place is very nice and quiet, but there are things missing, firstly refrigerators in the rooms for the tourists convenience of not having to carry water or whatever you buy outside to consume at the breakfast room. Hair dryer, and I would add blinds to the pool to give it another more beautiful view, but very good attention! Everything very clean and neat. Thank you so much!!

Secador de cabello, y a la piscina le pondria vencitas para darle otra vista mas bonita, pero muy buena atencion! Todo muy limpio y prolijo. Muchas gracias!!

We went to the restaurant on the recommendation of the hotel where we were staying, the place is beautiful and the food is not bad but the service . The waitress who served us didnt know anything, we asked for 3 dishes and when we finished with the 2nd they told us that we hadnt ordered the 3rd, we had a complimentary drink that never arrived because they didnt have it, they offer another drink but she says it doesnt fit inside of courtesy, it took them 2 hours to serve 2 dishes and to bring the bill... the truth is that they should give those who make up the team a second thought...
review_translated_text: Acudimos al restaurante por recomendacion del hotel en el que nos encontrabamos alojadas, el lugar es precioso y la comida no esta mala pero el servicio . review_text: I dont usually have bad things to say about breakfast at 2-star hotels... but I never thought Id be talking about it here... Regardless of the number or taste of the food, it is quite disappointing from a resort service perspective. It seems very contradictory that the breakfast menu offers three types of oriental noodle dishes but does not provide chopsticks, while providing foods for tourists from specific countries, such as kimchi and natto. I dont know if I should do it in a Western or American way or not. The food is less detailed than standard breakfast hotels, and in particular, the basic eggs, sausages, and bacon are cooked in the cafeteria. The bacon was fried so well that it disintegrated in all directions when lightly pressed with a fork ;;;; Im not sure if the bakery kneads the dough themselves or uses factory dough, but its not a delicious bread. The waiting time gets longer after 8:20 for breakfast, so you may want to decide your own visit time... I have to eat 5 more meals, but my heart feels heavy.

Although there were a lot of customers, all the staff worked hard and we were guided quickly. Darryl The staff was very friendly and we had a pleasant meal. However, no matter how long I waited, the egg cooker would not put an omelet on it.

Enjoy the lunch buffet. This is a place where you can have a cost-effective meal with casual food at a relatively reasonable price. If youre expecting a full buffet, you might be disappointed, but considering its a casual buffet, you can enjoy a pretty decent meal. Its also nice that it operates seven days a week.

We used it for dinner on Saturday. There were many Japanese people there as they also had Japanese food (sushi, tempura, etc.). The variety and seasoning are perfect. I think the beer is probably Budweiser, but it goes well with meat dishes. We recommend that you reserve a seat by the window or wall. If you live in the center, you wont be able to eat in peace because of the customers who go to pick up their food.
Great place to dine right where the treebar is. 5 stars
Not too many veg options. Service was great.
This is my favorite buffet in Guam.
The service was good but the food wasnt. Not much of a selection, food didnt taste good and it was cold, like it was sitting out for a while. Not worth $35.
Rude staff that just dont care. Food is mediocre compared to other brunch places. Try Aqua or Palm Cafe
They had quite the selection of food. However, the quality was just okay. In my opinion, not worth the price. The service was great though.
Spectacular site and great service!

The serving staff are all friendly. Its a buffet restaurant. It is very inconvenient to have food handed out to you one by one. The staff who serve the food are also unfriendly and seem annoying. I hope they change to self-service like other buffet restaurants. How to do it during corona times Why dont you change it because its inconvenient for both employees and customers?
Food and service good. First time there
One of the best buffets in Guam Wheelchair accessibility: Ramps and parking available Food : 5/5 |

review_text: I wasnt so sure why this place was highly recommended. The table I was sitting was shaking and the drinks(juice) were very watery. Meat was cold and fruits were very unsweetened. I wouldnt spend 100 some dollars on food like these...
A buffet with good value compared to Korea
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: I reserved a seat on the official website the morning of the day. When I told them I was staying at Hotel Nikko, they gave me a small discount because it was an affiliated group! It was a very luxurious space and it was wonderful Its a buffet, but the food is served by the staff behind a glass, so you have to line up. Drinks are ordered from the staff at your seat. I think its a good deal for people who drink alcohol because its all-you-can-drink! The food was plentiful and the meat and cheese were especially delicious! It was interesting to see around 5 happy birthday celebrations during my 2 hour stay.Its a great restaurant for special occasions! (     )
Tsubaki, its okay
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: All the food was delicious. The beer was similar to wheat beer and was delicious, and most of all, I felt good because the staff responded with a friendly smile. The fountain show was also nice. This is a place I want to visit again.

Although it is called a buffet, all the dishes are served by the staff, so you cannot eat them freely. I think it would be inconvenient if you cant speak English at all or are reluctant to do so. Dinner is $60 for adults, and with unlimited beer and wine and no time limit, the price feels like a good deal. The wine is in the $20 class bottle (the bubbles are cheap ones from Wolf Blass). I get the impression that more locals use it on sunny days than Japanese or Koreans, so it has a foreign feel and is lively. However, the food cannot be described as delicious. I get the impression that it is made with extremely cheap ingredients. Moreover, we dont have enough staff, so you have to wait and line up for anything. This restaurant is not suitable for people like me who think that the good thing about a buffet is that there is no service, but you can eat as much food as you like at a good value.
We ordered gnocchi,... and there was a confusion, we complained and they changed us to ravioli, everything was fine, good vibes,
review_translated_text: Pedimos noquis,.. y hubo una confusion, reclamamos y nos cambiaron a ravioles, todo bien, buena onda ,

review_text: The food excellent. The group Los Amigos made us dance after dinner. The bowling sector is also ideal for youth, with an external patio, a safe and quiet place.
review_translated_text: La comida excelente. El grupo Los Amigos desp de cenar nos hizo bailar. Tbn el sector boliche ideal para la juventud, con patio externo un lugar seguro y tranquilo

review_text: Excellent place, food 10 points, the best is the mila sandwich with fries, literally 50cm, and those who serve you 10 points

review_text: Very good service and very delicious empanadas!! Good price.

review_text: Very good service and food
review_translated_text: Muy buena atencion y comida

review_text: Spectacular views
review_translated_text: Vistas espectaculares

review_text: Walking to the refuge takes approximately 1 hour 40 minutes, leaving the car at the gate. First you reach the Habsburg stone and continuing a little further to the refuge where you can see Chile. The road is a car road with some steep sections, with an intermediate difficulty. But its really worth it. The view is unique. You can climb to the top of the stone via metal stairs. The refuge is a restaurant that operates in high season, two nights a week, and reservations are made at the golf bar on the 9th hole, at least a week in advance. There is a set menu, one night lamb and another night fondue, it includes wine and soft drinks and dessert. The quality is incredible although with high prices that are really worth it. Arelauquen takes you by 4x4 from the 9th hole in summer and by snowmobile in winter.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review! Activities in the summer season are only available for groups (minimum 16 people) with prior reservation.
review_translated_text: Ir caminando al refugio se tarda 1 hora 40 min aproximadamente dejando el auto en la tranquera. Primero se llega a la piedra de Habsburgo y siguiendo un poco mas al refugio donde se puede ver Chile. El camino es un camino de auto con algunos tramos empinados, con una dificultad intermedia. Pero vale la pena realmente. La vista es unica   Se puede subir a la punta de la piedra por unas escalinatas de metal. El refugio es un restaurante que funciona en temporada alta, dos noches a la semana, y se reserva en el bar del golf del hoyo 9, con una semana minimo de anticipacion. Hay menu fijo, una noche cordero y otra fondue, incluye vino y gaseosas y postre. La calidad es increible aunque con precios elevados que realmente lo valen. Arelauquen te lleva con 4x4 desde el hoyo 9 en verano y con moto de nieve en invierno.
response_from_owner_translated_text: !Muchas gracias por su resena! Las actividades en la temporada de verano estan disponibles solamente para grupos (minimo  16 personas) con reserva previa.

review_text: We took the snowmobile tour, leaving from El Refugio. The service was wonderful, with a van that picks you up at the hotel, then stops for an Argentine ride, then we go out in a 4x4 to the motorbikes, going up to a tavern at the top of the mountain (Cero Otto) where we can drink wine and served with fondue cheese and then chocolate.
review_translated_text: Fizemos o passeio de snowmobile, saindo do El Refugio. O atendimento foi maravilhoso,  com van que busca no hotel, depois para para uma picada Argentina,  em seguida saimos em um 4x4 ate as motos, subindo ate uma taberna no alto da montanha ( Cero Otto) onde podemos tomar vinho e servido com fondue de queijo e depois de chocolate.

review_text: Beautiful experience without a doubt
review_translated_text: Hermosa experiencia sin duda

review_text: Excellent service, the guys are very friendly. Abundant dishes, the trout ravioli, are excellentssss
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion, los chicos son muy amables. Platos abundantes, los ravioles de trucha, son excelentesssss

review_text: Reason for my low grade: disregard for human beings. Read with attention. We booked the tour and the transfer is included. On the way back, it was snowing a lot (and I questioned whether they would continue the tour even in adverse weather conditions - a lot of snow was forecast). Our house was 350 meters from the main route, along a dirt road. The transfer driver told us to get out of the van and said we had to walk home. Thats right, walking! Under heavy snow, in the dark, on a dirt road. My parents are over 70 and had a really hard time. We feel abandoned to our own devices. The biggest absurdity Ive ever seen in an experience that is so unique and expensive. As if snow were a surprise in Bariloche... transfers should take place in 4x4 vehicles suitable for the citys conditions. The tour is beautiful, but I cant recommend anyone going through a disastrous experience like the one we went through. Bad memory!
review_translated_text: Motivo da minha nota baixa: descaso com o ser humano. Leia com atencao. Contratamos o passeio e o transfer esta incluso. No retorno, estava nevando muito (sendo que questionei se mantinham o passeio mesmo em condicoes de tempo adversas - havia previsao de muita neve). Nossa casa ficava a 350 metros da ruta principal, por uma estrada de chao batido. O motorista do transfer nos mandou descer da van e disse que tinhamos que ir caminhando pra casa. Isso mesmo, caminhando! Sob forte nevasca, no escuro, por dentro de uma estrada de chao batido. Meus pais tem mais de 70 anos e tiveram muita dificuldade. Nos sentimos abandonados a propria sorte. O maior absurdo que ja vi numa experiencia que e tao unica e cara. Como se neve fosse uma surpresa em Bariloche  os transfers deveriam se realizar em veiculos 4x4 adequados as condicoes da cidade. O passeio e lindo, mas nao posso recomendar a ninguem passar por uma experiencia desastrosa como a que passamos. Pessima recordacao!

review_text: Expensive value for an elegant dinner, but they serve fundi with sausages and leeks.
review_translated_text: Valor carissimo para um passei com jantar elegante, mas servem fundi com salsichas e alho poro.

review_text: People on motorbikes were extremely impatient with tourists who wanted to take photos. Although the service from the girls at the fondue was good, the fondue proved to be very precarious (especially considering the amount paid)... cheese fondue accompanied by apple, sausage and ham... bad! If they promise a sunset view, dont believe it, many of those who were there went just because of that and felt frustrated. As for snow for motorcycles, ask well in advance what it will be like (if there will be little snow and such, which is what reduces the ride time)
response_from_owner_text: We are sorry that you were not satisfied with your experience! The sunset, or better explained, the sunset, can only be seen on the first shift of the tour, which leaves the hotel at 5:00 pm, and as you went on the second shift, it is really impossible. We leave our contact details if you want to send opinions and suggestions +5492944285846 Your opinion is very important to us!
review_translated_text: Pessoas das motos extremamente sem paciencia com os turistas que queriam tirar fotos. Em que pese o atendimento das garotas no fondue tenha sido bom, o fondue se mostrou bem precario (principalmente, considerando o valor pago)   foundue de queijo acompanhado por maca, salsicha e presunto ruim! Se prometerem vista do por do sol, nao acreditem, muitos dos que estava la, foram so por isso e se sentiram frustrados. Quanto a neve para as motos, pergunte bem antes como sera (se vai ter pouca neve e tal, que e o que diminui o tempo de passeio)
response_from_owner_translated_text: Sentimos muito que nao estiveram satisfeitos com a experiencia!  O por do sol, ou melhor explicado, o atardecer so pode ser visto no primeiro turno do passeio que tem saida do hotel as 17:00hs, e como voces foram no segundo turno e realmente impossivel. Deixamos nosso contato caso o senhor queira enviar opinioes e sugestoes +5492944285846 Sua opiniao e muito importante pra nos!

review_text: Impossible to make a reservation. They dont answer the phone. Terrible service
response_from_owner_text: Good afternoon! For the tour we request advance reservation and we are at your disposal by WhatsApp +5492944285846. We hope to welcome you to our mountain refuge soon!

response_from_owner_translated_text: Buenas tardes! Para el paseo solicitamos reserva anticipada y estamos a su disposicion por WhatsApp +5492944285846. Esperamos recibirlos en nuestro Refugio de montana pronto!

review_text: Most beautiful view of Bariloche!!!!! Unforgettable!!! All staff very kindly!!! Worth the experience!!! They could invest more in the quality of the fondue, especially the chocolate one leaves a lot to be desired.

review_text: Place with beautiful view and good food. I booked the tour with an agency, which includes snowmobiling. Expensive, but worth the experience.

review_text: Its the best tour to do in Bariloche. Simply unforgettable. You will have a lot of fun, the tour lasts three to three and a half hours including: the 4x4 trail, the snowmobile section and dinner at the refuge, where a delicious fondue is served. Bariloche tour El Refugio is unmissable.

place_name: Casa Cassis Restaurant & Boutique de Cocina
review_text: Today I was able to try several delicacies from this Restaurant, the dinner was done in several steps, it was an experience of flavors, colors and aromas. Among all the proposals presented I could highlight... Finger and Fork Artisan breads Patagonian Smoked Regional cheeses Pickles shot Carrots, citrus, lemon grass Entrance Salmonated trout with green currant emulsion. Main dish Veal loin with lilac morel puff pastry. Dessert Tasting of ice cream with red fruits.
review_translated_text: Hoy pude probar varias exquisiteces de este Restaurante, la cena se realizo en varios pasos, fue una experiencia de sabores, colores y aromas. Entre todas las propuestas presentadas pude destacar ... Finger y Fork Panes artesanos Ahumados Patagonicos Quesos regionales Escabeches Shot Zanahorias, citricos, limon grass Entrada Trucha salmonada con emulsion de grosellas verdes. Plato principal Lomo de ternera con hojaldre de morillas lilaceas. Postre Degustacion de helados con frutos rojos.

review_text: Nice Italian restaurant in the higher end category, not a chain restaurant located inside Hyatt Resort.  Food recommendations: Bisteca di Manzo alla fiorentina and Antipasto alla Italiano.  Service was pretty good minus a long wait for the main course. If you have a special event such as birthday or anniversary they will bring you a complimentary dessert. Parking: Hyatt Resort has a large parking garage on the right as you enter the resort as well as valet.

Food was better than expected. One of the best restaurants with the finest tastes Ive been to during my short stay in Guam. The T-bone was better than those of nearby restaurants, too. If the interior was as good as its tastes, the restaurant would likely sell more. Its a pity they only open on the weekends.
We kindly informed you that we will be closed until October 13, 2023 for internal repairs.
Great food. Average service. Wheelchair accessibility: Best for mama Food : 5/5 |
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: This is a pretty high-end Italian restaurant in Guam. The store only has information in English and Korean, but the staff who can speak Japanese gave us detailed explanations. The restaurant is spacious and the seats are well spaced, so you can enjoy your meal in peace with your group. As for the food, the appetizers and pizza were delicious, but the T-bone steak, which weighed 1 kg, was the most impressive due to its visual impact. The meat was cut from the beginning and was tender and very easy to eat.
review_translated_text: 1kg   T

review_text: Service could be better
This is a great pizza restaurant. The wood-fired pizza is delicious and the mushroom soup is delicious.
Back open, and ready to please. Come for the pizza or fine Italian. Either way I was a fan.

Comfortable. Pricy. Great service. Great food. Did not know this place existed. The restaurant is quite small in comparison to their other restaurants on property with lots of intimate couple seating near the garden/pool view. This establishment is a semi fine dining restaurant with no strict attire requirements to eat here. The server greeted and seated us quickly without a reservation on a Friday night during the holidays. The menu has some good offerings and the servers can recommend a nice wine pairing to go with your entree. We opted for a Quattro cheese pizza for an appetizer and it is amazing...not your usual cheese pizza and comes with a side of honey to drizzle on top. It may sound weird but its a delicious match. As the name suggests, their pasta was cooked perfectly al dente and was very tasty. My thick tenderloin steak was cooked a perfect medium rare and did not disappoint. While the pizza and entrees were delicious, their bread service was lacking and is nothing to brag about. Simple bread with simple olive oil and vinaigrette sauce...wasnt terrible but wasnt great. The service was great overall with the kitchen staff coming out to visit diners and check on the food. The wine selection is decent and the staff are also knowledgeable of the differences between the wines they offer. The prices of the items are quite high, but warranted as the overall experience justified the cost. Lastly, if you or another member of your party has vision problems, this may not be the place to come as it is very dim with a single candle per table and is hard to see and read the menu.
response_from_owner_text: Many thanks for your positive feedback. Its a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed our delicious food. We hope to see you again, Victor!

review_text: Used for dinner. was delicious.
response_from_owner_text: Hafa Adai Osakapaa-san, thank you for giving us 4 stars!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hafa Adai       -san, thank you for giving us 4 stars!

response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the positive rating, Kenji!
Thank you for rating us, Andrew! Feel free to contact us via email at hafaadai@hyatt.com to further discuss about how we can improve your stay with us. Thank you and come again!

review_text: 2/14/20 Valentines dinner for two. Waitstaff was TOP NOTCH, extremely watchful, attentive and not overly asking if everything was ok which was nice as it was wifey and husband time. Got the Valentines 5 course dinner for two $220 Food: Appetizers, salad, extremely small portions but tasty, enough for a mouse... Soup was fantastic, perfect portion. Main course was unfortunately underwhelming. Steak was tasty, fish was rubbery and bland. They dropped one 9oz steak and fish in one skillet which we had to split    they should have cut it in half and placed it on separate plates instead of us having to cut it ourselves and drip on the table while distributing the portions to each other. This was probably the most disappointing presentation of a main course or meal to be honest. Dessert was partially melted when it arrived, it was very tasty but the melted ice cream was also a disappointing presentation. Overall I would think twice before coming back.

Its been a long time since we last had dinner. Im glad I made a reservation. I enjoyed Fiorentina (T-bone steak) while drinking my favorite Italian wine, Antinori red. Accompaniments are asparagus, red potatoes, and mashed potatoes. Primos squid ink pasta with shrimp sauce was also very delicious. I also had my brothers prosciutto pizza and enjoyed the meal. My mothers roasted lamb was so delicious that even though she didnt have a finger ball, I ended up biting into it (sweat) and misbehaved. Although it is difficult to make reservations, I would definitely like to eat here again.
Always spot on!! Menu changes,  but still awesome!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the positive feedback, Shannon! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our food. You are welcome to come again!

review_text: Excellent service but tasteless food. We were served 5 bland pumpkin sorrentinos. The flavorless mushroom risotto. They decorate the plates with a sauce with food coloring (too much) you get stains all over. I will not come back
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion pero la comida sin gusto. Nos sirvieron 5 sorrentinos de calabaza insulsos. El rissoto de Hongos sin sabor. Los platos los decoran con una salsa con colorante (demasiada) te manchas todo. No volvere

review_text: Luxurious restaurant located at the Selvaje hotel. The food is definitely good but there are certainly also locations in the city center which are similar and are a bit more vibrant. Parking: Free parking at the hotel
The food is good but I expected something more, the service is excellent.
review_translated_text: La comida esta bien pero esperaba algo mas, la atencion es excelente.

review_text: We were guests from the neighboring hotel complex. Very friendly, unobtrusive service and a fantastic dinner. Starting with the salad, through the perfectly roasted meat to the espresso. Priced high but reasonable. Hassle-free payment with credit card. Everything almost perfect. Small deductions in the ambience, as the air conditioning in the restaurant is very loud and therefore annoying. Well still come back. Vegetarian options: Available
review_translated_text: Wir waren aus der benachbarten Hotelanlage zu Gast. Sehr freundlicher, unauffalliger Service und ein fantastisches Abendessen. Angefangen beim Salat, uber das perfekt gebratene Fleisch bis hin zum Espresso. Preislich gehoben aber angemessen. Problemlose Zahlung mit Kreditkarte. Alles fast perfekt. Kleine Abzuge beim Ambiente, da die Klimaanlage im Restaurant doch sehr laut ist und daher stort. Wir kommen trotzdem wieder. Vegetarian options: Vorhanden

review_text: Amazing experience. A real must try in the area. They combine the best of local dishes with what Argentina has to offer. The Reserva Malbec made a great pairing with our mouthwatering steaks, their homemade desserts topped our wonderful meal of in style!!
Very delicious food, very good service
review_translated_text: Comida muy rica, muy buena atencion

review_text: Very good restaurant. Reasonable prices and a very warm place. Excellent atention
