review_text: The INCREDIBLE place for lunch or dinner at night surrounded by nature. You dont need to be staying at the hotel to go. Excellent attention! The two guys who served us the 4 times we went were really very attentive and helpful. The best restaurant proposal in the area.
review_translated_text: El lugar INCREIBLE para almorzar o comer a la noche en plena naturaleza. No hace falta estar hospedado en el hotel para ir. La atencion excelente! Los dos chicos que nos atendieron las 4 veces que fuimos eran realmente muy atentos y serviciales. La mejor propuesta de restaurant de la zona.

review_text: Excellent place !! The prices are very good in relation to the quality and compared to the restaurants in the area.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar !! Los precios muy buenos en relacion a la calidad y comparando con los restaurantes de la zona.

review_text: Spectacular restaurant in the middle of the jungle. The facilities, although not luxury, are of impeccable quality. With all Volf tableware and glassware, they stand out for their impeccable service. The dishes are classic (for an Argentinian) and well made. With slightly exorbitant decorations that do not interfere with the final taste. Likewise, the decorations are opinions, the dishes were delicious!! The service is attentive and highly qualified, and the wine list is complete with options for all tastes. I like to think that the chef is a pastry chef, because the flan was the most delicious in a long time! We highlighted the lacquered sweetbreads, they came with some palmetto and celery pickles from another world I would try other dishes again.
review_translated_text: Espectacular restaurante en medio de la selva. Las instalaciones si bien no son de lujo, son de impecable calidad. Con toda la vajilla y cristaleria de Volf, se destacan por lo impecable del servicio. Los platos son clasicos (para un argentino) y bien hechos. Con unas decoraciones un poco exorbitantes que no molestan en el gusto final. Igualmente, las decoraciones son opiniones, los platos estaban riquisimos!! El servicio es atento y super calificado, y la carta de vinos es completa con opciones para todos los gustos. Me gusta pensar que la/el chef es pastelerx, porque el flan fue el mas rico en mucho tiempo! Destacamos las mollejas laqueadas, venian con unos pickles de palmito y apio de otro mundo Volveria a probar otros platos.

review_text: Excellent attention and service Excellent food  top chef!!! The best of Iguazu far away!!! Come and meet him without hesitation. Thank you very much  we will return!
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion y servicio La comida excelente  el cheff de primera!!! Lo mejor de Iguazu lejos!!! Pasen a conocerlo sin dudar. Muchas gracias  volveremos!

review_text: Impeccable service, I highly recommend it.
review_translated_text: Atendimento impecavel, super recomendo.

review_text: Wonderful cozy place
review_translated_text: Lugar maravilhoso aconchegante

review_text: Excellent restaurant, highly recommended
review_translated_text: Excelente restaurante super indico

review_text: I recommend it to everyone. Everything very tasty.
review_translated_text: Recomendo a todos. Tudo muito gostoso.

review_text: Very cozy place and the food is super tasty.
review_translated_text: Local bastante aconchegante e a comida super saborosa.

review_text: I recommend The Blazing Bacon Jalapeno Spicy Burger with a Vanilla bean shake! Burgers and vanilla shakes seem to go hand in hand. This burger fully loaded with lettuce, red onion, pickles, bacon and their special sauce with jalapenos is full of flavor. It s not to spicy but, just right and flavorful! and paired with a vanilla shake truly make for delicious lunch. Also the shakes are soft enough to go through a straw without having to wait for them to warm up.
Great food, really friendly staff. Menu is a bit limited right now, but so is everywhere thats still recovering from the typhoon.
Love the burgers, a bit pricey, but Id come back again.
Best service and food is so tasty!
Great food

The BURGERS, Fries, & Shakes are definitely all delicious. Favorite Burger is DOUBLE MUSHROOM SWISS BURGER. This is my families favorite Dine in BURGER joint. Whoever is the cook makes the best BURGERS on the island. Hands Down!!! Keep it up, Chef. Front of the house cashiers have awesome service as well. The price is right & so is worth every bite. Need to bring back the onion rings. Although I havent tried it yet   bt I really want to. Lol. Onion rings are my favorite.  And if there was Onion Rings as a side, that would be awesome Kid-friendliness: Children love the Fries. Chili cheese fries are the best then the Sweet potato fries  . Shakes are all the best! Wheelchair accessibility: Definitely accommodating!
Good smash burgers in Dededo.  If your familiar with Meskla Does, its similar food.  If you up north its worth a stop.  Cant go wrong with any burger type or milkshake.

Wow. If youre looking for a tasty burger, Dish N That is the spot. They have ample parking and can sit at least 40 people inside. The vibe is chill; a great spot for a lazy afternoon with the boo. We were famished after a hike and the burger was so satisfying (and the sweet potato fries). Note: Greatness takes time, so be patient when it takes 15 minutes for your food. It will not disappoint. We ordered the sunrise burgers. They were fresh off the grill and still juicy on the inside. I recommend asking for an extra side of burger sauce to dip your fries. The cashier was so considerate and kept us informed as we stared at the kitchen hungrily. This is our 2nd time coming here. The food is consistently good and weve never had to wait in line or struggle to find a seat, even noon on a Saturday. Wheelchair accessibility: There is a small lip to get in the door, but no steps.
Loved the set up. The food was ok.

Probably the best burger I ve had in my life but the flaw is the low amount of employees There s usually only one person on cashier and one person cooking or one person on cashier and cooking and I came in on a busy day and ordered a burger and had to wait over an hour because of the large amount of orders in front of my order
Large burgers and portions sizes. Quick service with pleasant staff

Love the burgers, the fries came out cold and needs a little bit more salt. Clean place, and acceptable customer service. The wait time is outrageous tho; even with no one in the store we still had to wait but that s because everything is made from scratch and it s fresh so it s taste better.
Excellent burgers. Good music. I recommend 100%!
review_translated_text: Excelentes hamburguesas. Buena musica. Recomiendo 100% !

review_text: It was an oasis along the way, totally recommended
review_translated_text: Fue un oasis en el camino, totalmente recomendable

review_text: We traveled by car from San Martin de los Andes to the caves and looking for where to have lunch in the middle I arrived at the Caracas district for the comments. Everything is excellent. We ate very well, they treated us very well. The burgers and fries are a 10
review_translated_text: Viajamos en auto desde san martin de los andes hacia las grutas y buscando donde almorzar en el medio llegue a distrito caracas x los comentarios. Es excelente todo. Comimos super bien nos trataron re bien. Las hamburguesas y papas son un 10

review_text: Great burger joint! Everything was perfect. The burgers were very tasty and a good size, the fries were homemade and the portion was abundant. There was a variety of beers and drinks. Do not miss it. PS: What we liked the most was that they fed the dogs that passed through the area.
review_translated_text: Gran hamburgueseria! Todo estuvo perfecto. Las hamburguesas muy sabrosas y de buen tamano, las papas eran caseras y la porcion abundante. Habia variedad de cervezas y bebidas. No se lo pierdan. PD: Lo que mas nos gusto fue que alimenten a los perritos que pasaban por la zona.

review_text: We came from Bariloche to Viedma. We stopped to eat hamburgers. They are the best burgers on the entire southern line. Incredibly good. And the fries 100 points. Super recommended. Dont miss them
review_translated_text: Veniamos de Bariloche hasta Viedma. Paramos a comer hamburguesas.  Son las mejores hamburguesas de toda la linea sur. Increiblemente buenas. Y las papas fritas 100 puntos. Super recomendables.  No se las pierdan

review_text: Excellent atention. Excellent food.
review_translated_text: Muy buena atencion. Excelente la comida.

review_text: Carlitos Burgers are more than excellent. Delicious. Quality
review_translated_text: Mas que excelente las Hamburguesas de Carlitos. Riquisimas. Calidad

review_text: Very good!!! Excellent service, it is worth stopping along the route to taste some delicious Venezuelan burgers.
review_translated_text: Buenisimo!!! Excelente atencion, vale la pena hacer un alto en la ruta para saborear unas ricas hamburguesas Venezuela.

review_text: Wonderful place to enjoy a good burger with delicious fries. The service is excellent, because they are very friendly and very fast.
review_translated_text: Maravilloso lugar para disfrutar de una buena hamburguesa con unas deliciosas patatas. El servicio es excelente, porque son muy amables y muy rapidos.

review_text: Absolutely delicious! And the great and friendly treatment. Super recommended
review_translated_text: Absolutamente delicioso! Y el trato estupendo y amable. Super recomendado

review_text: I would only return to Jacobacci to eat the best burgers in the country
review_translated_text: Solo volveria a Jacobacci a comer las mejores hamburguesas del pais

review_text: The best food place in Ingeniero Jacobacci. Food and service a 10
review_translated_text: El mejor lugar de comida en Ingeniero Jacobacci. Comida y servicio un 10

review_text: Spectacular burgers, generous portion of potatoes. Super recommended
review_translated_text: Espectaculares las hamburguesas, porcion de papas generosa. Super recomendable

review_text: Burger size is very good.
review_translated_text: Tamano de la hamburguesa es muy buena.

review_text: Excellent
review_translated_text: Excelente

review_text: It is a very cozy place, and the person in charge was very kind to me, I still order there and it is my favorite food place
review_translated_text: Es un lugar muy acogedor, y la persona encargada fue muy amable conmigo, sigo pidiendo ahi y es mi lugar favorito de comidas

review_text: Awesome burgers!!!!!
review_translated_text: Impresionantes hamburguesas!!!!!

review_text: Food was okay, but not worth the price. Chef is kind of a snob for not allowing take-out orders. The rest of the staff are very friendly.

I was concerned because there were some bad reviews recently, but that wasnt the case at all! Its such a delicious and great place! The spectrum of cuisine is truly diverse! In particular, the foods commonly seen in Guam seem a bit far from healthy, but there were many foods that tasted good and felt healthy! The servers were very friendly, the breeze was cool, and it was really great! I ate bolognaise pasta, hummus, 2 chicken skewers, and anemos salad, and I was very satisfied with all the menu items!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the nice review

review_text: Loved it. Great portion, great taste.  Will be back.  Their paella was awesome
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Akua!

review_text: This is an outstanding restaurant for the type of experience they are trying to provide. It stands above most mid range sit down restaurants on Guam.  The food is mostly mezze style (appetizer) with the exception of a few dishes but the portions are a good size.  Service was top notch and the overall atmosphere was great. Parking is best in the Dusit Thani garage.  The mushroom risotto is one of my favorites, I highly recommend it. Vegetarian options: Plenty of vegetarian mezze to choose from. Parking: Best parking is Dusit Thani garage with a short walk to the restaurant. Kid-friendliness: High-chairs available Wheelchair accessibility: Seating options for wheel chairs.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Chad.  Really appreciated
Thank you Dan

review_text: Absolutely love coming here with my wife. It is our number one date spot with phenomenal service as soon as we step into the doorway. The greeting, the environment, the feel of the restaurant is amazing. The food and drinks are top notch!! Real whole food ingredients imported from Greece, Chef Stefano is EXTREMELY talented and absolutely wonderful and personable. He and his team, truly make us feel like we are being hosted in his home making both my wife and I feel honored in the way in which we are served. Everything about this place is great and I will 100% recommend this for anyone s dining experience.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nicholas for the terrific review.  We are pleased that the service, food and environment are all to your liking.  We agree 100% that Chef Stefano and his team are extremely talented.  We are proud and thrilled to have them with us.  Thank you again!

review_text: Ive been to Guam about 10 times and this was the most delicious Ive ever had. I ordered 1 bottle of wine and 5 dishes for $180. On the way, the owner came to say hello and told me that the chef was Greek and that the ingredients were carefully selected. I feel the commitment. The risotto in particular was exquisite. The homepage is in Japanese and Korean, so you dont have to worry about it.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the nice review

review_text: Ive been to Guam about 10 times and this was the most delicious Ive ever had. 1 bottle of wine and 5 dishes cost $180. its the best. On the way, the owner came to say hello and told me that the chef was Greek and that the ingredients were carefully selected. I feel the commitment. The menu is available in Japanese and Korean on the official website, so you dont have to worry about it. The risotto was exquisite.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the very nice comments. I personally love the risotto as well.  And the desserts are exquisite. The cheeses and fish are flown in from Greece. The lamb is from New Zealand.  The pasta dishes are homemade. My personal favorite is the tartar   it s the best I ve ever had. For reference by others this guest chose a full course set menu. Individual dishes generally range from around $15 to $35. Thank you again for the nice compliments

review_text: This Mediterranean restaurant is a real GEM!  We were instantly met with a vibrant, cozy atmosphere, warmly welcomed by the friendly staff.  We had the pleasure of meeting Chef Stefano, whose passion for Mediterranean cuisine really shone through in every dish we tried, particularly in his personally recommended specials which were simply outstanding! We tried a variety of dishes such as babaganush, chicken skewers, the Anemos Salad, and a traditional eggplant dish, each one more delicious than the last.  The desert, especially the Baklava, was probably the best way to end our meal. We loved how authentic the flavours were - you could tell they took pride in serving up traditional Mediterranean food.  Overall, this restaurant has great service, amazing food and a vibrant atmosphere.  I cant recommend it enough and I cant wait for my next visit!
response_from_owner_text: Dear Lata, Thank you so much for your terrific review! Were very happy  beaming that you had such a wonderful experience at our restaurant. The unique atmosphere and friendly welcome are what we strive for, and Chef Stefano is equally thrilled for your warm words about his cuisine as he is one of the most passionate chefs I have met. Each dish you mentioned, from the babaganush to the baklava, is crafted with  authentic techniques and the freshest ingredients many of which we fly in from Greece and Italy. Were so happy you could taste the dedication and we cant wait to welcome you back soon and continue to share the magic of Mediterranean flavors with you. We also added Italian dishes and soon some Spanish as well as we continue to expand the geography of the Med :)

review_text: There was a cute hostess who grabbed our attention as we walked by, she was very friendly and gave us some menus to look at because there was a smaller menu initially to get your attention on the side walk. We decided to eat inside and the atmosphere was wonderful, a wall of greenery with lights mixed in with a modern yet sophisticated look without being to overwhelming. our waiter Raven was so lovely! Great energy, funny and did amazing. The chef came out and spoke with us offering help with the menu and again came out when I did have a question about a certain dish. The food was DELICIOUS. We are absolutely going there again but bringing our kids next time. The paella had a spice but not spicy, it had a kick but didn t make you sweat- slowly died down. The calamari is the best I ve had on island. I can t wait to eat there again and try more of the food. Truly amazing. Wish I had pictures but my phone was back in the room charging. 10/10 recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Savannah, Your review is a testament to everything we aim to achieve from the hostess to the atmosphere and Ravens great service.  Chef Stefano and our team try hard to create an unforgettable dining experience. He loves connecting with guests and sharing his culinary passion. We cant wait to have you back with your family.

review_text: Great food.  All food we ordered tasted exeptionally great. Service is not great Some menus are unavailable Food : 5/5
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback, DongHoon! Were thrilled you loved the food   thats our top priority. Were sorry to hear about the service and unavailable menu items. Were actively working to improve both areas and appreciate you bringing them to our attention. Wed love to hear more about your experience and how we can do better next time. Feel free to reach out directly at info@baldyga.com.  The sales team will get it and they provide me with copies of any guest interactions that are sent there. Thanks again

review_text: Not a bad place. Dishes may take a little long to arrive. But once during a long service they treated me to dessert and the dish was not included in the bill
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Galiya. We apologize for the delay in service during your visit. We were preparing for a major event scheduled for this evening, which may have contributed to the wait time. Were glad that the service recovery with the complimentary dessert was appreciated. We value your patience and feedback, and we hope youll visit us again soon.

review_text: Best
response_from_owner_text: Thank you
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Overpriced food. Paid $85 for 2 Gyros and 2 side salads. Waiter lied about the daily fish special - he claimed Basa fish was imported from Greece, even if it is a catfish species native to Southeast Asia. Waiter also said their tap water tastes metallic to try and upsell us on drinks.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Juha.  My regrets that did not have a good experience. My GM checked into this and I would like to clarify a few things.  Lunch is a set course for $32/pp.  It includes a choice of one appetizer: Greek salad, Dolmas, Greek meatballs, Mussels or Onion soup.  And also a choice of one main: Mushroom risotto, Beef sofrito, Grilled fish, Souvlaki (gyro) or Tomato basil pasta. Apparently you ordered the Greek Salad and gyro.  The server says he offered you tap water and you asked for bottled water.  We do not offer a side salad nor do we serve basa fish. The fish for our crusted fish dish is in fact flown in from Crete Greece on dry ice weekly. My regrets you had a poor experience and hope you can return sometime and try some different dishes.

review_text: A shop opened in May 2023 across from Guams DFS. For a late lunch on a weekday. Above all, the staff who took care of me were very kind. (I wish I had asked for your name.) I ordered the Crispy Calamari, which was delicious with crunchy squid rings topped with a garlicky mayonnaise sauce and a little spicy chili. Perfect for lunch with alcohol. As I was trying to decide what to order next, NICE Guy, who is a bit of a guy, told me that he definitely recommends this! Its perfect for wine! Thats what he said Forest mushroom risotto. When I took a bite of the risotto I recommended, He was watching me from a distance, worried about my reaction. (Return with a good gesture) I was getting a little tired of pizza and steak. It was very good. When I was having trouble connecting to Wi-Fi, since there was no Wi-Fi at the store, he was kind enough to bring his iPhone and let me share his Wi-Fi! When I asked him to take pictures, he took about 10 in a short time. Im glad you thought about the angle. This is a restaurant with outstanding hospitality. (he) This is the best restaurant that I would definitely like to go to for dinner next time. Thank you Nice Guy. Thank you so much for your kindness! See you soon!!!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the nice note.  We are very proud of our team and very glad that you had a good experience. We will share your note with the team.
review_translated_text: 2023 5 NICE Guy               ! Wi-Fi                 Wi-Fi           iPhone         Wi-Fi              ! 10 Nice Guy Thank you so much for your kindness ! See you soon !!!!!!

response_from_owner_text: Thansk for the rating

review_text: Absolutely exceptional experience every single time! The food is spectacular, the service  phenomenal. Every time I have come, I feel like I am being hosted as a special guest of honor in the chef s home, not just a restaurant. Best and most consistent service I have ever experienced in my entire life! Absolutely exquisite in every way. My favorite restaurant on Guam and arguably in the world. I always cannot wait to come back!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ashley.  We are happy that you appreciate the passion of our team and the fresh ingredients that we fly in from Europe. Much appreciated.

review_text: Vegetarian options: Had the forest mushroom risotto and it was delicious! The presentation was awesome too! We had a ladies night out and the ambiance here was wonderful.  I will return here soon! Food
response_from_owner_text: thank you for the nice rating
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: A perfect place for a date or ladies night out!!!! The food is delicious, service is winded and the best part is the friendly chef who comes to your table and make you feel like you are family!!!! We had a great time and will definitely come back soon!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Michelle.  I hope you enjoyed one of our new Italian specials!

review_text: Food and service was great. The interior has been renovated and has made the restaurant much cooler and an enjoyable experience
response_from_owner_text: Hi Benjamin.  We have a cold air conditioned room. Next time please ask for the private dining room.  I m addition, we also have air conditioning in the main tent area but we play it by ear. Some people prefer the open air breeze and ceiling fans.  Please simply let the staff know if you re warm and they ll take care of it for you

review_text: First visit since it became Hoshino Resorts. The menu structure has also changed since the Onward era, which was very disappointing. The taste has deteriorated so much that I wont come back again (limited to teppanyaki)
Are you a new chef? I requested medium wear. I became welldom ruining the quality of the steak The meat was too salty.
I stayed at the hotel and had a meal. It was friendly and delicious.
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: The hotel had Japanese food. The squid oysters were delicious ~ Hiroshima oysters made in Yabari Japan! The fries were cold. It felt calm. The southern smile  was great.
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Delicious but a little expensive
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: It is not extremely high compared to the local price level. I think this is a casual restaurant that you can go to when you want to eat Japanese food once in a while.
The food was excellent but the service need some more training on the staffs. Couple times we have to look for them to make an order.

Teppan cooking artisans are here. It was even better that wine corkage was available for a fee. In particular, reservations for the Ocean View Tepan Chef Course are only accepted on weekends. ha  . No one should go  If its crowded with reservations, I cant go when I want to. Go alone... .
review_translated_text: Teppan              .                        .                                  .    .                                  .        .

review_text: Nice view, they have Teppenyaki services, and very good cuisines and dishes
We had sukiyaki at dinner. As I am not a big eater, its hard to finish all served food. The quality of meats was above average. Satisfied with the quality and quantity at the price.
Teppanyaki is very delicious. The scenery is nice too. Shabu-shabu is very popular. It s two o clock and it s sunny.

Spectacular sunset view!...while eating teppanyaki style. Price higher than another teppanyaki restaurant in lower Tumon.  The waiters are very respectful.  Would love to go back when the lunch buffet is up again.
Good foods and Good services

You will find out what Jonmattaeng is. This place is the best restaurant in Guam. Be sure to choose the chef s course meal (teppanyaki). You will experience an atmosphere and taste that goes beyond what you can experience in Korea.
Use brunch. You can drink as much champagne as you like, and the meat will be grilled on the spot.
temporalry closed

Ordered a pizza and waited 50 mins just for them to tell me it was gonna be a little bit longer before it was ready. Not what I expecting for a restaurant of this quality. Needless to say I cancelled the pizza and walked out.
Very delicious food, everything was very tasty. The sweet potato soup it is AMAZING!!! Only I don t like is the canned sauce for the bread.
Consistent quality culinary from Westin F&B, keep the good work!
If I closed my eyes I think I was eating in a Italian Restarunt in Italy! The food was the best Italian food since I left Europe in 2004!
You can see the sea from the terrace seats. I ordered a fillet a la carte and 4 glasses of wine and it cost about $90.
Love the mushrooms soup and pizza
Wide variety of food. Awesome brunch

The view was great. The atmosphere was great. The service was great. The company was excellent. The afternoon tea set menu was decent. Could be better. Nothing special. They do give you unlimited teas and coffee so thats always a plus in my nonexistent book... more like mental note. Anyway, Id go back again.
Excellent view. Service leaves much to be desired; my appetizer arrived after my entree, had to wait a long time for my check, etc. Food was alright.

We made a reservation, even though I m pretty sure you don t need to. It was Saturday night so I wanted to be safe. We were promptly seated and there was a high chair already at the table for my son which was awesome. When ordering drinks they were out of a few of the beers we wanted, but as always Corona and Bud Light we available. We got the Minestrone soup, it tasted like a can soup with some pesto drizzled on top to class it up. It came out around the same time as some sourdough bread with marinara, this was pretty good. I ordered the Carbonara and my wife got the Fettuccine Seafood, we also got the kids cheese pizza. The pizza came out first and my son loved it, I thought it was lacking in sauce, but as long as he enjoyed it. The pasta dishes though...were a bit sad. The Carbonara came with a poached egg on top, weird but worth a taste. The sauce was closer to a hollandaise than a carbonara, and there were raw (maybe slightly sauteed) onions in the dish that were overpowering. If this was listed on the menu I would ve asked for the dish with out it. My wife s fettuccine was just like they took a can of tomato sauce and added some frozen seafood. It was very thin on both flavor and consistency. Overall, service was good, food was mediocre, and it s very pricey. Definitely only giving it 2 stars purely on the service and the fact my 3 yr old was happy. I d skip this spot and go to CPK instead.

I like menus that use salmon and tuna. It is very tasty. There is also a wide variety of wine. You can enjoy many brands by the glass. This is great for someone like me who likes to drink a lot of things! Depending on the season, you can also eat on the terrace, and the service is good. We use it for regular dinners rather than holiday buffet times. Has the chef changed recently? I feel like the a la carte flavor has gotten better and the quantity has doubled. When I looked at other customers, they were eating pasta and pizza. I dont think that was the case in the past... The large bread served with free tomato sauce is delicious! This is so delicious that I never choose pasta or pizza. An appetizer or soup and main dish will fill you up.
Go for Saturday lunch! Excellent and affordable with their Saturday special. Amazing views, excellent service.
Good italian food and good ambiance
Guam fun

response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your visit ! Happy new year

review_text: We came to celebrate a birthday at an exclusive place, the food was very delicious, but there were comments about the service, the waiter offered us water upon boarding, we thought it was a compliment to the establishment, but then we found out that water costs $7, too They told us that for a birthday they brought a pancake as a gift, in the end they did not bring it, we also ordered a bottle of wine, they did not put it next to us, do not expect such service, since the prices are very high, we ate more than $100 for two.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, first I would like to clarify that no drink is included, it is customary, in Argentina, to offer water to diners along with the menu. The wine is always outside the diners table in our service, but we will take the comment to modify the situation and position the wine closer, on the support tables. We hope that beyond this situation, you have been able to enjoy the experience and we are very happy that you consider the food to be very delicious.
review_translated_text: Vinimos a celebrar un cumpleanos a un lugar exclusivo, la comida estuvo muy rica, pero hubo comentarios sobre el servicio, el camarero nos ofrecio agua al abordar, pensamos que era un elogio del establecimiento, pero luego nos enteramos que el agua cuesta $7, tambien nos dijeron que para un cumpleanos trajeron un panqueque de regalo, al final no lo trajeron, tambien pedimos una botella de vino, no la pusieron al lado de nosotros, no  spere tal servicio, ya que los precios son muy altos, comimos mas de $100 para dos personas.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias, primero me gustaria aclarar que ninguna bebida esta incluida, es uso y costumbre, en Argentina, ofrecer junto con el menu, agua a los comensales. El vino, siempre esta fuera de la mesa de los comensales en nuestro servicio, pero tomaremos el comentario para modificar la situacion y posicionar el vino mas cerca, en las mesas de apoyo. Esperamos que mas alla de esta situacion, hayan podido disfrutar de la experiencia y nos alegramos mucho que consideren que la comida es muy rica.

review_text: Excellent food, beautiful location. Favorite meal so far in argentina
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Will!

review_text: Excellent place, very good service and delicious food. We ordered the 3-course dish that consists of appetizer, main dish and dessert (cost 30,000 pesos) with a separate drink charge. The food really is for a restaurant of its category and it is worth mentioning that they have good portions. If you are looking for a worthwhile culinary experience, with incredible views and good service! Dont hesitate and visit them!! Fact: between two people (with a three-course lunch order) and a drink, it ranges between 88,000.00 Argentine pesos (depending a lot on the drink you choose and in our case we love the Saurus de la Patagonia)
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Pamela!!
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, muy buena atencion y la comida deliciosa. Pedimos el plato 3 tiempos que consta de entrada, plato de fondo y postre (costo 30000pesos) con cargo de bebidas por separado. La comida realmente es para un restaurant de su categoria y cabe mencionar que son de buenas porciones. Si buscas una experiencia culinaria que valga la pena, con unas vistas increibles y con buen trato de atencion ! No lo dudes y visitalos !! Dato: entre dos personas (con pedido del almuerzo tres tiempos) y bebida, oscila entre los 88000.00 pesos argentinos (dependiendo mucho de la bebida que elijas y en nuestro caso amamos el Saurus de la Patagonia)
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Pamela!!

review_text: We arrived at the place by chance, we thought the entrance was very nice, we had to make a reservation by phone to enter, when we entered we were very pleasantly surprised since the place is spectacular, the incredible attention from the moment they receive you and accompany you to the table We ordered a menu that consists of appetizer, main course and dessert (drinks not included) The starter was exquisite, I ordered prawns, then for the main course I ordered loin with wine and I think it is the best presented dish I have seen in years! The taste is incredibly good and not to mention the desserts, 1000% recommended! The photos dont even come close to how good the food is.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!!
review_translated_text: Llegamos al sitio por casualidad, nos parecio muy bonita la entrada , tuvimos que hacer reservacion por telefono para ingresar , al entrar nos llevamos una muy grata sorpresa ya que el sitio es espectacular, la atencion increible  desde que te reciben y te acompanan a la mesa Pedimos un menu que consiste en entrada , plato fuerte y postre ( no incluye bebidas ) La entrada fue exquisita yo pedi langostinos, luego el plato fuerte pedi lomo al vino y creo que es el plato mejor presentado que he visto en anos ! El sabor increiblemente bueno y ni hablar de los postres 1000% recomendado ! Las fotos ni se acercan a lo bueno de la comida
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias!!

review_text: It is an expensive and beautiful experience. The attention was excellent. The food was good. The place is wonderful, it has a very nice view and location. We wouldnt go back simply because its so expensive, we werent crazy about the food, we just wanted to get to know it. If you go, I recommend the grilled prawns starter. or
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rocio!
review_translated_text: Es una costosa linda experiencia. La atencion fue excelente. La comida estaba bien. El lugar es maravilloso, tiene una muy linda vista y ubicacion. No volveriamos simplemente porque es muy caro, la comida no nos volvio locos, solo queriamos conocerlo. Si vas, recomiendo la entrada de langostinos grillados. u
response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias Rocio!

review_text: A gem in Bariloche! We went for dinner and we liked it so much that we went back for lunch the next day. From the first-class Gastronomy made by the owner Dona Cristina, to the service and property, everything is of the highest quality. Super recommended. We will always come back!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Federico! We are waiting for you again delighted!
review_translated_text: Una joya en Bariloche! Hemos ido a cenar  y  nos gusto tanto que al otro dia volvimos a almorzar. Desde la Gastronomia de primer nivel realizada por la propietaria Dona Cristina , hasta el servicio y la propiedad, todo es de altisima calidad. Super recomendable. Vamos a volver siempre!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Federico! Te esperamos nuevamente encantados!

review_text: Highly recommend this place. We live a unique gastronomic experience. The place is very nice and the food is delicious. I hope to return soon to try other dishes. Greetings to Dona Cristina and her team. Thank you for a wonderful experience.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Cristian!
review_translated_text: Altamente recomendable este lugar. Vivimos una experiencia gastronomica unica. El lugar es muy lindo y la comida riquisima. Espero volver pronto para probar otros platos. Saludos a Dona Cristina y su equipo. Gracias por una experiencia maravillosa.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Cristian!

review_text: Having been all over the world I can honestly say this is an incredible world class restaurant, one of the best Ive ever been to. They started me off with breadsticks and eggplant pate and sent out two amuse-bouches, one of which had a delicate, slightly sweet sesame crisp on top. It reminded me of the sesame candies I loved as a kid (but what an elevated version!) I had several glasses of the Malma family reserve malbec, an outstanding wine to have available by the glass. The langoustine starter is the best langoustine dish Ive had...enough for a meal... and the combination of crisp, slightly sweet pickles with greens, blue cheese, etc. is inspired! Beautiful dish. Next I tried the gnocchi cacio e pepe, a fresh new take on an old favorite (the whole peppercorns take this decadent Italian dish over the top). I was going to leave but was encouraged to have some dessert (so few restaurants do this, I like to be offered everything, from apero to digestif), Im so glad I said yes, finished off with a beautiful poached pear with drizzles of chocolate and a few other special touches. The owner and chef is a beautiful human being, you can see that she puts her heart and soul into every dish, every decor item...I even loved the plates and glasses. This hidden gem is my favorite find in Bariloche. From beginning to end, everyone I ran into or interacted with onsite was warm and welcoming. Outstanding.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias!

review_text: Incredible! We went for dinner and although we had some expectations, we did not expect the place to be so nice. The park has a dream winter garden! The food was amazing. Everything was perfectly achieved, the quality of the ingredients, the balances in the flavors. We were amazed by the dishes we chose: the raw ham starter, the trout, the osso buco and for dessert the Belgian chocolate pancake. The attention of course was also impeccable! They were waiting for us at the entrance and even asked us about food restrictions. I dont eat cheese and they had prepared a special amuse bouche for me :) Fabulous experience!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!
review_translated_text: Increible! Fuimos a cenar y si bien teniamos algo de expectativa, no esperabamos que el lugar sea tan lindo. El parque tiene un jardin de invierno de ensueno! La comida fue alucinante. Todo estaba perfectamente logrado, la calidad de los ingredientes, los balances en los sabores. Quedamos maravillados con los platos que elegimos: le entrada de jamon crudo, la trucha, el osobuco y de postre el pancake de chocolate belga. La atencion por supuesto impecable tambien! Nos estaban esperando al ingreso y hasta nos consultaron restricciones alimentarias. Yo no como queso y me habian preparado un amuse bouche especial :) Fabulosa experiencia!
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias!

review_text: A real pleasure from telephone contact (Rocio); the entrance (where there was already staff waiting for us), the location of the table in front of the window overlooking the Lake; the attention and dedication of the staff. Thank you, you made us feel like kings
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!
review_translated_text: Un verdadero placer desde el contacto telefonico (Rocio); el ingreso (donde ya habia personal esperandonos), la ubicacion de la mesa frente al ventanal con vista al Lago; la atencion y dedicacion del personal. Gracias, nos hicieron sentir unos reyes
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias!

review_text: Parking: Across the street Food
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Excellent restaurant with average service for this category of restaurant however, way above average compared to everywhere else on Guam.  Food is exceptional!  Highly recommend!

Celebrated my 2nd year anniversary here and it couldnt have been better. My server was Mary Ann and provided world class service. She explained pairings of wines and food and made our experience flavorful and memorable. I would highly recommend asking for her service during for your future reservation. We were given a great view and even a dessert custom made for our occasion. The dress code is enforced so ensure that youre not wearing shorts and sandals. The dining experience is classical, silverware ordered from salads to the main course. The servers are well trained and very professional. The price is worth the experience and the food is delicious. Wheelchair accessibility: Elevator can be utilized to reach the restaurant

This is a valuable restaurant in Guam, where there are few places where you can enjoy food in a proper atmosphere. Customer service is solid even by Japanese standards. For water, there is a service where you can choose flavors such as mint or fruit that women would enjoy. Although the taste of the food is at the highest level in Guam, I cant help but compare it to Japan. They have a strict dress code, so its a great place to have a casual meal. Of course, there are many wines that are quite expensive, ranging in the hundreds of thousands of thousands of dollars, but when you consider the cost, they are quite reasonable, with commercially available wines in the $20 range priced at $47, and bottles here starting in the $20 range. So you can order a bottle without fear.
As for the food, only the pasta was okay. The rest of the soup and scallops needed improvement. The wagyu steak was too salty.
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Atmosphere, table setting, and staff service are 5 stars. Food is three stars. Drinking is 5 stars. The view can be fully enjoyed from the hotel room balcony.

A $180 course meal takes about 2 hours. In May, it may be a bit dazzling if you go at 6:00 p.m., but if you wait for 10 minutes, you can feel the day, sunset, and evening. The view is the best and my stomach is so full that Im dying, but the food is really the best haha. The wine is dry even if you drink it with the recommended star-shaped glass, and it goes well with food, so you may get sick. I recommend it to those on an important anniversary or honeymoon. As for the attire, we will let you in with a sense of tact, but dont go too casually!
Excellent service, very delicious food, an amazing view. Very sophisticated.

Open daily in the morning and afternoon. The dinner menu is all the same, so I get bored. The draft beer was delicious, but There were times when it was not available depending on the day of the week. Chefs recommended dishes for dinner It was quite delicious. The burgers are delicious. I only ordered French fries, It was a huge amount. Since there are few vegetables, the amount of carbohydrates is high. Im curious.
I had it for breakfast and it was okay!!! The service was great and the person was very friendly.
back house IRIE  x   ,M yc 5 G, b.. , iron Yz.
Food wasnt very good which was the least frustrating part I bought a Sprite and it was 4 dollars no free refills
Excellent service, nice place. I recommend.
review_translated_text: Excelente atendimento, local agradavel. Recomendo.

review_text: Never criticize is that all stores sell the same products, there is a lack of local products, souvenirs
review_translated_text: Nunca critica e que todos comercios vendem os mesmos produtos, falta produtos locais, lembrancas

review_text: Excellent place to stroll and shop.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar para passear e fazer compras.

review_text: The place is a little chaotic, but very good for buying things.
review_translated_text: Un poco caotico el lugar, pero muy bueno para comprar cosas.

review_text: Charming Fair!!! Its worth knowing and trying the delicious olives and cheeses. We bought from the simplest stall, but the attendant was very attentive and friendly. And everything was delicious... we left eating the flavored olives from the jar. It was a delicious experience!!! We saw a lot of children working on the street and they are very insistent... selling and asking for things... a lot of them, its heartbreaking. We had dinner at La Churrasqueira sin Fronteiras, delicious picanha, good price and well served. We had coffee at the bakery on Rua da Feirinha, everything was delicious, the sweet bread with cream was incredible. We bought more things at the end of the fair (outside the fair) at the little market inside a gallery, the guy who served us was very attentive.
review_translated_text: Encantadora Feirinha!!! Vale a pena conhecer e experimentar as deliciosas azeitonas e os queijos. Compramos na barraquinha mais simples, mas a atendente muito atenciosa e simpatica. E tudo delicioso.. saimos comendo no potinho as azeitonas saborizadas. Foi uma experiencia gostosa!!! Vimos muitas criancas trabalhando na rua e sao muito insistentes... vendendo e pedindo coisas... muitas msm, e de apertar o coracao. Jantamos no La Churrasqueira sin fronteiras, deliciosa picanha, bom preco e bem servido. Tomamos cafe na padaria da rua da feirinha, tudo delicioso, o pao doce com creme e incrivel. Compramos mais coisas no final da feira (fora da feira) no mercadinho dentro de uma galeria, o moco que nos atendeu foi muito atencioso.

review_text: Satisfactory
review_translated_text: Satisfatorio

review_text: Theres nothing much, few options
review_translated_text: Nao tem nada de mais, poucas opcoes

review_text: It was much better. Today prices and the environment are in decline. Not to mention the number of children asking for money and food, an immense sadness.
review_translated_text: Ja foi muito melhor. Hoje os precos e ambiente estao em decadencia. Sem falar no tanto de criancas pedindo dinheiro e comida, uma tristeza imensa.

review_text: I think the fair is sensational, for those going for a walk in Foz it is worth including a trip to Porto Iguazu, especially passing by the triple border landmark (viewed from the Argentine side) and then taking a break at the fair to buy artisanal products and taste the excellent cold cuts they serve. A cold quilmes is also a great request!
review_translated_text: Eu acho a feirinha sensacional, para quem vai passear em Foz vale muito a pena incluir um passeio em Porto Iguazu, principalmente passando no marco da triplice fronteira (vista do lado argentino) e na sequencia uma pausa na feirinha para comprar os produtos artesanais e degustar as excelentes tabuas de frios que eles servem. Uma quilmes geladinha tbm e uma grande pedida!

review_text: Gastronomic fair....

review_text: The place is nice, the waiter took great care of us, but we didnt think the quality-price ratio was good, very expensive for what they serve in the fondue.
review_translated_text: El lugar es lindo, el mozo nos atendio de 10, pero la relacion precio calidad no nos parecio buena, muy caro para lo que sirven en la fondue.

review_text: Bad experience! First we wanted to eat at the restaurant and they told us that they only served dinner and nothing else. To the side there are tables and we thought it was another restaurant since the menu offered different things like pizzas and hamburgers. When we sat down, no one cleaned our table and they never attended to us, several people began to leave as well as us after waiting more than 10 minutes without any waiter approaching. In addition, the dinners are very expensive, and they serve the same dishes around them, with better service.
review_translated_text: Pesima experiencia! Primero quisimos comer en el restaurante y nos dijeron que solo servian cenas y nada mas. Al costado hay mesas y pensamos que era otro restaurante ya que la carta ofrecia cosas diferentes como pizzas y hamburguesas. Al sentarnos, nadie nos limpio la mesa y nunca nos atendieron, varias personas comenzaron a irse como tambien nosotros despues de esperar mas de 10 minutos sin que ningun mesero se acercase. Ademas las cenas carisimas, siendo que al rededor sirven los mismo platos, con mejor atencion

review_text: Excellent service and food!
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion y comida!

review_text: I loved it, the best cheese fondue. Even my daughters loved it

review_text: Mmmmmmm...Im sure it must be famous for cheese...but, I didnt like it.
review_translated_text: Mmmmmmm...seguro debe ser famoso por el queso...pero, no me gusto.

review_text: Misleading advertising on the door of the premises.

review_text: An exquisite place. Very cozy rooms and very friendly service, that day we went and stood on the terrace outside, I drank two orange juices, wonderful... Magical place

The service was good, but the dishes were quite bland. We ordered the gnocchi with mushrooms. The pasta was unevenly unsalted and the sauce did not have a good flavor. We also ordered the trout which came with a side of potatoes. The potatoes were very tasty but the trout was dry and underseasoned. The truth is that for the price it disappoints. I would not go back
review_translated_text: La atencion fue buena, pero los platos fueron bastante insulsos. Pedimos los noquis con hongos. La pasta estaba sin sal de forma irregular y la salsa no tenia buen sabor. Ademas pedimos la trucha la cual venia con acompanamiento de papas. Las papas estaban muy ricas pero la trucha seca y poco condimentada. La verdad que por el precio decepciona. No volveria

review_text: We liked this restaurant so much that we went two nights in a row. Both attended by Roberto, who was super friendly, attentive and good-natured. The first time we had an Emmental cheese fondue that was incredible! And the second a Chinoise fondue with spectacular sauces. There were 4 of us and with a fondue for two and an extra portion we ate very well both times! The desserts are also very good. The price is according to the quality. In other places we paid more and didnt eat as well as here. Super recommended! We will definitely return on our next trip to Bariloche.
review_translated_text: Nos gusto tanto este restaurante que fuimos dos noches seguidas. Ambas atendidos por Roberto, que fue super amable, atento y buena onda. La primera vez comimos una fondue de queso emmental que estaba increible! Y la segunda una fondue Chinoise con unas salsas espectaculares. Eramos 4 y con una fondue para dos y una racion extra comimos muy bien en ambas oportunidades! Los postres tambien muy buenos. El precio es acorde a la calidad. En otros lugares pagamos mas y no comimos tan bien como aca. Super recomendable! Sin dudas volveremos en nuestro proximo viaje a Bariloche.

review_text: Dont go to this dirty place, as you have the bathroom you have the kitchen, the bathroom smells disgusting. The waitress that is there during the week during the evening currently leaves a lot to be desired, the service was contemptuous because she is Chilean and if you are with a child it is worse, we ordered a pizza and the cheese didnt arrive completely melted, it was also bitter and everything was cold, I imagine why We were an hour away from closing time, slow and terrible service. It sells like a must-see but it is forgettable. I got excited and ended up with a terrible experience. Bad and expensive food, deplorable service, they have a lot to improve and a striking atmosphere.
review_translated_text: No vayan a este sucio lugar, como tienes el bano tienes la cocina, huele repugnante el bano. La garzona que esta en la semana durante la tarde nocturna actualmente deja bastante que desear, atendia despectivamente por ser chileno y si andas con nino peor, pedimos una pizza y no llego el queso derretido del todo, ademas amargo y todo frio, me imagino porque estabamos a una hora al horario de cierre, lenta y pesima atencion. Se vende como un imperdible pero es un olvidable. Me ilusione y termine con una pesima experiencia. Comida mala y cara, servicio deplorable, tienen mucho que mejorar y un ambiente llamativo.

review_text: It is always a ten, quality, price, attention, place. It always becomes La Marmite!!!
review_translated_text: Siempre es un diez, calidad, precio, atencion, lugar. Siempre se vuelve La Marmite!!!

review_text: Attention well, they made a mistake in the order and when they tried to fix it it was worse. I did not like. (A muzza pizza was ordered and they brought Neapolitan, when we complained, they took it away and took out the tomato, bringing the same pizza marked with the tomatoes that they took out, terrible)
review_translated_text: Atencion bien, se equivocaron en la orden y al tratar de arreglar quedo peor. No me gusto. (Se pidio una pizza de muzza y trajeron napolitana, al reclamar, se la llevaron le sacaron el tomate trayendo la misma pizza marcada con los tomates q le sacaron, malisimo)

review_text: Very good, it was delicious!!!

review_text: Exquisite food and excellent service!!! Rodrigo, a super attentive and pleasant young man.
review_translated_text: Comida exquisita y excelente atencion!!! Rodrigo, un mozo super atento y agradable.

review_text: Very bad restaurant. First they brought the wrong food. Instead of 4 sandwiches we got 2 and 2 without bread or sides. Then, 30min later we got our final 2  sandwiches  which were literally a burger with nothing more than fluid cheddar cheese and a tomato. Maybe this works for others, but we stopped after 2.5 bites. The other 2 sandwiches were of similar bad quality. We decided to leave, but they added more to the bill than we ordered. We complained about the quality of the food, but they laughed, shrugged and moved on with their work. Eventually the manager told us they deducted 10% of the total bill, which if you didn t eat still is a lot of money. Our advice: steer away from this place, especially if you value a clean toilet
Very well attended

review_text: The service is terrible, the waiter doesnt look at your face, it practically bothers him to serve you, they brought us the bill without the possibility of asking for anything else, we were literally thrown out. Average food, and great disinterest in the customer.
review_translated_text: La atencion es malisima, el mozo no te mira a la cara,  practicamente le molesta atenderte, nos trajeron la cuenta sin posibilidad de pedir otra cosa, fuimos echados literalmente. La comida regular, y un gran desinteres por el cliente.

review_text: BEAUTIFUL, DELICIOUS AND CHEAP EXCELLENT CARE AND SPEED 10/10 We went to eat 2 days in a row

review_text: Great pasta. Huge portions. Well priced. Great overall

The service was good only because of the star, we ordered takeout but they didnt give us everything we bought, already at the hotel we realized that there were dishes missing, we were so tired that we didnt even return to complain, there were pieces of plastic inside the food, no I recommend it, look for another place.
review_translated_text: La atencion buena solo por eso la estrella, pedimos para llevar pero no nos dieron todo lo que compramos, ya en el hotel nos dimos cuenta que faltaban platos, estabamos tan cansados que ni regresamos a reclamar, dentro de la comida pedazos de plastico, no lo recomiendo, busquen otro lugar.

review_text: Everything is excellent!!! I highlight the good attention. The chicken and vegetable ravioli were exquisite, the fileto sauce like the one my grandmother made. The delicious empanadas...and above all, the very affordable price!
review_translated_text: Excelente todo!!! Destaco la buena atencion. Los ravioles de pollo y verdura exquisitos, la salsa fileto como la que hacia mi abuela. Las empanadas riquisimas...y sobre todo,el precio muy accesible!.

review_text: Magnificent surprise! From the outside it looks like an ordinary pasta factory, but when you sit at the little tables (we sat inside), from the warm service to the speed with which they came and the abundance and taste of the dishes, it was all a wonderful experience. Very good, very pretty and cheap. Great option!
review_translated_text: Magnifica sorpresa! Desde afuera parece una fabrica de pastas comun y corriente, pero cuando te sentas en las mesitas (nosotros nos sentamos adentro), desde la calida atencion hasta la rapidez con q vinieron y la abundancia y gusto de los platos, fue todo una maravillosa experiencia. Muy bueno, muy bonito y barato. Gran opcion!

review_text: One of the best tasting fresh made pastas that compare to those fancy restaurants.
It closes very early, at 10 at night in the middle of January, very bad

review_text: Super recommended. The service is great, everyone is very friendly, and the dishes are delicious and abundant. For 3 people we spent $22,800, including drinks.
review_translated_text: Super recomendable. La atencion es genial, todos muy amables, y los platos son ricos y abundantes. Para 3 personas gastamos $22800, incluyendo bebidas.

review_text: I ate incredible pasta. Telephone roll noodles with a spectacular arrabiata sauce that the guy who served recommended us. One of the most delicious things Ive eaten in a while. Homemade, tasty and fresh. The dish cost $6300 and it was worth it. Loving attention and unique flavors. I want to try other pastas and (all) the sauces again! Dont hesitate to go. I recommend going early because it gets busy.
review_translated_text: Me comi una pasta increible. Fideos rulitos de telefono con una salsa arrabiata espectacular que nos recomendo el chico que atendia. De lo mas rico que comi en el ultimo tiempo. Casero, sabroso y fresco. El plato salio $6300 y lo valio. La atencion amorosa y unos sabores unicos. Quiero volver a probar otras pastas y (todas) las salsas! No duden en ir. Recomiendo ir temprano porque se llena.

review_text: Excellent pastas made in-house, very good sauces and at a very good price

review_text: Spectacular

review_text: Wonderful pasta, 1 dish is enough for two people. Its really worth it, one of the best pastas Ive ever tried. The cheese sauce is very good. You can see that it is of good quality and at an affordable price, because we only saw people from the region
review_translated_text: Massas maravilhosas, 1 prato da para duas pessoas tranquilamente. Vale muito a pena, uma das melhores massas que ja experimentei. O molho de queijo e muito bom. Da para perceber que e de qualidade e preco acessivel, porque so vimos pessoal da regiao

review_text: This place is super underrated. Quality and fresh food at a good price. Highly recommend it!
Excellent service. Cheaper price to take away. From 3 thousand. To eat there 5700 approx. Abundant . 1 dish can share

Excellent prices and quality

review_text: A traditional restaurant in the San Telmo neighborhood Extensive menu with reasonable prices
Good quality and prices, the waiter Mariano is a genius! During the week we will surely be having lunch again

review_text: Excellent service, very good prices, very varied menu.
