review_text: I go very often....the food is very good, friendly atmosphere, nice waiters and affordable prices!! I recommend it!!
review_translated_text: Voy muy seguido....se come muy bien,.ambiente amigable,.mozos agradables y precios accesibles!! Lo recomiendo!!

review_text: Everything is very good.
review_translated_text: Muy bueno todo.

review_text: They are excellent... but sometimes they take a long time with the dishes
review_translated_text: Son excelentes... peroa veces demorannnn con los platos

review_text: Abundant dishes, delicious in flavor, super punctual when shipping. Half days save us!
review_translated_text: Platos abundantes, riquisimos de sabor, super puntuales a la hora del envio. Nos salvan los medios dias!

review_text: Always a place to eat good dishes at affordable prices. Excellent atention
review_translated_text: Siempre un lugar para comer buenos platos a precios accesibles. Muy buena atencion

review_text: Very nice. Rich and at affordable prices. The waiter looked after us very well (sorry, I dont remember his name, hes a young man). Thank you all
review_translated_text: Muy agradable. Rico y a precios accesibles. Nos atendio muy bien el mozo( perdon no me acuerdo el nombre, es un joven). Gracias a todos

review_text: Nice
review_translated_text: Lindo

review_text: Very good food and service
review_translated_text: Muy bueno la comida y la atencion

review_text: I dont recommend it, I took a group of tourists there, they didnt even give me any water
review_translated_text: Nao recomendo,levei um grupo de turistas la, nao me deram nem uma agua

review_text: A little pricey, but good and attentive service.
review_translated_text: Um pouco caro, mas bom e com atendimento atencioso.

review_text: Best Italian restaurant in Iguazu region
review_translated_text: Food

review_text: Every time I return to Puerto Iguazu I never stop visiting it! Delicious food! Its worth every penny.
review_translated_text: Cada vez q vuelvo a Puerto Iguazu no dejo de visitarlo! La comida riquisima! Vale cada centavo la pena.

review_text: Just dont order the red pasta. The other dishes I highly recommend. Mine was quite acidic due to the red sauce, so if you dont care, good luck, but Ill tell you its not worth it! The other dishes are sensational. Regarding the exchange rate in the local currency, their conversion rate is not at all attractive. I recommend paying with your credit card and if you really want to save money and make the most of your trips to neighboring countries, get a Wise or Nomad card and enjoy the benefits of this fantastic international debit card!
review_translated_text: So nao pede o macarrao vermelho. Os demais pratos super recomendo. O meu veio bastante acido por conta do molho vermelho, entao se voces nao ligarem, boa sorte, mas ja digo que nao vale a pena! Os demais pratos sensacionais. Sobre o cambio leva na moeda local o cambio de conversao deles nao e nada atrativo. Indico pagar no seu cartao de credito e se voce quer realmente economizar e aproveitar ainda mais suas idas aos paises vizinhos, faca um cartao Wise ou Nomad e aproveite os beneficios desse cartao de debito internacional fantastico!

review_text: Nice atmosphere, good service, only that they served me the dish very quickly and I couldnt enjoy the starter which was excellent, I ordered gnocchi, very tasty, a detail, they were overcooked and ate like pasta, but the flavor was very good. I liked it, the only thing was that, they wanted to ship very quickly and I couldnt enjoy the aubergines as a starter with the wine. The rest excellent.
review_translated_text: Lindo ambiente, buen servicio, solo que me sirvieron el plato muy rapido y no pude disfrutar la entrada que era excelente, pedi noquis, muy ricos, un detalle, estaban pasados de coccion y se  comian como una pasta, pero el sabor muy bueno. Me gusto, lo unico fue eso, querian despachar muy rapido y no pude disfrutar las berenjenas de entrada con el vino. El resto excelente.

review_text: Without much to say, just if you want to eat and enjoy some good pasta with good presentation and taste, it is the best place in Puerto Iguazu! Dont hesitate if you are lovers of good pasta!!
review_translated_text: Sin mucho que decir solo si quieres comer y disfrutar de unas buenas pastas con una buena presentacion y gusto es el mejor lugar de puerto iguazu ! No lo duden sin son amantes de las buenas pasta !!

review_text: Unfortunately, I found a fly on my plate (Spaghetti Parmesan). They prepare it for you live, however, I found it after I had already eaten, it was confused with the rest. I brought it to light more to inform!! They apologized and did not charge for that dish ($18,000). I paid the rest, but I wouldnt go back. Since I consider this a serious error. Extremely expensive for this experience.
review_translated_text: Lamentablemente, encontre una mosca en mi plato (Spaghetti parmesano). Te lo preparan en vivo, sin embargo, la encontre luego que ya habia comido, se confundia con lo demas.La saque mas a la luz para informar!! Se disculparon y no cobraron ese plato (18.000$). Pague lo restante, pero no volveria. Ya que considero un error grave esto. Extremamente caro para esta experiencia.

review_text: The place has excellent service and the food is very delicious. The risotto di mare was a little oversalted, but still very tasty. The rest of the food was very good. We spent approximately $60,000. 2 adults and 1 child of 5 years.
review_translated_text: El lugar tiene una atencion excelente y se come muy rico. El risotto di mare estaba un poco pasado de sal, igualmente muy sabroso. El resto de la comida muy bien todo. Gastamos $60000 aprox. 2 adultos y 1 nino de 5 anos.

review_text: A pleasant surprise and it has already become one of our favorites. Attentive and attentive service. We ordered the Raclette starter which was divine. Then the Spaguetti with Parmesan which is one of the restaurants flagships and the Bolognese Lasagna which is also a spectacle. Accompanied by Luigi Bosca, which was even more perfect.
Good...
review_translated_text: Bom...

review_text: Superb food. Great pasta. Parmarsan cheese flambe in the wheel of the cheese. Was one of the best Pasta dishes I have had. Service was excellent and ambience was great.
We had a delicious meal on our last evening in Argentina, with a fantastic spaghetti with Parmesan cheese that is prepared on site, see photos. Good wines, in short, a top experience!
review_translated_text: Heerlijk gegeten op onze laatste avond in Argentinie , met een fantastische spaghetti met Parmezaanse kaas die ter plaatse wordt bereid, zie foto s. Goede wijnen , kortom een topervaring!

review_text: You can find the heart of Italy here in Porto Iguazu, only in Italy can you eat Sorrento gnocchi so good, fantastic pappardelle!!! A tip for the chef, a pinch more salt isnt bad. Compliments!!!!

Disappointment, I arrived based on the recommendations, a strange place, you dont know who serves you, the food is delicious but nothing more, five Sorrentinos swimming in a pile of cream, for $16,000, its not worth it.
review_translated_text: Decepcion, llegue por las recomendaciones, lugar raro, no sabes quien te atiende, la comida rica pero nada mas, cinco sorrentinos nadando en un monton de crema, por $ 16.000, no vale la pena.

review_text: Excellent place for a hearty dinner. The attention is very good and the dinner is very delicious. The dishes are homemade and prepared on the spot. To choose a dish, I recommend consulting the chefs recommendations, which do not fail.
review_translated_text: Exelente lugar para cenar abundante. La atencion es muy buena y se cena muy rico. Los platos son caseros y se preparan en el momento. Para elegir plato recomiendo consultar por las recomendaciones del chef que no fallan.

review_text: We came to try to have dinner on a Thursday night, there were 5 of us. Since we entered the place, the two girls who attended us did not have the will or the desire to receive us there. Whats more, they always suggested that we come the next day since the kitchen, theoretically, closed at 11:00 p.m., although there was still an hour left. In addition, there was a free table of 5 people that was theoretically reserved for 10:15 p.m. Being 10:35 p.m., it was still free and no one offered it to us so that we could come in and sit down. In short, they didnt want us to have dinner there even though they lost money for the table that was never used.
review_translated_text: Vinimos a intentar cenar un jueves por la noche, eramos 5 personas. Desde que entramos al lugar, las dos mozas que nos atendieron no tuvieron la voluntad ni las ganas de recibirnos alli. Es mas, todo el tiempo nos sugirieron venir al otro dia ya que la cocina, teoricamente, cerraba a las 23:00 aunque aun faltaba una hora. Ademas, habia una mesa de 5 personas libre que en teoria estaba reservada para las 22:15. Siendo las 22:35 seguia libre y nadie nos la ofrecio para que pasemos y nos sentemos. En sintesis, no tenian ganas de que cenemos ahi pese a que perdieron plata por la mesa que nunca se utilizo.

review_text: The food was very delicious (I recommend the carbonara sauce). The atmosphere is excellent, no loud music. Soft (and tasteful) music to generate a relaxed atmosphere. Very good service, both waitresses very friendly.
review_translated_text: La comida estaba muy rica (Recomiendo la salsa carbonara). El ambiente excelente, nada de musica estruendosa. Musica suave(y de buen gusto)para generar un clima relajado. La atencion muy buena, ambas camareras muy amables.

review_text: Well deserved 5 stars, go without hesitation. Di Como took me to restaurants before that were in every detail at the table, the service was super friendly and attentive, the pasta was amazing and the portion very reasonable. The delicious and complimentary starters, we had a WELL iced beer as appropriate and they brought us peanuts, the atmosphere was super good, warm, familiar, they didnt have loud music so you could chat without raising your voice. I left completely surprised by the food, the attention, the place, I dont understand how living in Bariloche I was missing out on this little gem. Worth every penny, I will be back
review_translated_text: Merecidisimas 5 estrellas, vayan sin dudarlo. Di Como me llevo a los restaurantes de antes que estaban en cada detalle en la mesa, el servicio fue super cordial y atento, la pasta fue increible y la porcion muy razonable. Las entraditas riquisimas y de cortesia, nos tomamos una cervecita BIEN helada como corresponde y nos trajeron mani, el ambiente super bien, calido, familiar, no tenian musica fuerte con lo cual se podia charlar sin elevar el tono de voz. Me fui complementamente sorprendida por la comida, la atencion, el lugar, no entiendo como viviendo en Bariloche me estaba perdiendo esta joyita. Vale cada centavo, volvere

review_text: Excellent Restaurant. The exquisite pasta, as they prepare it at the moment, takes a long time, but it is worth the wait. The trout envelopes and the trout lasagna are excellent! Very tasty! Abundant dishes. And for the wait they offer you a very delicious pizza too. Excellent price-quality ratio.
review_translated_text: Excelente Restaurant. La pasta exquisita, como la preparan en el momento demoran bastante, pero vale la pena la espera.  Los sobre tinos de trucha y la lasagna de trucha excelente! Muy sabrosos! Platos abundantes. Y para la espera te ofrecen un pizza muy rica tambien. Excelente relacion precio calidad.

review_text: The pasta was very delicious, the pesto was incredible!! Very good service, I would return more times.
review_translated_text: Muy ricas las pastas , el pesto estaba increible!! La atencion muy buena, volveria mas veces .

review_text: Say How: its spectacular. The service is exceptional since the attention is very good and at the beginning they give you a pizza, in this case I went with 3 people so the pizza was 6 slices, it was very delicious. When the food arrived, it was not the opposite, it was also delicious, I ordered some Fettuccini with Filetto sauce that were delicious and they also gave you two glasses with grated cheese made on the spot. Regarding the prices, I am also very satisfied since they are very reasonable and the food dishes are very abundant. The atmosphere is perfect, the music is there but the volume is well measured both for listening and for speaking. Im sure Ill come back.
review_translated_text: Di Como: es espectacular. El servicio es excepcional ya que la atencion es muy buena y de entrada te entregan una pizza, yo en este caso fui con 3 personas por lo que la pizza era de 6 porciones, estaba muy rica. Cuando llego la comida no fue lo contrario tambien estaba buenisima, me pedi unos Fetuccini con salsa Filetto que estaban buenisimos y aparte te entregan dos vasos con queso rallado hecho en el momento. Con respecto a los precios tambien muy satisfecho ya que son muy razonable y los platos de comida son muy abundantes. El ambiente es perfecto, la musica esta pero el volumen esta bien medido tanto para escucharla como para hablar. Estoy seguro que volvere.

review_text: All the food is very delicious, how it is made at the moment it can take a while but they give you an entree as attention. Since there arent many tables, you have to make a reservation or arrive early.
Everything spectacular
review_translated_text: Todo espectacular

review_text: Everything very good
review_translated_text: Muy bueno todo

review_text: A very good menu, try the pizzas, highly recommended. Pleasant and agile attention.
review_translated_text: Una muy buena carta, proba las pizzas, muy recomendable. Atencion grata y agil.

review_text: As a starter they gave us a complimentary pizza and we ordered sorrentinos with Di Rocco sauce and pappardelles with Della Campagna sauce; The quality of the pastas and sauces is truly remarkable. Miriam and Antonella welcomed us very warmly and were very attentive. Without a doubt it is to recommend and return Keep in mind that the place is not very big, so it is advisable to go early since the kitchen closes before 11 p.m. for dinner.
review_translated_text: Como entrada nos dieron una pizzeta de cortesia y pedimos sorrentinos con salsa Di Rocco y pappardelles con salsa Della Campagna; realmente destacable la calidad de las pastas y salsas. Miriam y Antonella nos recibieron muy calidamente y fueron muy atentas. Sin duda es para recomendar y volver Tener en cuenta que el lugar no es muy grande, por lo que es recomendable ir temprano ya que la cocina cierra antes de las 23 para la cena.

review_text: Great food and service, very friendly people as well.

Excellent ladies managing the counters - Antonella and Carina. Smile, speed and efficiency!!! And thank you chef for the amazing quality of vegetarian - spinach ravioli, the calzon pizza and the appetizers-dips. Made my birthday even more special in 2024. Felt a home away from home in India with the amazing food. Vegetarian options: Excellent options
Excellent attention. Delicious pasta, sauces and pizza. Highly recommended!!!
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion.  Deliciosas las pastas salsas y pizza. Muy recomendable!!!

review_text: Exquisite pastas and very good service.... totally recommended!!!
review_translated_text: Exquisitas pastas y una muy buena atencion.... totalmente recomendable!!!

review_text: A small place but everything is super homemade, they already anticipate that the dishes take time (in my case ravioli with bolognese: 1 hour) but because they cook everything at that moment. Meanwhile its cool, with good wifi and they bring you panera and pizza while you wait. recommendable
review_translated_text: Un lugar pequeno pero super casero todo, ya anticipan que los platos tardan (en mi caso ravioles con bolognesa : 1 hora) pero porque cocinan todo en ese momento. Mientras tanto es fresco, con bien wifi y te traen panera y pizza mientras esperas. Recomendable

review_text: Excellent atention!!! Good Milanese recommended
review_translated_text: Muy buena atencion!!! Buenas milanesas recomendado

review_text: Excellent place to relax for a while with a good view in a corner of the gallery/shopping, with the good vibes and attention of Sebastian. The service is very good, you dont expect much, the products are recommended, there is a variety of dishes, it opens regularly, the prices are good!
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar para relajarte un rato con una buena vista en un rincon de la galeria/shoping, con la buena onda y atencion de Sebastian. El servicio es muy bueno, no esperas mucho, los productos recomendables, hay variedad de platos, abre de corrido, los precios bien!

review_text: Its nice and quiet if you want to get out of the crowd a bit and still be in the center of Bariloche. The empanadas are GREAT
It is hidden inside the sun gallery. Good price/quality ratio. The Milanese are quite large. Very cool Sebastian the waiter.

If Sebastian has 1000 fans, I am one of those. If Sebastian has 1 fan, Im that one. If Sebastian doesnt have any fans, its because Im no longer in this world. Excellent service, the order arrives quickly and very tasty. I would change the soda cans for bottles.
review_translated_text: Si Sebastian tiene 1000 fanes, yo soy uno de esos. Si Sebastian tiene 1 fan, yo soy ese. Si Sebastian no tiene ningun fan, es porque yo ya no estoy en este mundo. Excelente servicio, el pedido llega rapido y muy rico. Cambiaria las latas de gaseosa por botellitas.

review_text: Sebastians attention is a 10, the prices are very good and the quality of the food is good according to the price one is paying.
review_translated_text: La atencion de Sebastian un 10, los precios muy buenos y la calidad de la comida buena acorde al precio que uno esta pagando.

review_text: Excellent attention from Sebastian!! A genius
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion de Sebastian!! Un genio

review_text: Excellent attention from Sebastian!
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion de Sebastian!

review_text: We ordered the dish of the day, noodles with filet. Excellent food, very good attention, fast service and very good price. Recommended.
review_translated_text: Pedimos el plato del dia, tallarines con fileto. Excelente la comida, muy buena atencion, rapido el servicio y muy buen precio. Recomendado.

review_text: Very nice place...we were passing through...excellent attention from Sebastian the waiter...very good vibes...very attentive...we didnt expect anything...we ate cheaply with a promo...I recommend it 100%
review_translated_text: Muy lindo lugar ..fuimos de paso... excelente la atencion de Sebastian el mozo...muy buena onda ..muy atento...no esperamos nada..comimos barato una promo...lo recomiendo 100%

review_text: Excellent prices and above all excellent service if you are looking for something not so expensive and in the center of Bariloche I recommend it to you
review_translated_text: Excelente precios y sobretodo excelente atencion si buscas algo no tan caro y centro de Bariloche te lo recomiendo

review_text: The attention is excellent. The prices are super good. Although the south was always a little expensive, it is good to have the option of a quieter dinner or lunch. Very satisfied
review_translated_text: La atencion es excelente . Los precios super bien . Si bien el sur siempre fue un poco caro esta bueno tener la opcion de una cena o almuerzo mas tranqui . Muy conforme

review_text: Good place, delicious food, affordable prices for what Bariloche is and excellent service.
review_translated_text: Buen lugar, rica comida, precios accesibles para lo que es Bariloche y excelente atencion.

review_text: Excellent place, very delicious and accessible food!!! Sebastian the waiter is a genius.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, comida muy rica y accesible!!! Sebastian el mozo un genio.

review_text: Very delicious pastas and empanadas. The best thing about the place is the attention of the waiter, without a doubt it would not be the same without that good vibes and predisposition. I do not recommend the pizza, it is pre-pizza, poorly cooked and they charge you for it as if it were of good quality. Alfajor with red fruits, very delicious!! Very nice atmosphere, beautiful gallery in general. I recommend!
Excellent service, the food is very delicious and with affordable prices, the waiter Sebastina is a genius
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion  , la comida es muy rica y con precios accesibles,  el camarero Sebastina un genio

review_text: Excellent service from Seba, very attentive in every way
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion de seba muy atento en todos los sentidos

review_text: The service is a 10, the food is excellent and Sebastians service is the best
review_translated_text: La atencion es un 10, la comida Excelente y la atencion de Sebastian es la mejor

review_text: A wonderful, spectacular service, the waiter, a genius, all the cool and very attentive, the exquisite food and good prices Wheelchair accessibility: It is in the basement but has a ramp all the way
review_translated_text: Un maravilloso la atencion espectacular el mozo un genio toda la onda y muy atento la comida exquisita y buenos precios Wheelchair accessibility: Es en el subsuelo pero tiene todo el camino con rampa

review_text: We ordered one set each from Set A and B and shared them. I made a reservation over the phone and told them the date, time and number of people.
review_translated_text: A.B                .                                .

review_text: Great food! Needs be alittle cooler

I made a lunch reservation that day and went! There are a lot of teppan seats, so if its a weekday, you may be able to get a seat in front of the teppan even as a walk-in! Since the portion was large, I ordered a menu for 2 people. Its a taste that cant be missed, really... The atmosphere was nice and it was surprisingly a cost-effective meal.
I went in January. It was dinner time, but luckily I enjoyed it without a reservation. I was full. ^^
I had delicious Teppanyaki. I use it every time I go to Guam.

Floor was weirdly slippery, if someone slips and falls it would be really bad. The front door hostess seemed like she was in another world when we walked in. Staring off in the distance and was surprised when she suddenly saw us appear out of thin air. Service was terrible throughout our dining. The Japanese dining experience is not just about the food but also about the service. The guy who was our waiter was slamming the plates down on our table and came by only in the end to refill drinks after we were already done. I asked for a dessert menu and they were out of dessert, just wierd. Staff really could use better training l, looking around there were no smiles and it was more of a feeling of lets get everyone out so we can clear tables.I was a bit embarrassed for my Japanese friend who I took there to try Guam Japanese food. The food tasted good though so this was the only saving grace.

The staff are friendly and the atmosphere of the store is great. The taste is so subpar. Im trying to say it in a positive way, but is this the local taste? Performance fire show value? Even though I think that It tastes just like nothing.. Even if just one sauce was the right sauce It wouldnt have been this bad, but I grilled vegetables or shrimp. Regardless of whether the meat is grilled, all ingredients taste the same and have no taste whatsoever. As soon as the person cooking in front of me leaves, I cant force myself to eat it. I just had no choice but to come out. If youre going to go, dont expect good food.
Clean and worth a visit once Great expectations...

JOINUS Restaurant is one of Guams most popular local Japanese dining experiences.    With Tappanyaki meals prepared right in front of you.    I enjoyed the set lunch from the alarm carte menu.  It was a bowl of rice with a pork cutlet drenched in a steamed scrambled type egg.  It also came with a choice of sashimi or tempura.   I took the tempura option.   A bowl of miso soup and pickles also was on my tray.    Very filling and flavor was good.  The pork itself was just a little overdone so that it wasnt too tender, but still tasted good.   Service was really fast and customer service is always top notch!   Will be going back again for the Chanpon dish, its a personal favorite!
Waitstaff was awesome. Very patient with our small group.
Excellent place, very delicious dishes. The service is very good and the waiters are always attentive.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, platos muy ricos. La atencion es muy buena y los mozos siempre estan atentos.

review_text: Very hearty family style food. Ask to share. Very close to the center and seems like one of the best options in this region.
review_translated_text: Comida muito farta estilo family style. Pecam para dividir. Muito proximo do centro e me parece uma das melhores opcoes nessa regiao.

review_text: Excellent place, one of the best pasta restaurants in Bariloche without a doubt.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, uno de los mejores restaurantes de pastas de Bariloche sin duda.

review_text: good food Italian restaurant, excellent wine list, good value for money
review_translated_text: comida boa restaurante tipo italiano, excelente carta da vinhos,bom custo beneficio

review_text: Good place to eat pasta, but I think there are better ones.
review_translated_text: Buen lugar para comer pastas, pero considero que hay mejores.

review_text: Excellent service and the food was a delicacy...the portions were abundant and with quality products...super satisfied with everything! Highly recommended, very good price and quality ratio.
review_translated_text: Excelente atencion y la comida un manjar...las porciones eran abundantes y con productos de calidad...super satisfecha con todo! Muy recomendable, muy buena relacion precio y calidad.

review_text: The food was very delicious, good quality, price and quality.
review_translated_text: La comida muy rico buena calidad precio y calidad

review_text: It is our favorite place to eat in Bariloche, we never had any type of problem with the food and excellent service, I think we will return in August and we will be there, we always remember Nino who was so kind to our children
review_translated_text: Es nuestro lugar favorito para comer en bariloche,nunca tuvimos ningun tipo de problema con la comida y una excelente atencion,creo que volvemos en agosto y estaremos por ahi, siempre recordamos a Nino que era tan amable con nuestros hijos

review_text: Very rich tasting of pasta, varied and abundant.
review_translated_text: Muy rica la degustacion de pastas, variada y abundante.

review_text: Rich, abundant
review_translated_text: Rico, abundante

review_text: I come from Cordoba I had dinner at Bochelli restaurant VERY VERY VERY GOOD QUALITY AND ABUNDANT VERY GOOD ATTENTION FROM THE STAFF AND OWNERS SUPER BEAUTIFUL PLACE I WOULD RETURN WITHOUT A DOUBT THANK YOU VERY MUCH!!!
review_translated_text: Vengo desde Cordoba cene en restaurante bochelli MUY MUY MUY BUENA CALIDAD E ABUNDANTE MUY BUENA LA ATENCION DEL PERSONAL E DUENOS EL LUGAR SUPER HERMOSO VOLVERIA SIN DUDAS MUCHAS GRACIAS!!!

review_text: Highly recommended
review_translated_text: Muy recomendable

review_text: Excellent! Very nice atmosphere. Abundant dishes and corresponding prices. Excellent atention.
review_translated_text: Excelente! Ambiente muy agradable. Platos abundantes y precios acordes. Muy buena atencion.

review_text: The food was very disappointing. It was a waste of money, we ordered two tourist menus, the potatoes were dry, the Milanese was a thick breaded sheet and they took out the plate without having finished the entree seeing that I was still eating. For 1500 per person I ate better elsewhere.
review_translated_text: Muy decepcionante la comida . Fue plata tirada , pedimos dos menus turistas , las papas secas , la milanesa era una hoja de grosor rebozada y me sacaron el plato sin haberme terminado la entrada viendo que todavia comia. Por 1500 por persona comia mejor en otro lugar .

review_text: The place is 10/10. Food, service, atmosphere, everything is spectacular. Jonatan and Gaston the best
review_translated_text: El lugar es 10/10. Comida, atencion, el ambiente, todo es espectacular. Jonatan y Gaston los mejores

review_text: I spent 5 days in Puerto Iguazu with my wife and children, and we visited several top-rated restaurants. Just on the last day we visited El Hito Mirador Gourmet, a beautiful restaurant located under the Hito tres Fronteras viewpoint, Argentine side. Oooohhh what a surprise we got, a super calm atmosphere, impeccable attention from the waiter Ricardo, and exquisite food, the best we tried in our entire visit to Iguazu, even taking into account that we ordered very different dishes, including meats, fresh fish delicious river and even hamburger and pizza for my children, who were able to get the taste of what they like. Prices according to the place, service and dishes. Very good. We are sorry to have met you on our last day. We would return many times.
review_translated_text: Estuve 5 dias en Puerto Iguazu con mi esposa e hijos, y visitamos varios restaurantes de los mejores calificados. Justo el ultimo dia visitamos El Hito Mirador Gourmet, un hermoso restaurante ubicado debajo del mirador del Hito tres Fronteras, lado Argentino. Oooohhh sorpresa que nos llevamos, un ambiente super tranquilo, una atencion impecable del mozo Ricardo, y una comida exquisita, la mejor que probamos en toda nuestra visita por Iguazu, inclusive teniendo en cuenta que pedimos platos muy distintos, pasando por carnes, pescados de rio riquisimos e inclusive hamburguesa y pizza para mis hijos, que pudieron sacarse el gusto de eso que a ellos les gusta. Los precios acordes al lugar, servicio y platos. Muy bien. Lamentamos haberlos conocido en nuestro ultimo dia. Volveriamos muchas veces.

review_text: Excellent customer service. Good menu. In addition to a great view
review_translated_text: Muy buena atencion al cliente. Buen menu. Ademas de una buenisima vista

review_text: Excellent place, good service, beautiful view, excellent food, highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, buena atencion, hermosa vista, excelente comida, muy recomendable.

review_text: We had to leave because of the insulting treatment of the waiter. We asked for options without tac because they were on the menu and he told us that there were none, and that what we saw on the menu was a printing error. A shame.
review_translated_text: Nos tuvimos que ir por lo insultante del trato del mozo. Le pedimos opciones sin tacc porque figuraban en el menu y nos dijo que no habian, y que lo que veiamos en el menu era un error de impresion. Una verguenza.

review_text: Spectacular experience! My parents and I stumbled upon this place when we came to the viewpoint and stayed for cocktails, which then turned into dinner and dessert! Everything was impeccable, and Ricardo gave us excellent attention with outstanding recommendations and friendly service. Reasonable prices and a wonderful find! Muchas gracias, vamos de vuelta!!!
Couldnt have been more pleased with the atmosphere, service and especially the view!
Excellent 10 out of 10
review_translated_text: Excelente 10 de 10

review_text: We arrived and after about 10 minutes with the menu they came to tell us that since they had a group of people inside, they were going to prioritize them and those of us who were outside were going to be served in 40+ minutes with the food. I got up and went to the restaurant next door, a 10.
review_translated_text: Llegamos y despues de como 10 minutos con la carta nos vinieron a avisar que como tenian un grupo de personas del lado de adentro, iban a priorizar a ellos y los q estabamos afuera ibamos a ser atendidos en 40+ minutos con la comida. Me levante y me fui al restaurante de al lado, un 10.

review_text: Excellent service. Prices somewhat high but appropriate for the place. Super recommended

review_text: Super recommended! The incredible view and the excellent service. We went twice, and both times Jonathan served us, cordial and attentive.

review_text: Excellent food and attention. Silvina is a genius at serving!!!

Everything looked very delicious, thats why it caught my attention to go there but it was in vain since I spent a taxi for fun because it was closed, they put a note on the door saying that they were not open and that they would be open from January 29. Lack of information...a waste of time

It s a hidden gem. We had their sea food pasta and it was great. They make the past themselves which is always a plus. You must try the tiramisu.
Its a super hidden place, everything is unidentified. Its inside a commercial building, but if you follow the location you can easily locate it. The food is delicious.
Mut good food and service

review_text: Excellent place, the food is very tasty and the wines are a delight! Highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente lugar, la comida es muy sabrosa y los vinos son una delicia! Muy recomendable.

review_text: One of the best Italian restaurants in the world. The pasta stuffed with cheese and delicious mushroom sauce. Like ravioli and frutti mare. Highly recommended. We plan to return.
review_translated_text: Uno de los mejores restaurantes italianos del mundo. La pasta rellena de queso y salsa de hongos riquisima. Como los ravioles y los frutti mare. Muy recomendable. Pensamos volver.

review_text: Excellent restaurant.

review_text: The place is well hidden, it even seems secret. And thats the charm of the place

review_translated_text: nos encanto, la comida estupenda. esta dentro de un edificio en el 1er. piso. Volveremos

review_text: The location is inside a commercial building, on the first floor. A little difficult to find, but its worth it, very pleasant atmosphere and delicious food. I recommend it to both residents of Buenos Aires and tourists who are looking for different places to visit. Wheelchair accessibility: The building has an elevator.
review_translated_text: O local fica dentro de um predio comercial, no primeiro andar. Um pouco dificil de achar, mas vale muito a pena, ambiente muito prazeroso e comida deliciosa. Recomendo tanto aos moradores de Buenos Aires quanto aos turistas que estiverem buscando lugares diferentes para conhecerem. Wheelchair accessibility: O predio conta com um elevador.

review_text: We couldnt try it because it only opens at noon, or at least thats what it says on Google, a bit incredible, really.
review_translated_text: No pudimos probarlo porque solo abre a mediodia, o al menos eso indica en Google, un poco increible, la verdad.

review_text: Delicious food, good service. They have plastic soda and the ice cream is from Antiche Tentazioni. The place is well hidden, theres no way to find it unless you already know its there, maybe they could put a sign on the sidewalk to draw more attention.
review_translated_text: Rica comida, buena atencion. Tienen gaseosa de plastico y el helado es de Antiche Tentazioni. El lugar esta bien escondido, no hay manera de encontrarlo a menos que ya sepas que esta ahi, quizas podrian poner un cartel en la vereda para llamar mas la atencion.

review_text: The best of the best. It is an excellent experience, each dish is very enjoyable and of course the warmth of each one is unforgettable.
review_translated_text: Lo mejor de lo mejor. Es una experiencia excelente, cada plato se disfruta mucho y por supuesto la calidez de cada uno es inolvidable.

review_text: It is said that the JCB cards 10% discount only applies to pizza and pasta (there is no mention of this on the JCB website), so be careful!
review_translated_text: JCB    10%                    (JCB               )

review_text: Food was exceptionally bland. I had the meat roma pizza, and the crust tasted like it had been pulled from a freezer and reheated. I tried my friends carbonara as well, and I honestly cant remember what it tasted like. The calamari was heavily breaded and rubbery, and tasted frozen as well. The ranch it was served with was the best part of the whole meal. The waitress was bored, and the service in general was slow. The staff was kind, but hard to find.
I visited the stores downstairs because there was a wait, but I was satisfied with the atmosphere and food The price is a bit expensive
Food was delicious. Good service. Good value. Atmosphere

Amazing food!!!! So Christmas Eve we dined in and my expectations were low, but they quickly changed. I lived in Sicily for a few years and traveled to Italy a bit. I tried many Italian restaurants back in the states that were good, but just not  familiar , more Americanized Italian food. The Bruschetta came out and it was absolutely amazing!! Omgosh it was perfect! My kids got a cheese pizza and loved it. I ordered the Eggplant Parmigiana and it was good. I wish it was a little more flavorful, but it was still pretty good and hit the spot. The breadsticks appetizer and bread that came with the food were also a hit. I was really impressed with the food! It definitely hit the spot!! For the negative comments about the food, restaurants are going to have their good days and bad. Plus, you need to remind yourself you re in Guam. You re not going to get the quality or freshness of a lot of items unfortunately. Also, Italian food varies because not every province does it the same. People have to remember Italian food in America is NOTHING like Italian food in Italy/Sicily. It is different. Only thing I would say is the service could be a bit better, but I noticed that s how it is in Guam. Overall, it was a great place to eat!

There was a steakhouse on the first floor that had a lot of waiting, so I had to wait in line, but its on the second floor! You can get in without waiting, and the pizza and pasta were very delicious.

An eatery with prices like a normal cafe. Pizza more or less. I ordered a cappuccino and they brought me diluted espresso without milk. The waitress said that their cappuccino is strong coffee without milk
I liked that the food wasnt salty^^

The food here is gross and absolutely not authentic or fresh as some reviewers say. I have Italian family, have been to Italy and many Italian American joints and this place is an insult to Italians. It is the day after and I am still feeling quite ill. Definitely go to Olive Garden or get frozen pizza and skip this place. We got calamari which was frozen/chewy and served with jarred tartar sauce. We specifically asked if the calamari was fresh and the waitress lied and said yes. The pizza was clearly prepared from frozen and the cheese/toppings were barely melted on top. The crust was hard and bland. The chicken Parmesan was worse than the kind in the nursing home I have worked at. The pasta was over cooked, the sauce was bland and too sweet, the chicken was clearly low quality and prepared from frozen. The bread they provide is a sesame hoagie roll that they toast and brush with artificial butter flavoring. It was the best thing I ate which is not saying much. When we received the bill and were writing a tip, a waiter stood and stared at us until we were done which was very uncomfortable.
Best pizza place on guam.
The taste of food delivered in Korea soso
Very delicious food and inexplicable, very rich, everything great experience
review_translated_text: Muy Rica la comida e inexplicable muy rico todo grandiosa experiencia

review_text: Absolutely extraordinary dining experience that I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone visiting the area. The restaurant exudes coziness and charm, situated on the same property as the owners home. Despite arriving without a reservation and with little expectation of securing a table, we were warmly welcomed and promptly seated. Our server went above and beyond, taking the time to thoughtfully explain the menu and offering exquisite recommendations. To our delight, we were also extended an invitation to explore the basement wine and cheese cellar, adding an extra layer of charm to our visit. As for the food, it was nothing short of exceptional deserving of a Michelin star! Opting for the 3-course menu proved to be an excellent choice. Each dish was a culinary masterpiece, and I must emphasize the importance of saving room for dessert. The tiramisu was an absolute revelation, a perfect conclusion to an already remarkable meal. My partner opted for the stracciatella dulce, which was equally outstanding. This dining establishment surpassed all expectations, delivering not only delectable cuisine but also an ambiance that made the entire experience truly memorable. If you find yourself in the area, do not miss the opportunity to indulge in this culinary gem!
Excellent level, place to enjoy a quiet meal in a very pleasant and warm atmosphere
review_translated_text: Excelente nivel, lugar para disfrutar una comida tranquila en un ambiente muy agradable y calido

review_text: We just had a wonderful experience. The restaurant is extremely charming (the photos do not do it justice) and the overall ambiance and music is absolutely perfect. The menu was  different and creative. The wine list was extensive and we enjoyed a fabulous bottle of red wine. We had a slight mishap with a cork breaking in our bottle but the restaurant owner dealt with it promptly and perfectly. Always a sign of a well run establishment. Fantastic find!

Thank you so much for this amazing dinner and fabulous service. My husband and I had a fantastic dinner at this beautiful restaurant. From the moment we stepped in, we been graciously greeted and being sitted in a gorgeous space. The decor recalls traditional southern Italian restaurants. The menu is small but very well curated. I had the shrimp with avocado with a pear and olive oil fresh paste and the trout with veggies in one of the best lemon and butter sauces I ever had. Husband enjoyed a very delicate tomatoe soup and fantastic maltagliati. For deserts, I had an affogato that was perfectly served, and my husband had a wonderful   tiramisu. Service was impeccable. If you want a high-quality meal, this is the place to go
very expensive
review_translated_text: muy caro

review_text: The best of Bariloche far away
review_translated_text: Lo mejor de Bariloche lejos

review_text: Not cheap, but incredibly good. Every peso is well invested here. Very attentive service. Super nice Italian restaurant.
review_translated_text: Nicht gunstig,aber unglaublich gut. Hier ist jeder Pesos gut investiert. Sehr aufmerksame Bedienung. Super schones italienisches Restaurant.

review_text: Would highly recommend this place. Run by a husband and wife duo who you can tell are foodies. All dishes sounded amazing on the menu and the ones we sampled were all big hits. Pleasure of being served by an incredibly attentive server who made the night a pleasure.
One of the best restaurants.
review_translated_text: Unos de los mejores Restaurantes.

review_text: Delicioso! Of all the places we explored in Bariloche, this one was at the top of the list.
Excellent food, loving owners, excellent service. A pleasure!
review_translated_text: Excelente comida, los duenos un amor, atencion excelente. Un placer!

review_text: Very good. Spectacular cuisine. Exquisite atmosphere. Careful attention.

review_text: I ve coming to this restaurant every year. Top top.
Cozy atmosphere Great service Excellent dishes

We were a family of 6, the experience includes 1 appetizer, 1 main course and 1 dessert for ARS$ 20,000. We all ordered different dishes and each one was incredible, as was the attention of all the staff, we accompanied the dinner with a bottle of wine, sparkling and still water, the final bill was ARS$142,000. A WASTE-FREE experience, totally recommended.
review_translated_text: Fuimos una familia de 6, la experiencia incluye 1 entrada, 1 plato fuerte y 1 postre por ARS$ 20,000. Todos pedimos platos diferentes y cada uno estuvo increible, por igual que las atenciones de todo el personal, acompanamos la cena con una botella de vino, agua con y sin gas, la cuenta final hizo ARS$ 142,000. Una experiencia SIN DESPERDICIOS, totalmente recomendada .

review_text: Italian for 40 years, high level of food. Its owners make you feel at home
review_translated_text: Italiano con 40 anos, alto nivel de comida. Sus duenos te hacen sentir como en casa

review_text: Excellent food, place and service. Ramiro is divine and the food is made with a lot of love! Everything first class. Thank you!!!
review_translated_text: Excelente la comida, el lugar y la atencion. Ramiro es divino y la comida hecha con mucho amor! Todo de primera. Gracias!!!

review_text: Stunning place, a million dollar view. A house, a few tables, a thousand attention from its own owners. Marcia and Facundo are very good hosts, the food is excellent. You can see the good quality of the products in each dish. The 3-course menu is very good and fills you up, but as always I went a little further and ordered some noodles, in which I put together the sauce to my liking. I appreciate it a thousand!! I love those attitudes
review_translated_text: Lugar impresionante, una vista del millon de dolares. Una casa, pocas mesas, la atencion mil y de sus propios duenos. Marcia y Facundo muy buenos anfitriones, la comida es excelente. Se nota la buena calidad de los productos en cada plato. El menu de 3 pasos es muy bueno y te llena, pero como siempre fui un poco mas alla y me pedi unos fideos, en los cuales me armo la salsa a mi gusto. Lo agradezco mil!! Me encantan esas actitudes

review_text: Nice place, slow service and good food. A little expensive for what you get.
review_translated_text: Lindo lugar, servicio lento y buena comida. Un poco caro para lo que da.

review_text: excellent in all in an environment with only 5 tables It makes you feel at home, but 2 Michelin star food Go with reservation, otherwise it is impossible.

There are only 5/6 tables, you have to reserve in advance. It has a super nice view and the vibe of the place feels like being in the house of someone who cooks for you out of love. The food is delicious, they have peculiar tastes that are not easy to recreate, which I believe is something that one expects due to the high price of the dishes. We arrived a little late and there was no lamb, which made us a little sad but everything we ordered was very tasty. The trout comes with something on top that I dont know what it is that gives it a different rich taste but at the same time it is a little dry, maybe adding some sauce or a pure style garnish would have been better. The bruschetta starter surprised me, I thought it was going to be something simple but very tasty, just like the mushrooms. Normal desserts, I wanted to try the figs. To drink there is a menu with several wines. It is a very cozy place, the service is excellent, the views are very nice but the price seemed high for the quality it has. 3 courses with a glass of wine costs approximately 40/50 USD per person, for a foreigner it is fine but for Argentines perhaps a little more is expected from the dishes.
review_translated_text: Son solo 5/6 mesas, hay que reservar con tiempo. Tiene una vista super linda y la vibra del lugar se siente como estar en la casa de alguien que te cocina por amor. La comida es riquisima, son gustos peculiares que no son faciles de recrear, que yo creo que por el precio elevado que tienen los platos es algo que uno espera. Llegamos un poco tarde y ya no habia cordero, lo cual nos puso un poco triste pero todo lo que pedimos estaba muy sabroso. La trucha viene con algo arriba que no se bien que es que le da un gusto diferente rico pero al mismo tiempo es un poco seco, quiza agregarle alguna salsa o una guarnicion al estilo pure hubiese quedado mejor. La entrada de la bruschetta me sorprendio, pense que iba a ser algo simple pero muy sabroso, al igual que la de los hongos. Los postres normales, me quede con ganas de probar los higos. Para tomar hay una carta con varios vinos. Es un lugar muy acogedor, la atencion es excelente, las vistas muy lindas pero el precio me parecio elevado para la calidad que tiene. 3 pasos con una copa de vino sale aprox 40/50 usd por persona, para un extranjero esta bien pero para argentinos quiza se espera un poco mas de los platos.

review_text: Beautiful experience. Excellent service, sublime food. The beautiful view.
review_translated_text: Hermosa experiencia. Excelente atencion, la comida sublime. La vista preciosa.

review_text: Everything is perfect at La Masia. The history of the place, the first-class service, the spectacular dishes and to close, the view that seems straight out of a painting. Thanks for a great night, clearly one of the best places to eat in Bariloche.
review_translated_text: Todo es perfecto en La Masia. La historia del lugar, la atencion de primera, los platos espectaculares y para cerrar, la vista que parece sacada de un cuadro. Gracias por una gran noche, claramente uno de los mejores lugares para comer en Bariloche.

review_text: The best restaurant in Bariloche. In the Llaollao area, run by Marcia and Facundo, its owners. They make a magical place, facing the lake, in their house. Perfect winery and unforgettable dishes. Reserve well in advance. Everything is delicious, but the lamb is the best in the world. Years and years coming and always perfect. We want them!! Parking: You have to book in advance, ideally weeks in advance.
review_translated_text: El mejor restaurante de bariloche. En area llaollao, atendido por marcia y facundo, sus duenos. Hacen un lugar magico, frente al lago, en su casa. Bodega perfecta y platos inolvidables. Reservar con mucha anticipacion. Todo rico, pero el cordero es lo mejor del mundo. Anos y anos viniendo y aiempre perfecto. Los queremos!! Parking: Hay que reservar con anticipacion, idealmente semanas de anticipacion

review_text: Wonderful meal and service! The cutest little house with only a few tables. Probably the best dinner we have enjoyed in Baricloche. Only 5 mins from the Llao Llao hotel. Marcia was so gracious and attentive. We ordered the mussels and burrata carprese. Both off the menu items for our starters. And we both ordered the spaghetti with the olives and anchovies sauce. Excellent!! Amazing Italian cuisine in Bariloche. Beautiful views and great wine choices. This is a must visit when in Bariloche. I was able to get a reservation same day!
Beautiful and delicious as always!!!
review_translated_text: Lindisimo y riquisimo como siempre  !!!

review_text: The food is delicious, the service is very good, the view is incredible. There is a choice of 1,2 or 3 dishes, and there are quite a few options. High prices but the experience, the place and the quality of the food are worth it since it is a small restaurant with 5 tables. We will repeat! Yes or yes with reservation well in advance.
review_translated_text: La comida riquisima, la atencion muy buena, la vista, increible. Hay opcion de 1,2 o 3 platos, y hay bastantes opciones. Precios altos pero vale la experiencia, el lugar y calidad de la comida ya que es un restaurante pequeno con 5 mesas. Repetiremos! Si o si con reserva con bastante antelacion.

review_text: Romantic cozy restaurant with the best food in bariloche. Way better food than the unimpressive Llao Llao resort. We had the best lamb of our lives here. Space is limited so call ahead and enjoy.

Small restaurant with very few seats, elegant furnishings and a warm and very welcoming atmosphere. Excellent service, truly delicious food. One dish is truly better than the other. More than recommended.
Very beautiful view of the lake and pleasant room
review_translated_text: Tres belle vue sur le lac et salle agreable

review_text: The dishes are delicious, the service is adorable. I highly recommend it was great!
review_translated_text: Les plats sont delicieux , le service est adorable.Je recommande fortement c etait super !

review_text: An unforgettable experience, you are at the highest European level for a while.
review_translated_text: Una experiencia inolvidable, estas en el mas alto nivel europeo por un rato.

review_text: Excellent atmosphere. Exquisite food. Beautiful view. Impeccable attention. Highly recommended.
review_translated_text: Excelente ambiente. Exquisita la comida. Hermosa la vista. Impecable la atencion. Altamente recomendable.

review_text: Very nice place but with little taste... very little! Giant plates with super small portions, VERY EXPENSIVE! If you are a foreigner or earn in dollars it is great... it is not suitable for the Argentine pocket and I was not amazed by the flavors of the dishes either... the panacota, mediocre, my grandmother made it better.
response_from_owner_text: Hello, it seems to me that you are in the wrong place, because our portions are not small and we do not make pannacotta, greetings
review_translated_text: Lugar muy agradable pero con gusto a poco... poquisimo! platos gigantes con porciones super chicas, CARISIMO! si sos extranjero o ganas en dolares es genial... no es apto para el bolsillo argentino y tampoco me alucinaron los sabores de los platos... la panacota, mediocre, mi abuela la hacia mejor.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola me parece que se equivoco de lugar, porque nuestros porciones no son chicas y no hacemos pannacotta, saludos

review_text: Lets assume that La Seine in Seoul and La Seine here have the same name. Of course, I understand that the price difference is about 3 times, but I think it would be better if it had the La Seine name on it and provided quality food even if it costs more. The overall taste of the food was good, but the menu composition was disappointing. A lot of emphasis was put on the seafood, but the meat was relatively poor, and the dessert in particular was below expectations. And the table spacing needs to be adjusted. It wasnt even a school cafeteria, but it was so close together. However, considering Guams prices, the conclusion is that it is a good choice if you like seafood and are a family.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for using Lotte Hotel Guam for your precious trip. Thank you for your valuable opinion while you were busy, and I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced while using La seine. We will share with the relevant department about the inconvenience you experienced during the meal to review the facility and find a better way. Also, we will do our best to prevent the same inconvenience from recurring in the future. Again, we apologize and we hope for another chance to welcome you in the future. Warm regards, LOTTE Hotel Guam

review_text: Good atmosphere and good service It was delicious and I was satisfied with everything. Satisfied with both alcohol and food
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for choosing Lotte Hotel Guam for your precious trip. We will do our best to become a hotel that provides more comfortable services based on your valuable comments while you are busy. Thank you once again for sharing the memories of your Guam trip with Lotte Hotel Guam.

review_text: La Seine isnt answering the phone. I wonder if shes intentionally not answering the phone. Even if I contact her through the front desk, she doesnt answer the phone. Kid-friendliness: baby chair
The food menu is diverse and you can eat as much seafood as you want.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for choosing Lotte Hotel Guam for your precious trip. We will do our best to become a hotel that provides more comfortable services based on your valuable comments while you are busy. Thank you once again for sharing the memories of your Guam trip with Lotte Hotel Guam.

review_text: Having a good time
I like it, it s good, good
review_translated_text: goodgood

review_text: Need to book in advance to avoid disappointment. Free flow lobster and baby abalone. Abit sad that the lechon is limited. Overall one of the best buffet.

Considering the price and cost-effectiveness of Guam, it was the best place in Guam. A few days after coming to Guam, I said,  Oh, I had a good time.  Needless to say, the servers were friendly. I think you need to make a reservation at least a month in advance to get the time you want. The fastest route seems to be to send a reservation email directly to La Seine.
The atmosphere is nice and the food is delicious. Seafood such as lobster is also delicious! There was unlimited alcohol so I enjoyed it. They even perform on stage in the middle and it s cool!

I found the place by chance three weeks ago, at snack time. I loved the atmosphere, and the attention of Walter from Terre Rouge. Yabuticaba has a particular architecture that I really like and it is quiet, perfect for reading or working online (in the afternoon). On Friday night I came back with friends and we tried the drinks, they are delicious. My parents went yesterday Saturday to a sensory wine experience with Mrs. Rosana Spaciuk. They found the experience and the quality-price very nice. I cant say anything personally regarding the food because I havent had the chance to dine there.
review_translated_text: He encontrado el lugar por casualidad hace tres semanas, a la hora de la merienda. Me encanto el ambiente, y la atencion de Walter de Terre Rouge . Yabuticaba tiene una arquitectura particular que me agrada mucho y es tranquilo, especial para ir a leer o trabajar en linea (por la tarde). El viernes volvi por la noche con amigas y probamos los tragos, son sabrosisimos. Mis padres han ido ayer sabado a una experiencia sensorial de vinos con la Sra Rosana Spaciuk. Les ha parecido muy linda la experiencia y la calidad-precio. No puedo decir nada personalmente con respecto a la comida porque no he tenido la ocasion de cenar alli.

review_text: The place is incredible, there are several environments surrounded by nature. The architecture, the richness of the details are very tasteful. Wheelchair accessibility: Wheelchairs and ramps are available.

review_text: Very good atmosphere, but the food left a lot to be desired. We ordered medium-rare meat for less and the meat was well done, the choops were hot and the childrens sobresa (popsicle) were melted twice.

review_text: Amazing. Very pleasant place, delicious food, excellent service, extremely polite staff, fair price. Hope to return soon.

review_text: The food was good, the dishes were very good, the weak point was the attention and how long it took to bring the food. It ended up being a weak experience.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Paul, Thank you very much for your point of view about Naipi Restaurant. We are more than happy to have been able to receive you and we regret not having been able to live up to your expectations. If you would allow us to reverse this image, we would be more than eager to receive you again. If you have any questions or doubts available, Sincerely, Nahuel Cortesi/Team Leader - Guest Services
review_translated_text: La comida estuvo bien los platos muy buenos, el punto flojo fue la atencion y todo lo que se demoraron en traer la comida. Termino siendo una experiencia floja.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimado Pablo. Muchas gracias por su punto de vista sobre Naipi Restaurant. Estamos mas que felices de haber podido recibirlos y lamentamos no haber podido estar a la altura de sus expectativas. Si nos permitiera revertir esta imagen, estariamos mas que ansiosos de poder volverlos a recibir. Ante cualquier consulta o duda a disposicion, Atentamente, Nahuel Cortesi/Team Leader - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: Its good to go although a bit expensive for what it offers. Although some dishes are very good, such as chipa guazu, there are others that are very basic and not so good. The prices are high although it is understood that it is touristy. The problem is the lack of variety, especially vegetarian, being a hotel restaurant.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your comment and stars about Naipi Restaurant. We are pleased to know that as a final result, we have approved your expectations. Your suggestions make us grow day after day, so we will relay this information to our superiors accordingly. We hope to have you again more than anxious so that you can see that we can reverse the image of what was mentioned. Happy 2024! Sincerely, Nahuel Cortesi - Team Leader/Guest Service
review_translated_text: Esta bien para ir aunque algo caro para lo que ofrece. Si bien algunos platos estan muy bien como el chipa guazu hay otros muy basicos y no tan buenos. Los precios elevados aunque se entiende que sea turistico. El problema es la falta de variedad en especial vegetariana siendo el restaurante de un hotel.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias por su comentario y estrellas sobre Naipi Restaurant. Nos complace saber que como resultado final, hemos aprobado sus expectativas. Sus sugerencias nos hacen crecer dia tras dia, por lo que retransmitiremos esta informacion a nuestros superiores de manera correspondiente. Esperamos volver a tenerlos mas que ansiosos para que puedan comprobar que podremos revertir la imagen de lo mencionado. Feliz 2024! Atentamente, Nahuel Cortesi - Team Leader/Atencion al Huesped

review_text: Food was bad. RibEye was dry  for a kiddo (it was ordered rare). Passion fruit risotto tasted like desert. The service was super poor. It took them 1 hr to get the order to the table. A friend of mine ordered Coca Cola. The first was a 500ml bottle, the next, 375 and charged the same! We ordered a Lou salad yesterday and it was delivered without salmon. And not even an explanation, left to see if we wouldn t realize it. Seriously disappointed.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Mariana, We apologize for the inconvenience caused, we will relay this information immediately to each of our superiors and we will work hard to solve each of the inconveniences indicated. Our main task at Naipi Restaurant is to make your experience unique and unforgettable. We hope to have you again soon to be able to change your point of view about our work and demonstrate the level of quality that characterizes us. If you have any questions or doubts available, Greetings Nahuel Cortesi - Guest Services
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimada Mariana. Le pedimos disculpas por las molestias ocasionadas, retransmitiremos esta informacion inmediatamente a cada uno de nuestros superiores y trabajaremos arduamente para solucionar cada uno de los inconvenientes senalados. Nuestra principal tarea en Naipi Restaurant es hacer de su experiencia algo unico e inolvidable. Esperamos volver a tenerlos pronto nuevamente para poder cambiar su punto de vista sobre nuestro trabajo y demostrar el nivel de calidad que nos caracteriza. Ante cualquier consulta o duda a disposicion, Saludos Nahuel Cortesi - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: More than 5 stars, fabulous attention, the waiters are incredible. The food without tac is spectacular, you dont even realize it doesnt have tac. The food is fabulous, everything is of excellent quality and preserved and served accordingly so that it can be tasted and delighted with all 5 senses!!! You also have regional products, all perfectly presented and prepared. I highly recommend and we will definitely return! Vegetarian options: Without excellent quality tac!!! Dietary restrictions: You dont realize that they dont have tac, the products are fabulous! Parking: Many places, I dont know if its free Kid-friendliness: There are also activities for children. Wheelchair accessibility: There are also elevators everywhere.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Analia. Simply thank you for taking the time to leave such a beautiful review. It makes us more than happy to know that you felt comfortable in our facilities and that your experience was unique and wonderful. Since it is our main mission, to make all the people who visit us happy. We will relay the information to all our collaborators/superiors and it goes without saying that we will be waiting for you again more than eagerly for when you wish to return. Greetings Nahuel Cortesi - Guest Services
review_translated_text: Mas que 5 estrellas, la atencion fabulosa,los mozos son increibles. La comida sin tacc espectacular,ni te das cuenta que no tiene tacc. La comida es fabulosa , todo es de excelentisima calidad y conservado y servido de forma correspondiente para que pueda ser degustada y deleitada con los 5 sentidos!!! Tambien cuentas con productos regionales todo perfectamente presentado y elaborado Recomiendo ampliamente y volveremos claro! Vegetarian options: Sin tacc de excelente calidad!!! Dietary restrictions: No te das cuenta que no tienen tacc ,son fabulosos los productos! Parking: Lugares muchos, nose si es gratuito Kid-friendliness: Hay tambien actividades para ninos. Wheelchair accessibility: En todas partes ademas hay ascensores.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimada Analia. Simplemente gracias por tomarse el tiempo de dejar tan preciosa resena. Nos hace mas que felices saber que se hayan sentido a gusto en nuestras instalaciones y que su experiencia haya sido unica y maravillosa. Ya que es nuestra principal mision, hacer felices a todas las personas que nos visitan. Retransmitiremos la informacion a todos nuestros colaboradores /superiores y desde ya de mas esta decir que los estaremos esperando nuevamente mas que ansiosos para cuando deseen volver. Saludos Nahuel Cortesi - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: A lot of comfort, the hotel was very pleasant. The restaurant was very nice, but the gnocchi were cold and the dry bondiola was overcooked. A shame.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Susana, Thank you very much for your rating as well as your comment, we are pleased to know that in terms of infrastructure, we have lived up to your expectations. We are immensely sorry for the inconvenience caused, we are with our doors open for when you wish to return ready to demonstrate the quality of each of our products and services. We eagerly await your future visits. Greetings Nahuel Cortesi - Guest Services
review_translated_text: Mucho confort muy agradable el hotel Muy lindo el restaurantepero los noquis estaban frios y la bondiola seca recocida Una lastima
response_from_owner_translated_text: Estimada Susana. Muchas gracias por su puntuacion al igual que su comentario, nos complace saber que en cuanto a infraestructura, hemos estado a la altura de sus expectativas. Lamentamos inmensamente las molestias ocasionadas, estamos con las puertas abiertas para cuando deseen volver dispuestos a demostrar la calidad de cada uno de nuestros productos y servicios. Ansiosamente los esperamos ante futuras visitas. Saludos Nahuel Cortesi - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: We have gone three times while not staying at the hotel. The chefs suggestions are excellent, for example  gizzards with grilled vegetables and the sauce is defining  spectacular. Very good drinks and excellent desserts. Superior atmosphere and very good quality-price ratio. Warmth of attention I would only ask that they add QR payment to speed up payment.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your excellent review! We are pleased to know that your experience has been pleasant at Naipi Restaurant. We look forward to seeing you in the future! Greetings Cortesi Nahuel - Guest Services
review_translated_text: Hemos ido en tres oportunidades no estando alojados en el hotel. Excelentes las sugerencias del cheff  por ejemplo  mollejas con vegetales grillados y la salsa se esta definiendo  espectacular. Tragos muy buenos y postres excelentes. Ambiente superior y la relacion precio calidad muuy buena. Calidez en la atencion Solo pediria que agreguen el pago con QR para agilizar al momento de pago.
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias por su excelente resena! Nos complace saber que su experiencia ha sido grata en Naipi Restaurant. Ansiosamente los esperamos a futuro! Saludos Cortesi Nahuel - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: Very rich! Great attention! All the dishes we ate were excellent. Recommended the pacu, the bondiola and the cassava gnocchi
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Sofia for such a precious review! We are very happy that your experience here has been unique. We eagerly await you with our doors open to the future. Greetings Cortesi Nahuel - Guest Services
review_translated_text: Muy rico! Gran atencion! Todos los platos que comimos fueron excelentes. Recomendado el pacu, la bondiola y los noquis de mandioca
response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Sofia por tan preciada resena! Nos pone muy felices que su experiencia aqui haya sido unica. Ansiosamente los esperamos con las puertas abiertas a futuro. Saludos Cortesi Nahuel - Atencion al Huesped

review_text: Good...fast and good prices.
review_translated_text: Bien...rapido y buenos precios.

review_text: Brilliant..!!!

review_text: Normally I dont go to new restaurants with few reviews, but somehow life took me to Lumbre, a place that deserves to be the exception to this rule. We tried the entire menu and each dish was a great surprise and as if that were not enough Lumbre is served by its creators, which adds a lot of warmth to the experience. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. A real find for those who love good food
review_translated_text: Normalmente no voy a restaurantes nuevos y con pocas reviews, pero de alguna manera la vida me llevo a Lumbre, un lugar que merece ser la excepcion a esta regla. Probamos todo el menu y cada plato fue una gran sorpresa y como si fuera poco Lumbre es atendido por sus creadores, lo que suma mucha calidez a la experiencia. MUY RECOMENDADO. Un verdadero hallazgo para quienes aman la buena comida
